Displaced to 11.7 ppg water based mud (WBM) and then pulled into shoe and prepared surface pits for WBM returns. Complete WBM displacement and POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to surface. Current mud weight is 11.7 ppg WBM.

02/25/2016: TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to 1;103' MD and function BSR/CSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; good test. TIH to 6;500' MD; then pull (1) stand and perform diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel; good test. Space out an perform BOP function test from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; good test. TIH to 6;500' MD and displace from 11.7 ppg WBM to 11.5 ppg WBM. Current mud weight is 11.5 ppg WBM.

02/26/2016: Completed mud weight reduction to 11.5 ppg. Commenced drilling; kicking off at 6;751' MD; and drilled ahead to 7;116' MD. Pumped out of hole to 6;632' MD and opened reamer. Open hole to 21" from 6;620' MD bit depth to 6;840' MD bit depth. Current mud weight is 11.5 ppg WBM.

02/27/2016: Continue opening hole to 21" to 7;116' MD bit depth. Drill head to 7;151' MD and circulated bottoms up. POOH with BHA to reconfigure with a rock bit due to slow ROP. Current mud weight is 11.5 ppg WBM.
"},{"   ":31,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-02-28","TEXT_REMARK":"02/28/2016: POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to surface. Replaced Kymera bit with a rock bit. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from surface to 5;310' MD and set wear sleeve. Continued to TIH from 5;310' MD to 6;614' MD. Washed down to 7;151' MD. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 7;151' MD to 7;169' MD. Current MW is 11.5 ppg WBM.

02/29/2016: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 7;169' MD to 7;223' MD at approximately 5 fph. Circulated bottoms up at 7;223' MD and flow checked prior to pulling out of hole; good check. Pumped out of the hole from 7;223' MD to 6;486' MD. Spaced out 34# 6-5/8" DP across BOP and pressure tested BOPs with 11.5 ppg WBM to 250 psi low/ 5;600 psi high from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; successful test. Current MW is 11.5 ppg WBM.

03/01/2016: Rigged down BOP testing equipment following successful test. Function tested the diverter from Driller's Panel. Prepared pits to displace from 11.5 ppg WBM to 11.5 ppg SBM. Tripped back in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from 6;480' MD to 7;223' MD. Flushed choke and kill lines with 11.5 ppg SBM. Pumped 13.5 ppg spacer followed by 11.5 ppg SBM to displace well while displacing boost line to 11.5 ppg SBM. Pulled back into shoe from 7;223' MD to 6;480' MD and flow checked; good check. POOH from 6;480' MD to 6;625' MD and broke circulation to fill sand traps with 11.5 ppg SBM. POOH from 6;480' MD to surface with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Removed wear sleeve on trip out. Current MW is 11.5 ppg SBM.

03/02/2016: Made up 18-1/8" bit and riser brush assembly and tripped in hole from surface to 6;645' MD. Flow checked well prior to entering BOP; good check. Function test BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Set wear sleeve in wellhead during trip in. Washed down to 6;684' MD. Activated circulation sub and washed 22" casing shoe. Pumped and rotated out of hole from 6;684' MD to 4;467' MD. Washed 18" Supplemental Adapter (SA); 16" SA; wellhead; and BOP on way out of hole. Pulled wear sleeve. Pumped 100 bbls weighted Hi-Vis sweep and circulated bottoms up. Deactivated circulation sub and pumped 13.5 ppg slug. POOH from 4;667' MD to 2;025' MD. Laid out riser brushes and continued tripping out from 2;025' MD to surface. Current MW is 11.5 ppg SBM. 

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) via email on 03/02/2016 @ 8:35 hrs for a 24 hour extension of BSR/Casing pressure test that is due on March 5; 2016.

03/03/2016: Made up 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly and TIH from surface to 7;128' MD. Washed down from 7;128' MD to 7;223' MD. Tagged bottom at 7;223' MD and began drilling 18-1/8" x 21" section from 7;223' MD to 8;155' MD. Observed slight losses as reamer exited suture; treated with LCM - total losses over 24 hours is 93 bbls. Current MW is 11.5 ppg SBM.

03/04/2016: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 8;155' MD to TD at 10;000' MD/9;990' TVD. Pump 200 bbls Hi-Vis sweep at TD and circulated bottoms up. Current MW is 11.5 ppg SBM.

03/05/2016: Continued to circulate bottoms up. Performed static influx test and circulated bottoms up. Spotted 40 bbl 16.0 ppg pill in rathole and performed flow check; good check. POOH from 10;000' MD to 6;230' MD. Activated circulating sub. Tripped out of hole from 6;230' MD to 4;694' MD and washed 18" SA; 16" SA; wellhead. Pulled wear sleeve. Performed flow check prior to putting non-shearables across the stack; good check. Deactivated circulating sub and POOH to surface with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Rigged up casing handling equipment and TIH from surface to 1;916' MD with 17-7/8" 106.34# Q125 HP casing. Current MW is 11.5 ppg SBM. 

Note: Mr. Allan Pribadi (Chevron) received verbal approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) via email on 03/05/2016 to proceed with setting and cementing 18" casing shallower as requested."},{"   ":32,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-06","TEXT_REMARK":"03/06/2016: Continued to pick up (P/U) and trip in hole (TIH) with 17-7/8" x 18" casing to 3;761' MD/TVD in 11.5 ppg SBM. Made up 18" hanger to 18" casing. Rigged up (R/U) and ran inner string. TIH with 17-7/8" x 18" casing to 9;848' MD on 6-5/8" landing string. Landed out 18" hanger at 6;097' MD with 17-7/8" shoe at 9;870' MD. 

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) via email on 03/06/2016 @ 14:02 hrs for additional 24 hour extension of BSR/Casing pressure test that was due on March 5; 2016.

03/07/2016: Performed 18" cementing operations. Pumped 976 cu ft (174 bbls) of 16.2 ppg cement slurry and set in place with 269 bbls of 11.5 ppg SBM. Confirmed floats were holding. Tripped out of hole (TOH) to surface with 6-5/8" inner string and landing string. Function tested BOPs (from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod) and diverter (from Toolpusher's Panel) - both successful tests. Pressure tested 18" casing and BSR to 250 psi/ 2;100 psi from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; with 11.5 ppg SBM - successful tests. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. TIH with 16-1/2" x 19" drilling assembly from surface to 1;900' MD on 6-5/8" drill pipe.

03/08/2016: TIH with 16-1/2" x 19" drilling assembly to 6;120' MD on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Spaced out and pressure tested BOP to 250/5;300 psi from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; on 6-5/8" drill pipe - successful test. TIH to 9;758' MD. Tagged cement with 15 klbs down at 9;758' MD TVD. Displaced well from 11.5 ppg SBM to 12.4 ppg SBM. Drilled cement to 9;899' MD. Washed and reamed rathole to 10;000' MD. Drilled 10' new formation to 10;010' MD.

03/09/2016; Circulate bottoms up. Closed annular and performed FIT with 12.4 ppg SBM to 730 psi. Downhole EMW = 14.0 ppg. Activated reamer and performed pull test against shoe. Reamed to 10;010' MD. Drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole section to 11;351' MD with 12.4 ppg SBM.

03/10/2016: Drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole section to 12;490' MD. Weight up from 12.4 ppg to 12.7 ppg. TOH to 9;698' MD to troubleshoot IBOP. 

03/11/2016: Continue to repair IBOP. TIH to 10;892' MD on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Took checkshots and reamed to 11;022' MD to reduced DLS in openhole. TIH and drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole section to 13;786' MD. Weighted up from 12.7 ppg SBM to 12.9 ppg SBM at 13;700'MD.

03/12/2016: Drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole section to 16;349' MD using 6-5/8" drill pipe with 12.9 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":33,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-13","TEXT_REMARK":"03/13/2016: Drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 16;349' MD to total depth of 18;322' MD with 13.0 ppg SBM. Flow checked well on trip tank during all connections; well static. Pumped weighted hi-vis sweep and circulated bottoms up (CBU) with 13.0 ppg SBM. Flow checked; well static.

03/14/2016: Continued CBU while weighting up active system from 13.0 ppg to 13.2 ppg SBM. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA to 6;032' MD; while monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. Closed lower annular and located on 6-5/8" 34# drill pipe (DP). Performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - successful test. TOH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from 6;032' to 5;731' MD. Performed diverter function test from Driller's Panel - successful test. TOH to 4;454' MD. Function tested Blind Shear Rams (BSR)/ Casing Shear Rams (CSR) from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - successful test. TOH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from 4;454' MD to 4;199' MD while monitoring well for proper displacement; well static.

03/15/2016: Continued TOH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from 4;199' MD to surface SBM while monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. Ran 16.25" x 16.20" casing from surface to 863' MD in 13.2 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement; well static. 

03/16/2016: Continued running 16.25" x 16.20" casing from 863' MD to 9;814' MD in 13.2 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement; well static. 

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) permission to proceed with the 16" casing centralization modification request via email on 03/16/2016 at 19:35 hrs. 

03/17/2016: Continued to run 16.25" x 16.20" casing from 9;814' MD to 13;063' MD in 13.2 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement; well static. Made up 16" hanger and ran 16.25" x 16.20" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 13;063' to 18;156' MD while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement; well static. Circulated with 13.2 ppg SBM prior to cement job. Observed 50 bbls of losses. 

03/18/2016: Landed 16.25" x 16.20" string at 18;198' MD. Circulated well prior to cement job and incurred losses (125 bbls). Cemented 16.25" x 16.20" casing with 354 bbl (1988 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement. Displaced cement with 2;788 bbls of 13.2 ppg SBM. Confirmed floats were holding. Observed lost returns throughout cement job - this was expected based on cement modeling that was certified by the Professional Engineer. Cement lift pressure indicates successfully building a column of cement around the 16" shoe; i.e.; losses at the 18" casing shoe. Set and tested 16" hanger at 5;126' MD. Flow checked; well static. TOH with casing hanger running tool from 5;126' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank; well static. Made up BOP testing assembly and TIH to set wear sleeve assembly while monitoring well on trip tank; well static.

03/19/2016: Spaced out and pressure tested BOPs with 13.2 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; to 250/8;300 psi on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Tested annular to 250/6;400 psi - successful tests. TOH with BOP test assembly on 6-5/8" DP while monitoring for proper displacement; well static. Function tested the diverter from Toolpusher's Panel - successful test. Function tested BSR and CSR from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - successful tests. Pressure tested 16" casing against BSR from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; with 13.2 ppg SBM to 5000 psi - successful test. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 8;711' MD in 13.2 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement; well static.
"},{"   ":34,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-20","TEXT_REMARK":"03/20/2016: Trip in hole (TIH) with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 8;711' MD to 17;549' MD in 13.2 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement; well static. Tagged top of cement at 17;830' MD and performed choke drill with drill floor crew while monitoring well on trip tank - good drill and well static. Drilled out cement; rathole and 10' of new formation from 17;830' MD to 18;342' MD while weighting up to 13.5 ppg SBM. Pump out of hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 18;342' MD to 18;132' MD. Close lower annular from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and locate tool joint. Perform Formation Integrity Test (FIT) with 13.5 ppg SBM and surface pressure of 2;200 psi for a 15.8 ppg surface/ 16.1 ppg downhole FIT target MW - good test. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 18;132' MD to 18;324' MD; drop reamer activation ball and pull test reamer in 13.5 ppg SBM. 

03/21/2016: Drill ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 18;342' MD to 18;392' MD with 13.5 ppg SBM. Weighted mud up from 13.5 ppg to 13.9 ppg SBM at 18;392' MD. Drill ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 18;392' MD to 19;205' MD with 13.9 ppg SBM. Weighted mud up from 13.9 ppg to 14.1 ppg SBM at 19;205' MD. Drilled from 19;205' MD to 19;588' MD and increased MW to 14.3 ppg SBM. Continued drilling from 19;588' MD to 19;667' MD and began increasing MW to 14.6 ppg SBM. Continued drilling from 19;667' MD to 20;060' MD with 14.6 ppg SBM.

03/22/2016: Drill ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 20;060' MD with 14.6 ppg SBM to 21;000' MD. Increased MW from 14.6 ppg to 14.8 ppg SBM and continued drilling from 21;000' MD to 21;593' MD. At 21;593' MD; trip out of hole due to BHA building angle - suspected PowerDrive failure. Circulated well bottoms up with 14.8 SBM and performed flow check - well static. TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 21;593' MD to 18;318' MD. Perform flow check at 18;318' MD - well static.

03/23/2016: Continue tripping out of hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 18;318' MD to surface in 14.8 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Function test BSR/CSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. M/U new 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA and RIH from surface to 8;073' MD in 14.8 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Performed well control drill while tripping with drill crew - good drill. 

03/24/2016: Continue tripping in hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA in 14.8 ppg SBM from 8;073' MD to 10;628' MD. Space out and perform BOP function test from the Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Perform Diverter test from Driller's Panel - good test. Continue to TIH to 18;290' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Attempted to activate the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" NOV reamer unsuccessfully. Dropped opening ball to activate circulation sub and TOH from 18;290' MD to surface with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA in 14.8 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. 

03/25/2016: Made up new 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA; function tested 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" NOV Reamer on surface; and tripped in hole with same from surface to 15;110' MD in 14.8 ppg SBM. Attempted to open IBOP and noticed the air swivel lines had become disconnected. Mechanics troubleshot and repaired. Confirmed air swivel is fully functional. 

03/26/2016: Continue tripping in hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA in 14.8 ppg SBM from 15;110' MD to 18;300' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Pull tested 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" Reamer at 16" shoe - good test - continued TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA in 14.8 ppg SBM 21;392' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Washed down from 21;392' MD to 21;593' MD and began drilling 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 21;593' MD to 22;022' MD. At 22;022' MD; top drive saver sub over-torqued. Circulate bottoms up and flow check well - well static. Begin to pull out of the hole in the 16" casing shoe to repair top drive. TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA in 14.8 ppg SBM from 22;022' MD to 17;930' MD.
"},{"   ":35,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-27","TEXT_REMARK":"03/27/2016: Install new saver sub and new lower IBOP on top drive. Hole building angle without PowerDrive being able to correct to vertical.

03/28/2016: Pulled out of hole (POOH) with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 22;688' MD wet to 18;173' MD. POOH from 18;173' MD to surface. Picked up (P/U) new bit and reamer and made up (M/U) 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. TIH from surface to 7;433' MD with 15.0 ppg surface MW.

03/29/2016: TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" drilling BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 7;433' MD to 22;548' MD. Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 22;548' MD to 23;874' MD with 15.0 ppg MW. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Function tested BOP from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test.

03/30/2016: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 23;847' MD to 25;551' MD. Spotted 20 bbls 16.0 ppg heavy pill in rathole. Pulled above heavy pill and circulated bottoms up. Flow checked - static. POOH from 25;363' MD to 19;984' MD with 15.0 ppg surface MW.

03/31/2016: POOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 19;984' MD to surface. Ran in hole (RIH) with wireline caliper to 11;500' MD and log up to 5;000' MD with 3 passes. POOH with wireline to surface with 15.0 ppg MW. 

04/1/2016: Picked up (P/U) and ran 14" casing from deck in doubles from surface to 7;679' MD with 15.0 ppg MW. 

Note: Mr. Jay Preskitt (BSEE) granted Mr. Steven Scruggs verbal approval for the updated WCST to reflect 14" casing being set in 15.3 ppg Downhole MW.

04/2/2016: P/U liner hanger and RIH from 7;743' MD to 25;400' MD. M/U cement stand and slacked off liner shoe to 25;434' MD with 15.0 ppg surface MW/ 15.3 ppg DH MW. 

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Steven Scruggs approval for a 24 hr BOP pressure test extension.
"},{"   ":36,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-03","TEXT_REMARK":"04/03/2016: Circulated well prior to cement job with 15.0 ppg SBM. Flow checked; well static. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 14" hanger setting tool and landing string to 17;527' MD while monitoring well on trip tank; well static. Circulated landing string with 15.0 ppg SBM. TOH with 14" hanger setting tool and landing string to 10;774' MD while monitoring well on trip tank; well static. Spaced out and pressure tested BOP with 15.0 ppg SBM to 250 psi/ 8;900 psi from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; on 6-5/8" drill pipe (DP). Monitored well on trip tank and BOP pressure transducer; well static. 

04/04/2016: Completed pressure testing BOP rams on 6-5/8" DP with 15.0 ppg to SBM to 250 psi/ 8;900 psi. Pressure test BOP annular on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi/ 5;900 psi - successful test. TOH with 14" hanger setting tool and landing string to 4;411' MD while monitoring well on trip tank; well static. Function tested BSR/Casing Shear Rams (CSR) from Toolpusher's Pane; Blue Pod - successful test. TOH with 14" hanger setting tool and landing string to 1;036' MD while monitoring well on trip tank; well static.

04/05/2016: Continued TOH with 14" hanger setting tool and landing string to surface while monitoring well on trip tank; well static. Spaced out and pressure tested BOP rams to 250 psi/ 8;900 psi with 15.0 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; on 5-7/8" DP - successful test. Pressure test BOP annular on 5-7/8" DP to 250 psi/ 5;900 psi - successful test. Performed diverter function test from Driller's Panel - successful test. Performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. 

04/06/2016: Continued TIH with 12-1/4" x 15" BHA to 25;259' MD in 15.0 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement; well static. Tagged top of cement at 25;259' MD. Drilled out cement; rathole and 10' of new formation from 25;259' MD to 25;561' MD while weighting up to 15.4 ppg SBM. POOH with 12-1/4" x 15" BHA from 25;561' MD to 25;389' MD.

04/07/2016: Performed Formation Integrity Test (FIT) with 15.4 ppg SBM and surface pressure of 1;190 psi for a 16.3 ppg surface equivalent mud weight (EMW)/ 16.57 ppg downhole EMW - successful test. Drilled from 25;561' MD to 26;112' MD; dropped reamer activation ball and pull tested reamer in 15.4 ppg SBM. Drilled ahead 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 25;661' MD to 26;125' MD with 15.4 ppg surface MW. Drilled 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 26;125' MD to 26;210' MD with 15.4 ppg SBM Surface MW - approximately 15.67 ppg DH MW. 

04/08/2016: Continued to CBU with 15.4 ppg SBM. Drilled 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 26;210' MD to 26;409' MD with 15.4 ppg SBM. Flow checked; observed initial gain of 1.4 bbls. P/U to 26;377' MD for hang off position - observed an additional 2.5 bbl gain. Total gain 3.9 bbls. Shut in well with hard shut in on upper annular from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. Monitored riser on trip tank; riser static. Monitored choke line pressure; initial reading of 0 psi; raising to final pressure of 220 psi. Observed communication between DP and casing indicating that float is open. Unable to get true shut in drill pipe pressure (SIDPP). Estimated SIDPP of 196 psi. Started first circulation of the Driller's method by circulating 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring pressures. Monitored riser on trip tank; riser static.

04/09/2016: Continued performing first circulation of Driller's method while monitoring pressures on well. Perform second circulation of Drillers method by pumping kill weight mud (15.6 ppg surface MW SBM) while maintaining bottom hole pressure.
"},{"   ":37,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-10","TEXT_REMARK":"04/10/2016: Complete well kill operation with the second circulation of the Driller's method using 15.6 ppg (SBM). Sweep BOP stack and begin circulating bottoms up. Continue bottoms up to 1;500' below the BOP and flow check - well static. Continue circulating bottoms up.

04/11/2016: Complete second bottoms up. POOH and space out at BOP. Function tested BOP from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel - successful test. Trip in hole to bottom and drill 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 26;409' MD to 26;635' MD with 15.6 ppg SBM. Observed drilling break and decrease in pump pressure. Picked up off bottom and performed flow check. Gained 6 bbls over 6 min. Shut well in and monitored pressures. Shut in casing pressure (SICP) = 90 psi; drill pipe pressure (SIDPP) = 70 psi. Began well kill; utilizing wait and weight method; circulating 15.7 ppg kill mud weight (KMW). 

04/12/2016: Continued performing wait and weight well kill method with 15.7 ppg KMW. 

04/13/2016: Completed well kill operations using wait and weight method with 15.7 ppg KMW. Flow checked well - well static. Drilled ahead 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 26;635' MD to 26;770' MD with 15.7 ppg surface SBM. 

04/14/2016: Continued to drill the 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 26;770' MD to 27;452' MD with 15.7 ppg SBM. 

04/15/2016: Continued to drill the 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 27;452' MD to 28;072' MD with 15.7 ppg SBM. 

04/16/2016: Drilled 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 28;072' MD to 28;115' MD with 15.7 ppg SBM. Flow checked well on trip tank - gained 3.6 bbls in 30 min with trend slowing to 0.1 bbl/min. Shut well in and monitored pressures. SICP = 0 psi; which confirmed ballooning. Tripped back to bottom and drilled the 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 28;115' MD to 28;513' MD with 15.7 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":38,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-17","TEXT_REMARK":"No Wireline Logs Run 04/17/2016: Drill 12-1/4" x 15" hole section from 28;513' MD to 28;772' MD with 15.7 ppg SBM - DHMW approximately 15.95 ppg. Circulated SBM and observed pit gain. Flow checked well on trip tank - gained 9.7 bbs in 20 minutes. Shut in well and monitored pressures. Casing pressure (CP) rose to 50 psi. Bleed off to mini trip tank in stages with pressure trending same since well previously ballooning. Bleed .2 bbls in 15 minutes. Shut in well and monitored pressures with CP building back to 50 psi. Bleed off 3.7 bbls in 69 minutes to mini trip tank trending same. Shut in well and monitored pressures. Shut in casing pressure (SICP) = 120 psi; drill pipe pressure (SIDPP) = 35 psi. Total pit gain = 20 bbls. Began well kill operation with first circulation of the Driller's method. 

04/18/2016: Complete well kill operations with first circulation of the Driller's method with 15.7 ppg SBM surface MW. Shut in well and monitored pressures. Flow checked well - well static. Perform BOP gas sweep as per rig specific procedure. 

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) communicated approval for the postponement of BOP function test; BSR/CSR function tests; and BOP pressure test under reference of CFR 250.451(c) to Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron).

04/19/2016: Complete BOP gas sweeping as per rig specific procedure. Flow check well - well static. Circulate bottoms up with 15.7 ppg SBM. Pump out of hole from 28;772' MD to 25;316' MD. Circulate bottoms up with 15.7 ppg SBM. Flow check well on trip tank - gained 9.2 bbls in 17 minutes. Shut in well and monitored pressures. Shut in casing pressure (SICP) is 100 psi. Pump 500 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Monitor well on trip tank - 1.2 bbl/hr loss rate observed.

04/20/2016: Trip in hole (TIH) from 25;316' MD to 28;726' MD. Commence well kill operations with the first circulation of the Driller's method with 15.7 ppg mud. 

04/21/2016: Completed well kill operations with the first circulation of the Driller's method with 15.7 ppg SBM. Flow checked well - well static. Boost 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap out by displacing marine riser to 15.7 ppg SBM. Perform BOP gas sweep as per rig specific procedure. Flow check well - well static. 

04/22/2016: Circulate 1.5 bottoms up with 15.7 ppg SBM. Flow check well - observed 1.2 bbl/hr loss rate. Pump 380 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Flow check well - observed 3 bbl/hr loss rate. POOH from 28;754' MD to 19;298' MD with proper displacement.

04/23/2016: POOH from 19;298' MD to 16;097' MD. Pressure test BOPs with 15.7 ppg SBM to 250 psi/ 9;800 psi from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; on 6-5/8" drill pipe (DP) - good test. Sweep BOP for trapped gas following BOP pressure test. Flow check well - well static. Begin displacing riser with 15.7 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":39,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-24","TEXT_REMARK":"04/24/2016: Complete displacement of marine riser with 15.7 ppg SBM. Pump 507 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Flow checked well - 1.2 bbl/hr loss rate observed. TOH from 16;078' MD to 5;280' MD. Flow check well prior to BHA crossing the BOP - 1.2 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Continue TOH from 5;280' MD to 4;026' MD. Function BSR/CSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Function diverter from Driller's Panel - good test. TOH from 4;026' MD to surface. Total SBM lost to formation 49 bbls.

04/25/2016: M/U 12-1/4" x 15" BHA and TIH from surface to 4;455' MD; monitoring well on trip tank - proper displacement observed. Function BSR/CSR on Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. Function diverter on Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Flow check well with BHA above the BOP - well static. Continue TIH from 4;455' MD to 5;736' MD; monitoring well on trip tank - proper displacement observed. Pressure test BOP with 15.7 ppg SBM to 250 psi/ 9;800 psi from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; on 5-7/8" drill pipe (DP) - good test. Monitor wellbore pressure with annular closed to determine riser cap required over balance. Total SBM lost to formation 49 bbls.

04/26/2016: Simulated riser cap by pumping 41.5 bbls of 18.5 ppg into the choke line with annular closed. Exposed the choke line to the wellbore and monitored for losses - well static. Pumped an additional 5.0 bbls into choke line for a total of 46.5 bbls 18.5 ppg SBM simulated riser cap. Exposed choke line to the wellbore - 2.4 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Pump 750 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Flow checked well - 186 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Shut in well and begin displacing marine riser and choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Pump down drill string with 15.7 ppg SBM to convert the float to prevent pressure from riser cap to cause U-tubing up the drill string. Total SBM lost to formation 49 bbls.

04/27/2016: Simulated riser cap by pumping 46.5 bbls of 18.5 ppg SBM into the choke line with cement unit with annular closed. Exposed the choke line to the wellbore and monitored for losses - 102 bbl/hr losses observed. Reverse out 18.5 ppg SBM from choke line until acceptable loss rate achieved. Achieved 15 bbl/hr loss rate with 39.5 bbls of 18.5 ppg SBM spotted in choke line. Pump 655 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Flow checked well - 23 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Pumped 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser until 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap bottomed 150' above BOP. Exposed riser cap to wellbore with closed annular and monitored losses on trip tank - 26 bbl/hr losses observed. Close annular and displace marine riser and choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Simulated riser cap by pumping 38 bbls of 18.5 ppg into the kill line with cement unit with annular closed. Exposed the kill line to the wellbore and monitored for losses - 13.4 bbl/hr losses observed. Reverse out 18.5 ppg SBM from kill line until 33.5 bbl 18.5 ppg SBM simulated riser cap in kill line and exposed to wellbore with annular closed - 2.8 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Flush choke and kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Begin pumping 556 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Total SBM lost to formation 88 bbls.
 
04/28/2016: Finish pumping 556 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Expose riser cap to wellbore with annular closed - 7.2 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Pump 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser to put riser cap 500' above the BOP. Expose riser cap to wellbore - 7.4 bbl/hr losses. Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 15" BHA from 5;756' MD to 11;120' MD monitoring losses on trip tank - 9.8 bbl/hr losses observed. Continue TIH from 11;120' MD to 14;060' MD. Flow check and monitor for losses - 4.8 bbl/hr observed. Continued TIH from 14;060' MD to 16;733' MD. Flow check well at 16;733' MD - 24 bbl/hr losses observed. Close annular and displace marine riser and choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Simulated riser cap by pumping 33.5 bbls of 18.5 ppg into the kill line with cement unit with annular closed. Exposed the kill line to the wellbore and monitored for losses - 4.0 bbl/hr losses observed. Reverse out 18.5 ppg SBM from kill line until 18.5 bbl 18.5 ppg SBM simulated riser cap in kill line and exposed to wellbore with annular closed - 2.2 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Flush choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Total SBM lost to formation 233 bbls.

04/29/2016: Pump 508 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Pumped 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser until 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap bottomed 100' above BOP. Exposed riser cap to wellbore with closed annular and monitored losses on trip tank - 2.4 bbl/hr losses observed. Pumped 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser until 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap bottomed 500' above BOP. Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 15" BHA from 16;733' MD to 19;433' MD; monitoring losses on trip tank - 28 bbl/hr losses observed. Close annular and displace marine riser and choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Simulated riser cap by pumping 31.5 bbls of 18.5 ppg into the kill line with cement unit with annular closed. Exposed the kill line to the wellbore and monitored for losses - 26 bbl/hr losses observed. Reverse out 18.5 ppg SBM from kill line until 16.5 bbl 18.5 ppg SBM simulated riser cap in kill line and exposed to wellbore with annular closed - 3.0 bbl/hr loss rate observed. Flush choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Simulated riser cap by pumping 16.5 bbls of 18.5 ppg SBM into the kill line with cement unit with annular closed. Exposed the kill line to the wellbore and monitored for losses - 0.6 bbl/hr losses observed. Flush choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Pump 266 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Pumped 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser until 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap bottomed 500' above BOP. Flow check well and monitored for losses - 0.6 bbl/hr losses observed. Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 15" BHA from 19;433' MD to 22;378' MD. Total SBM lost to formation 408 bbls.

04/30/2016: Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 15" BHA from 22;378' MD to 25;156' MD. Flow check well and monitored for losses - 2.0 bbl/hr losses observed. Performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; on 6-5/8" drill pipe - good test. Performed diverter function test on Driller's Panel. Pumped 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser until 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap bottomed 628' above BOP. Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 15" BHA from 25;156' MD to 26;303' MD. Flow check well and monitor for losses - 42 bbl/hr losses observed. Close annular and displace marine riser and choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Simulated riser cap by pumping 11.5 bbls of 18.5 ppg SBM simulated riser cap in kill line. Exposed the kill line to the wellbore and monitored for losses - 2.0 bbl/hr losses observed. Flushed choke/kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Pump 186 bbl riser cap of 18.5 ppg SBM in marine riser. Pumped 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser until 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap bottomed 100' above BOP. Flow check well and monitor for losses - 4.8 bbl/hr losses observed. Pumped 15.7 ppg SBM into marine riser until 18.5 ppg SBM riser cap bottomed 1;000' above BOP. Continue TIH from 26;303' MD to 28;404' MD. Boost riser cap out of hole while monitoring riser cap pressure on kill line. Begin pumping down drill string at 10 - 20 SPM; 30 RPMs. Continue displacing riser cap with boost pump while pumping down drill string managing losses. Total SBM lost to formation 1;017 bbls.
"},{"   ":40,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-01","TEXT_REMARK":"05/01/2016: Pump 105 bbl LCM pill down drill string. Displaced pill with 15.7 ppg SBM while rotating and reciprocating drill string. Observed no returns on the trip tank. Pump 125 bbl LCM pill down drill string. Displaced pill with 15.7 ppg SBM while rotating and reciprocating the drill string. Observed increasing returns from 0% to 7%. Pump 100 bbl coarse LCM pill down drill string. Displaced pill with 15.7 ppg SBM while rotating and reciprocating drill string. Staged up the pumps to 300 gpm to obtain pressure while drilling (PWD) readings. Observed increasing returns from 7% to 81%. While circulating; noticed gain of 24 bbls in active pits. Shut down and shut in on annular. Monitored well on kill line and allow to pressures to stabilize; Kill 190 psi; Choke 214 psi; and DP 205 psi. Opened up on choke line as static line to monitor pressure. Start bleeding back well through kill line in 2 bbl increments to establish ballooning trend. Total bled back 34 bbls. Total SBM lost to formation 2;627 bbls.

05/02/2016: Continued bleeding off volume in 5 to 10 bbl increments to the trip tank and let pressure stabilize. Bled back a total of 172.5 bbls. Final kill line pressure was 172 psi; final drill pipe pressure was 211 psi. Spot simulated riser cap down kill line; 30 bbl (1;525' - 218 psi) equivalent riser cap. Observed 0.48 bbl/hr loss rate. Flush out simulated riser cap from Kill line. Spot 484 bbls (1;525' - 216 psi) riser cap. Flow check; well static. Wash to bottom from 28;485' MD to 28;773' MD; no fill on bottom. Pump out of rathole from 28;773' MD to 28;485' MD. Trip out of hole (TOH) from 28;485' MD to 28;275' MD. Shut down trip; hole not taking correct displacement. Flow check well static. Pump additional 116 bbl (365' - 52 psi) 18.5 riser cap (total 270 psi riser cap). Pump out of hole from 28;275' MD to 27;190' MD. Observed loss rate increase to 70 bbl/hr. Shut in annular. Circulate out riser cap in controlled increments to reduce hydrostatic burden to control losses. Total SBM lost to formation 200 bbls.

05/03/2016: Continue to circulate out riser cap in controlled increments. Total riser cap volume removed 291 bbls; leaving 309 bbls of riser cap. Open annular and observed loss rate of 13 bbl/hr. TOH from 27;190' MD to 26;480' MD. Observe increasing loss rate on trip tank to 95 bbl/hour. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out additional 55 bbl of riser cap. Open lower annular and observed loss rate of 7.5 bbl/hr. Pump out of hole from 26;480' MD to 26;038' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 44 bbl/hr. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out riser cap until 15.7 ppg SBM in and out. Flush choke and kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Spot simulated riser cap down kill line; 40 bbl (2;098' - 300 psi) equivalent riser cap. Observed 4.0 bbl/hr loss rate. Flush out simulated riser cap from Kill line. Spot 665 bbls (2;098' - 300 psi) riser cap. Observed 92 bbl/hr loss rate with open annular to wellbore. Boost out 111 bbls of riser cap; leaving 554 bbls (1;746' - 250 psi). Observed 4 bbl/hr loss rate. TOH from 26;038' MD to 23;427' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 245 bbl/hr. Boost out 145 bbl of riser cap; leaving 409 bbls riser cap (1;289' - 181 psi). Observed 14 bbl/hr losses. Total SBM lost to formation 301 bbls.

05/04/2016: TOH with 12-1/4" x 15" drilling assy from 23;427' MD to 13;420' MD. Monitor well on trip tank; proper displacement observed. Boost out riser cap. Spot 450 bbls (1;418' - 202 psi) 18.5 ppg riser cap 500' above BOPs. Monitor well - static. From top side; filled the riser with 120 bbls 18.5 ppg while u-tubing back into the choke line. Total riser cap 570 bbls (1;796' - 257 psi). Monitor well - static. TOH from 13;420' MD to 12;781' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 54 bbl/hr. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out 60 bbls of riser cap leaving 510 bbls (1;607' - 230 psi) of riser cap. Observed 8 bbl/hr loss rate. TOH from 12;781' MD to 12;271' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 50 bbl/hr. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out 40 bbl of riser cap; leaving 470 bbls (1;481' - 210 psi) of riser cap. TOH from 12;271' MD to 10;860' MD. Total SBM lost to formation 95 bbls.

Note: Received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 05/04/2016 to delay Casing and BSR pressure test by a period of 3 days.

Note: Received verbal approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 05/04/2016 to run 11-7/8" liner shallow due to losses in wellbore.

05/05/2016: TOH from 10;860' MD to 5;736' MD. Flow check - well static. Continue TOH from 5;736' MD to 500' above BOP. Shut in on BSR and displace riser cap out until 15.7 ppg SBM in and out. Continue TOH from 500' above BOP to surface. BSR remain closed; monitor well on choke for pressures. Pick up and run in hole (RIH) with 11-7/8" liner from surface to 706' MD. Monitor trip tank; proper displacement observed. Total SBM lost to formation 18 bbls.

05/06/2016: RIH with 11-7/8" liner from 706' MD to 3;782' MD. BSR remain closed. Monitor riser on trip tank; static. Pick up and make up liner hanger. RIH on landing string from 3;782' MD to 3;918' MD. BSR closed. Spot 360 bbls (1;615' - 228 psi) of 18.5 ppg riser cap with boost line. Open BSR; monitor well on trip tank and observed 2 bbl/hr loss rate. RIH from 3;918' MD to 4;046' MD. Boost riser to replace 33 bbls of u-tube volume; pump 200 bbls of 18.5 ppg slug in landing string. TIH with 11-7/8" liner on landing string from 4;046' MD to 10;070' MD while boosting riser at 2.5 bbl/min with no returns to maintain riser cap position. Perform flow check at 10;070'; 115 bbl/hr loss observed. Close lower annular. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's Panel. Flush choke and kill lines with 15.7 ppg SBM. Boost out 180 bbls of riser cap; leaving 180 bbls (677' - 97 psi) of riser cap. Observed 11 bbl/hr loss rate. TIH with 11-7/8" liner on landing string from 10;070' to 10;413' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 125 bbl/hr. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out 30 bbl of riser cap; leaving 150 bbl (473' - 68 psi) riser cap. Observed 1.2 bbl/hr loss rate. Total SBM lost to formation 860 bbls.

05/07/2016: TIH with 11-7/8" liner on landing string from 10;413' MD to 10;542' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 100 bbl/hr. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out 30 bbl pf riser cap; leaving 120 bbl (381' - 54 psi) riser cap. Observed 3.0 bbl/hr loss rate. TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 10;542' MD to 10;717' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 100 bbl/hr. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out 60 bbls of riser cap; leaving 60 bbl (190' - 27 psi) riser cap. Observed well static. TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 10;717' MD to 10;926' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 100 bbl/hr. Shut in on lower annular. Boost out remaining 60 bbls of riser cap; leaving no riser cap. Observed well - static. TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 10;926' MD to 12;850' MD. Monitor on trip tank; observed over steel displacement. Close annular. Monitor choke line pressure 60 psi. Spot 135 bbls (425' - 60 psi) of 18.5 ppg riser cap. Observed well static. Function test BOP from Blue Pod; Driller's Panel. TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 12;850' MD to 19;812' MD. Observed increasing loss rate on trip tank to 25 bbl/hr. Boost out 135 bbls of riser cap; leaving no riser cap. TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 19;812' MD to 22;084' MD. Monitor on trip tank; observed over steel displacement. Shut in on lower annular. Spot 66 bbls (208' - 30 psi) of 18.5 ppg riser cap. Observed well static. TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 22;084' MD to 22;968' MD. Total SBM lost to formation 953 bbls.

Note: Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted an additional 48 hour deferral for pressure testing casing and BSR.
"},{"   ":41,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-08","TEXT_REMARK":"05/08/2016: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 11-7/8" liner on from 22;968' MD to 23;698' MD. Monitored well on trip tank; observed 8 bbl over displacement. Shut in on lower annular. Boosted out 66 bbls (208' - 30 psi) of 18.5 ppg riser cap to surface. Spotted 173 bbl (545' - 77 psi) 18.5 ppg riser cap to 1;000' from surface. Flow checked well on trip tank - well static. Continued TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 23;698' MD to 28;757' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - averaging 9 bbl loss per stand. Cemented 11-7/8" liner with 121 bbls (679 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement. Displaced cement with 15.7 ppg synthetic based mud (SBM). Set and tested 11-7/8" hanger at 25;004' MD. Total SBM lost to formation 408 bbls. 

05/09/2016: Circulated landing string with 15.7 ppg SBM. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 11-7/8" hanger setting tool and landing string to surface while monitoring well on trip tank; well static. TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA to 582' MD. Function tested Blind Shear Rams (BSR)/ Casing Shear Rams (CSR) from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - successful test. Began pressure testing 11-7/8" casing with 15.7 ppg SBM to 250 psi 5 min low test - successful test. 

Note: Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted approval to delay BOP pressure test by an additional 24 hours to May 10; 2016.

05/10/2016: Completed pressure testing 11-7/8" liner against BSR with 15.7 ppg SBM to 2;000 psi for 30 min - successful test. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - successful test. Continued TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 582' MD to 5;859' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Spaced out and performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. Pressure tested BOP rams to 250 psi/ 9;800 psi with 15.7 ppg SBM/ 16.0 ppg DH MW from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; on 5-7/8" drill pipe (DP) - successful test.

05/11/2016: TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 5;859' M to 16;011' MD while monitoring well on a trip tank - well static. Pressure tested BOP rams to 250 psi/ 9;800 psi on 6-5/8" DP from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; with 15.7 ppg SBM - successful test. Continued TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 16;011' MD to 28;271' MD while monitoring well on a trip tank - well static. Tagged top of cement at 28;566' MD. Drilled cement from 28;566' MD to 28;656' MD. 

05/12/2016: Continued drilling shoe track with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA in 15.7 ppg SBM from 28;656' MD to 28;752' MD. Washed 12-1/4" rathole to 28;772' MD. Performed Formation Integrity Test/ Leak off Test with 15.8 ppg SBM and surface pressure of 711 psi for a 16.2 ppg surface equivalent mud weight (EMW)/ 16.43 ppg downhole EMW - successful test. Drilled ahead from 28;772' MD to 29;064' MD.

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) approved a 0.3 ppg drilling margin between DH EMW and the lesser of DH LOT and formation FG for the 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" interval as long as ECD does not exceed DH LOT or formation FG for the interval; and that the PWD monitoring is operational during drilling of this hole section.

05/13/2016: Continued drilling ahead with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 29;064' MD to 29;670' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. 

05/14/2016: Continued drilling ahead with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 29;670' MD to 30;050' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":42,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-15","TEXT_REMARK":"05/15/2016: Drill ahead with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 30;335' MD to 30;610' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM - DHMW 16.0 ppg. Circulate bottoms up with 15.8 ppg SBM. Continue drilling ahead from 30;610' MD to 30;698' MD.

05/16/2016: Continue drilling ahead with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 30;698' MD to 31;139' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM.

05/17/2016: Continue drilling ahead with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 31;139' MD to 31;149' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Flow check well - well static. Activate 12-1/4" lower reamer and ream rathole from 30;970' MD to 31;114' MD. Circulate bottoms up with 15.8 ppg SBM. Flow check well - well static. Pull out of hole (POOH) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 31;149' MD to 28;655' MD. Flow check well - well static. Perform BOP function test from Toolpushers Panel; Yellow Pod - good test.

05/18/2016: Perform diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel. Continue POOH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 28;655' MD to surface in 15.8 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well taking proper displacement. Rig up 9-3/8" casing handling equipment. 

Note: On 05/18/2016; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave verbal approval to run 9-3/8" casing.

05/19/2016: Pick up and run in hole (RIH) with 9-3/8" liner from surface to 278' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Perform function test of BSR/CSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Continue RIH with 9-3/8" liner from 278' MD to 2;750' MD. Pick up and make up liner hanger. RIH with 9-3/8" liner on landing string from 2;750' MD to 24;711' MD. 

05/20/2016: Continue to RIH with 9-3/8" liner from 24;711' MD to 31;149' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Pick up 5' to 9-3/8" liner setting depth of 31;144' MD. Cement 9-3/8" liner with 100 bbls (562 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg slurry. Displace cement with 15.8 ppg SBM. Set and test 9-3/8" hanger at 28;363' MD. POOH with hanger setting tool and landing string from 28;317' MD to 28;062' MD. Circulate landing string with 15.8 ppg SBM.

05/21/2016: Continue to circulate landing string with 15.8 ppg SBM. Flow check well - well static. POOH with 9-3/8" hanger setting tool and landing string from 28;062' MD to 6;301' MD.
"},{"   ":43,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-22","TEXT_REMARK":"05/22/2016: Continue POOH with 9-3/8" hanger setting tool and landing string in 15.8 ppg SBM from 6;301' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Pressure tested Kelly hose with 15.8 SBM per IPT test #20 from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; to 250 psi/ 6;500 psi - good test. Lined up to complete IPT test #21 on Upper IBOP and could not hold pressure from cement unit. Began troubleshooting to determine source of leak at surface while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. 

05/23/2016: Perform pressure test on 9-3/8" liner against the Blind Shear Rams with 15.8 ppg SBM to 250 psi/ 1;400 psi from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Performed IPT tests #21; #22; and #23 on the Upper Auto IBOP; Lower Auto IBOP; and Manual IBOP to 250 psi/ 11;600 psi with 15.8 ppg SBM and rig fresh water utilizing subsea test pump - good test. M/U 8-1/2" BHA and TIH from surface to 7;914' MD and spaced out to pressure test BOP on 5" DP. Pressure test BOP on 5" DP with 15.8 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod. Completed IPT tests #24; #25; #26 and #27 to 250 psi/ 9;800 psi - good tests.

05/24/2016: Continued pressure testing BOP on 5" DP with 15.8 ppg SBM. Completed IPT tests #28 and #29 to 250 psi/ 9;800 psi - good tests. Completed IPT tests #34; #35 and #36 to 250 psi/ 5;700 psi - good tests. Continue TIH with 8-1/2" BHA from 7;914' MD to 20;785' MD. Pressure tested BOP on 6-5/8" DP with 15.8 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod. Performed IPT tests #34; #35 and #36 on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi/ 9;800 psi - good tests. Function diverter from Driller's Panel. Continue TIH from 20;785' MD to 30;766' MD. Begin washing down from 30;766' MD to 30;908' MD. Tag top of cement at 30;908' MD. Perform flow check on well - well static. Begin displacing well from 15.8 ppg SBM to 15.4 ppg SBM. 

05/25/2016: Continue displacing well from 15.8 ppg SBM to 15.4 ppg SBM. Flow check well - well static. Washed down to TOC and performed choke drills - good drill. Began drilling cement from 30;908' MD to 31;144' MD. Wash and ream rathole from 31;144' MD to 31;149' MD. Drill 8.5" hole section from 31;149' MD to 31;151' MD with 15.4 ppg SBM.

05/26/2016: Drill 8.5" hole section from 31;151' MD to 31;159' MD. Spaced out in 9-3/8" shoe and performed FIT with 15.4 ppg SBM with 1;298 psi applied at surface for a 16.2 ppg EMW surface / 16.52 ppg downhole equivalent MW - good test. Continue drilling 8.5" hole section with 15.4 ppg SBM from 31;159' MD to 31;444' MD. Begin circulating bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM. Core point picked at 31;444' MD.

05/27/2016: Continue circulating bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM. Flow check well before TOH - well static. TOH with 8-1/2" BHA from 31;444' MD to 15;902 MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well taking proper displacements. While TOH; 1 stand from 15;902' MD to 15;769' MD; noticed slight gain in trip tank. Stabbed TIW valve and performed flow check on trip tank - well static. Continue TOH with 8-1/2" BHA from 15;769' MD to 6;173' MD and perform flow check - well static. Conduct well control drill while tripping - good drill. Continue TOH from 6;173' MD to 343' MD. 

05/28/2016: Continue TOH with 8-1/2" BHA from 343' MD to surface. L/D 8-1/2" drilling BHA. M/U 8-1/2" Coring BHA and TIH with same from surface to 17;055' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM (surface MW) while monitoring well on trip tank - well static.
