"},{"   ":46,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-12","TEXT_REMARK":"06/12/2016: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 8-1/2" coring assembly #5 in 15.4 ppg SBM from surface to 29;098' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static.

06/13/2016: Continued TIH with 8-1/2" coring assembly #5 in 15.4 ppg SBM from 29;098' MD to 32;002' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Cored with 8-1/2" coring assembly #5 from 32;002' MD to 32;253' MD. Performed flow check - well static. Pumped out of hole to 9-3/8" shoe. Circulated bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM. Performed flow check - well static. 

06/14/2016: Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 8-1/2" coring assembly #5 in 15.4 ppg SBM to 12;928' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static.  Performed BOP function test from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and Diverter function test from Driller's Panel - successful tests. Continued TOH with 8-1/2" coring assembly #5 in 15.4 ppg SBM from 12;928' MD to 1;099' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. 

06/15/2016: TOH with 8-1/2" coring assembly #5 in 15.4 ppg SBM from 1;099' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Function test BSRs/CSRs from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. TIH with 8-1/2" drilling BHA in 15.4 ppg SBM from surface to 17;433' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. 

06/16/2016: Continued TIH with 8-1/2" drilling BHA in 15.4 ppg SBM from 17;433' MD to 32;253' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Drill 8-1/2" hole section with 15.4 ppg SBM from 32;253' MD to 32;440' MD.

06/17/2016: Continued drilling 8-1/2" hole section with 15.4 ppg SBM from 32;440' MD to 33;320' MD. 

06/18/2016: Continued drilling 8-1/2" hole section with 15.4 ppg SBM from 33;320' MD to 34;022' MD. Circulated bottoms up to evaluate formation cuttings. Identified Midway shale at bottoms up. Well TD'd.
"},{"   ":47,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-19","TEXT_REMARK":"06/19/2016: Circulated bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM to evaluate formation cuttings. Performed static influx test and circulated bottoms up. Performed flow check - well static. Tripped out of hole with 8-1/2" drilling BHA from 34;022' MD to 32;550' MD. Pumped out of hole from 32;550' MD to 31;104' MD. Performed flow check - well static. Tripped out of hole with 8-1/2" drilling BHA from 31;104' MD to 22;044' MD.

06/20/2016: Tripped out of hole in 15.4 ppg SBM with 8-1/2" drilling BHA from 22;044' MD to 5;000' MD. Washed wellhead and BOPs. Tripped out of hole with 8-1/2" drilling BHA to surface. Tripped in hole with BOP test assembly. Pressure tested BOPs on Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; on 5" drill pipe to 250 psi low/ 9;900 psi high with 15.4 ppg SBM - good test.

Note: On 06/20/2016 @ 8:12 hrs; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written notification to Steven Scruggs (Chevron) that Chevron may delay casing evaluation for a period of seven days; at which time we will require an update of progress and discuss further extensions.

06/21/2016: Continued pressure testing BOPs from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; to 250 psi low/ 9;900 psi high on 5" & 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.4 ppg SBM - good test. BOP test assembly would not pass lower annular; possibly because the element had not relaxed to the point where it could pass a full bore tool (BOPTT OD = 18.60") or potentially due to debris. Tripped out of hole to surface with BOP test assembly. Performed diverter; blind shear ram and casing shear ram function tests from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test.

06/22/2016: Changed out drill line spool on main block. Performed derrick inspection.

Note: On 06/22/2016 @ 15:42 hrs; Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided written approval to
delay the BSR pressure test by 24 hrs until the RTTS can be set.

06/23/2016: Changed out drill line spool on main block. Tripped in hole with Retrievable Test; Treat; and Squeeze (RTTS) packer to 6;500' MD. 

Note: On 06/23/2016 @ 17:25 hrs; Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided written approval to delay the BSR pressure test by an additional 24 hrs or until the RTTS can be set; whichever is first.

06/24/2016: Set RTTS at 5;220' MD and pulled above BOP. Pressure tested BSR to 250 psi low/ 1;400 psi high on Yellow Pod from the Driller's Panel with 15.4 ppg SBM - good test. Function tested casing shear ram from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. Tripped in hole to latch back into RTTS pull free. Tripped out of hole with RTTS from 6;493' MD to surface. Rig up wireline equipment. Ran in hole with wire run #1 triple combo to 31;160' MD and log down from 31;160' MD to 34;055' MD. Log up from 34;055' MD to 31;160' MD. Pulled out of hole with wireline from 31;160' MD to 27;000' MD. 

06/25/2016: Pull out of hole with wireline run #1 from 27;000' MD/ 26;986' TVD to surface. Make up and run in hole with wireline run #2 and log from 30;900' MD to 34;055' MD. Log up from 34;055' MD to 31;149' MD. Relog section from 31;149' MD to 33;800' MD. Log up from 33;800 to 31;149' MD. Pull out of hole with log run #2 from 31;149' MD to surface.
"},{"   ":48,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-26","TEXT_REMARK":"06/26/2016: Made up and ran in hole with wireline run #3 (CMR/ECS/HNGS) in 15.4 ppg SBM. Performed uplog from 33;655' MD to 31;100' MD. Pulled out of hole (POOH) with log run #3 from 31;100' MD to surface. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

06/27/2016: Ran in hole with wireline run #4 (GR/MDT)from surface to 31;331' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Logged from 31;331' MD to 33;179' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

06/28/2016: Continued logging with wireline run #4 (GR/MDT) from 33;179' MD to 31;739' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

Mr. Justin Ledet Drilling Engineer Houma District BSEE provided written notification to Chevron Drilling Engineer Justin Cremer that Chevron may delay BOP functions; diverter functions; and casing pressure test for seven days or until wireline runs are completed; whichever occurs first. No workstrings may be run across the stack without tests being completed.

06/29/2016: Continued logging with wireline run #4 (GR/MDT) from 31;739' MD to 32;309' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

06/30/2016: Completed wireline run #4 (GR/MDT) sampling and POOH. Ran in hole with wireline run #5 (GR/MSCT) in 15.4 ppg SBM. POOH from 9;200' on run #5 (GR/MSCT) due to SLB tool failure. Swap out Gamma Ray/Cartridge Tool. Ran in hole with wireline run #5 (GR/MSCT) from surface to 33;500' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

07/01/2016: Continued with wireline run #5 (GR/MSCT) from 33;500' MD to 31;320' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. POOH with wireline to 28;000' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

07/02/2016: Completed wireline run #5 (GR/RSCT) and POOH. Ran in hole with wireline run #6 (GR/VSP) to 29;900' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. POOH with wireline run #6 (GR/VSP) from 29;900' MD to surface due to telemetry issues. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.
 "},{"   ":49,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-03","TEXT_REMARK":"07/03/2016: Ran in hole with wireline run #6 (GR/VSP) from surface to 29;253' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Performed uplog from 29;253' MD to 4;800' MD. Pulled out of hole (POOH) with wireline run #6 from to surface. Ran in hole with run #7 (14"/16" casing caliper) from surface to 20;000' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

07/04/2016: Ran in hole with run #7 (14"/16" casing caliper) from 20;000' MD to 25;005' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Logged 14" and 16" casing from 25;505' MD to 5;126' MD. POOH with wireline run #7 to surface. Ran in hole with run #8 (23" casing caliper) from surface to 5;126' MD. Logged 23" casing from 5;126' MD to 4;805' MD. POOH with run #8 to surface. Tripped in hole (TIH) with 5" mule shoe assembly to 2;563' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Function tested Blind Shear Rams (BSR)/ Casing Shear Rams (CSR) from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. Performed diverter function test from Driller's Panel - successful test. TIH with 5" mule shoe assembly to 5;770' MD. Spaced out and performed BOP function test on 5" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. Pressure tested BOP to 250 psi/ 9;900 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod on 5" drill pipe - successful test. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

07/05/2016: Continued pressure testing BOP on 5" drill pipe to 250 psi/ 9;900 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TIH from 5;770' MD to 21;348' MD. Pressure tested BOP to 250 psi/ 9;900 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM MW from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; on 6-5/8" drill pipe - successful test. TIH with 5" mule shoe assembly to 23;665' MD while monitoring well on a trip tank - well static. 

07/06/2016: TIH with 5" mule shoe assembly to 9-3/8" casing shoe in 15.4 ppg SBM. Successfully completed BOP test. TIH from 31;144' MD to 34;022' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Performed BOP function test on 5" and 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - successful test.

Note: On 07/06/2016; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written notification to Justin Cremer (Chevron) that Chevron may proceed with steps 1.1-1.5 of the proposed PA procedure.

07/07/2016: Spotted balanced plug with 119 bbls (668 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement from 34;022' MD to 32;331' MD in 15.4 ppg MW. Pulled out of open hole cement plug #1 with cement diverter to 32;267' MD. Spotted balanced plug with 121 bbls (680 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement from 32;267' MD to 30;567' MD. Pulled out of open hole plug #2 to 30;317' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. POOH with 5" mule shoe assembly to 5;986' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM.

07/08/2016: POOH with 5" mule shoe assembly from 5;986' MD to surface in 15.4 ppg SBM. TIH with 9-3/8" EZSV assembly to 4;494' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Dynamic Positioning (DP) system error occurred and decision was made to POOH with 9-3/8" EZSV from 4;949' MD to surface. Displaced choke line and riser to seawater and monitored well on trip tank while evaluating DP system error - well static. DP system error resolved. Began displacing choke line and riser back to 15.4 ppg SBM. 

Note: On 07/08/2016; Justin Cremer (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay the casing pressure test until July 9th.

07/09/2016: Completed displacing riser from seawater to 15.4 ppg SBM. TIH with 9-3/8" EZSV assembly from surface to 30;300' MD while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement - well static. Attempted to set 9-3/8" EZSV with no success. TOH with 9-3/8" EZSV assembly from 30;300' MD to 21;129' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement - well static.

Note: On 07/09/2016; Justin Cremer (Chevron) received approval from Justin Ledet (BSEE) to delay the casing test an additional 24 hours.
"},{"   ":50,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-10","TEXT_REMARK":"07/10/2016: TOH with 9-3/8" EZSV assembly from 21;129' MD to surface in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement - well static. Make up (M/U) and trip in hole (TIH) with 9-3/8" EZSV assembly dressed with bridge plug (BP) kit from surface to 18;181' MD while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement - well static. 

Note: On 07/10/2016; Justin Ledet (BSEE) gave verbal approval to Justin Cremer (Chevron) to alter the planned EZSV setting depth from 30;390' MD to 30;000' MD; as well as an additional 24 hour extension on the casing pressure test.

07/11/2016: Continued TIH with 9-3/8" EZSV assembly from 18;181' MD to 30;000' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement - well static. Set 9-3/8" EZSV at 30;000' MD; closed annular and tested backside of 9-3/8" EZSV. Released from 9-3/8" EZSV and circulated bottoms up. Performed a BOP function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; and a Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel - successful tests. Performed casing pressure test against 9-3/8" EZSV to 2;700 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM - failed test. Open annular and monitor well on trip tank - well losing 240 bbl/hr. TIH and tag 9-3/8" EZSV with 25 klbs weight down at 30;000' MD. Shut in well with annular and monitor riser on trip tank - well losing 30 bbl/hr on closed annular. Closed pipe rams and monitor riser on trip tank - well static. Pumped 44 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil down kill line to determine loss rate - well losing 3 bbl/hr.

Note: On 07/11/2016; Steven Scruggs (Chevron) notified BSEE Houma District After Hours that the casing pressure test has failed. 

07/12/2016: Spotted 702 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil in riser; effectively reducing riser hydrostatic by 1;012 psi. Opened well and monitored on trip tank - well losing 7.6 bbl/hr. Begin tripping out of hole (TOH) with 9-3/8" EZSV running assembly from 30;000' MD to 26;765' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well losing 7 bbl/hr. Perform flow check - well static.

07/13/2016: Continued TOH with 9-3/8" EZSV running assembly from 26;765' MD to 11;158 MD in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well losing 10 bbl/hr. Performed flow check - well losing 25 bbl/hr. Shut well in and monitor on kill line with 70.5 bbl of 6.6 ppg base oil - well losing 0.4 bbl/hr. Pumped 702 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil out of the well. Spotted 739 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil in riser; effectively reducing riser hydrostatic by 1;038 psi. Performed flow check - observed well gaining 5.6 bbl/hr. Shut in well.

07/14/2016: With well shut in; pump 739 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil out of the well. Spotted 496 bbls of 7.0 ppg and 253 bbls of 6.7 ppg base oil in riser; effectively reducing riser hydrostatic by 1;014 psi. Performed flow check - well losing 3 bbl/hr. Continued TOH with 9-3/8" EZSV running assembly from 11;158 MD to 4;484' MD; above the BOP; in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank. Close BSR and monitor well on kill line with 6.6 ppg base oil in kill line - wall static. Monitor riser on trip tank with 15.4 ppg SBM - well static. 

07/15/2016: TIH with 9-3/8" EZSV running assembly from 4;484' MD to 5;064' MD; below the BOP; in 15.4 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank. Shut in well on pipe rams and pumped 496 bbls of 7.0 ppg and 253 bbls of 6.7 ppg base oil out of the well. Spotted 729 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil in riser; effectively reducing riser hydrostatic by 1;024 psi. Performed flow check - observed well gaining 45.6 bbl/hr. Shut in well and pumped 729 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil out of the well.

07/16/2016: Spotted 480 bbls of 7.3 ppg and 260 bbls of 6.75 ppg base oil in riser; effectively reducing riser hydrostatic by 981 psi. Performed flow check - well losing 28.8 bbl/hr. TOH with 9-3/8" EZSV running assembly from 5;064' MD to 4;484' MD. M/U 14" Halliburton RTTS packer and TIH from 4;484' MD to 24;934' MD (tail pipe to 29;397' MD) while monitoring well on trip tank. Performed flow check - well losing 7 bbl/hr. Set 14" Halliburton RTTS packer at 24;934'.
"},{"   ":51,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-17","TEXT_REMARK":"07/17/2016: Pressure test below 14" RTTS - tested 11-7/8" liner hanger at 25;004'; 11-7/8" liner; 9-3/8" liner hanger at 28;363'; and 9-3/8" liner against the 9-3/8" EZSV at 30;000' MD. Tested to 2;564 psi and hold for 30 minutes. Good test. Release overshot from 14" RTTS storm valve. TOH with RTTS overshot to 5;054' MD. P/U & TIH with 16" RTTS; well losing 18 bph. Perform flow check at 10;790' MD (RTTS @ 5;709' MD); well gaining (ballooning) 15 bph with pipe static. Shut in well and monitor for 15 minutes; well static. Boost riser cap #5 out of hole. Flush choke and kill lines. Pump base oil out of kill line. Line up kill line on well. Filled kill line with 43.5 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil = 998 psi hydrostatic reduction.

Daily mud loss = 159 bbls.
Cumulative losses since failed casing test = 803 bbls.
Pressure test 11-7/8" & 9-3/8" casing to 2;464 psi for 30 min; good test.
BOP control function test from Driller's; Panel Blue Pod.
Diverter function test from Driller's Panel. Time to close = 28 seconds.

07/18/2016: Spot reverse riser cap #6 in well with 998 psi reduction in hydrostatic. Monitor well on trip tank; gaining at 7.95 bph. Pump out reverse riser cap #6 and spot reverse riser cap #7 in well with 981 psi reduction in hydrostatic. Monitor well; gaining at 12.1 bph. Shut in well and monitor on kill line; well static. Set 16" RTTS @ 5;703' MD and monitor well; well static. Unset RTTS and monitor well; well gaining at 3.7 bph. TIH with 16" RTTS; losing 0.5 bbl/std while tripping. Isolate leak in 16" casing between 10;868' and 10;991' MD. With 16" RTTS set at 10;868' MD; test backside to 1;000 psi; good test. Displace base oil from kill line. Circulate bottoms up and remove reverse riser cap #7 from well.

Daily mud loss = 0 bbls.
Cumulative losses since failed casing test = 803 bbls.

Note: On 07/18/2016; Mr. Bobby Nelson gave approval to delay the CSR function test by 24 hours. Putting the test date to midnight on the 19th of July. 
Mr. Bobby Nelson also granted approval for a 24 hr extension for testing of alternate Pod/control station. 

07/19/2016: Displace reverse riser cap #7 from well with 15.4 ppg SBM. Spot 100 bbls Hi-vis pill on top of 16" RTTS. TOH with 16" RTTS stinger assy from 10;821' to 4;928' MD. Perform flow check; well static. TOH to 1;812' MD. Function test BSR and CSR. Make up 2 stands of 5" drill pipe for BOP testing and TIH to 6;893'. Space out and locate annular on 5" drill pipe. Pressure test BOP to 250 psi low/ 9;900 psi high on 5" DP with 15.4 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod. TIH from 6;893' to 7;063'. Space out and locate annular on 6-5/8" drillpipe. Pressure test BOP to 250 psi low/ 9;900 psi high on 6-5/8" DP with 15.4 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod.

Daily mud loss = 0 bbls.
Cumulative losses since failed casing test = 803 bbls.
BOP control function test on BSRs and CSRs from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod.
Begin pressure testing BOP on 5" and 6-5/8" drill pipe from Drillers Panel; Yellow Pod.

07/20/2016: Continue pressure testing BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe. POOH from 7;063' to 1;857'. Make up double Dutch assy and test top drive. Slip and cut drill line. RIH with 16" RTTS running tool from 1;857' to 10;676' MD. Displace from 15.4 ppg to 13.8 ppg. Perform Diverter function from Toolpusher's Panel. Displace choke; kill and boost lines with 13.8 ppg SBM.

Daily mud loss = 0 bbls.
Cumulative losses since failed casing test = 803 bbls.
Finish pressure testing BOP on 5" and 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod.
Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel. Time to close = 28 seconds.

07/21/2016: Continue displacing 15.4 ppg to 13.8 ppg SBM. Tested casing against 16" RTTS to 1;000 psi - good test. Open annular; well static. TIH & latch 16" RTTS. Release RTTS and observe 156 bph loss rate. Set 16" RTTS. Displace 13.8 ppg to 13.7 ppg SBM. Flow check; well static. Release RTTS and observe 30 bph loss rate. Set RTTS at 10;950' and test down drill pipe below RTTS to 1;000 psi; good test. Monitor well; losses at 43 bph. Unset RTTS; TOH and set RTTS at 10;920' MD; monitor well - well static. Isolated leak between 10;920' - 10;950'. Displace 13.7 ppg to 13.6 ppg SBM. Flow check - well static. Release RTTS; well ballooning at 9.2 bph; gained 32.5 bbl total and well went static. Set RTTS at 10;920' MD; close annular and circulate out through both choke and kill lines. Max gas = 100 units; no gas cut mud.

Daily mud loss = 101 bbls.
Cumulative losses since failed casing test = 904 bbls.

07/22/2016: Circulate out through the choke. Open annular and perform flow check - well static. Unset 16" RTTS and perform flow check; well ballooning; total ballooned back = 16 bbls. Set RTTS at 10;920' MD and circulate out 16 bbls flow back from ballooning through choke line. Unset RTTS and perform flow check; well ballooned back 5.6 bbls before becoming static. Sweep stack. Release RTTS and perform flow check; well ballooned back 1.4 bbls. Pump out hole from 15;773' MD to 15;133' MD. Perform flow check; well ballooned back 1.4 bbls before becoming static. TOH from 14;473' to 13;725'; improper fill-ups; well ballooned back 5.3 bbls. Perform flow check on trip tank; well losing at 4.4 bph. TOH to 11;172' and perform flow check; well losing at 18 bph.

Daily mud loss = 9 bbls.
Cumulative losses since failed casing test = 913 bbls.

07/23/2016: TOH with 16" RTTS from 11;172' to 10;363' MD. Perform flow check; well losing at 5 bph. Set 16" RTTS at 5;220' and release. TOH from 5;220' to 4;048' MD. Test BSR to 250 psi low/ 1;400 psi high. Function test BSRs and CSRs. TIH from 4;048 to 5;220' MD. Latch and release RTTS. Perform flow check; well losing at 2.3 bph. TOH from 10;363' to 5;160'. Clean and rack back 16" RTTS. TOH from 5;160' to surface. Perform flow check; well losing at 20 bph. Close BSR; boost riser while rigging up 1250 ton bails. Make up 14" anchor hanger and TIH to 187'. Rig up OES CFT. TIH with 14" anchor from 187' to 5;827'.

Daily mud loss = 161 bbls.
Cumulative losses since failed casing test = 1;060 bbls.
"},{"   ":52,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-24","TEXT_REMARK":"07/24/2016: Tripped in hole with 14" anchor hanger on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 5;827' MD/TVD to 11;346' MD in 13.6 ppg synthetic base mud (SBM). Monitored well on trip tank - losses and ballooning were observed. Set anchor at 11;346' MD. TOH from 11;346' MD to 10;698' MD. Flow checked - ballooned back 1.8 bbls over 20 min was observed. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 14" anchor hanger running assembly from 10;698' MD to 5;185' MD. Performed BOP function test on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - successful test. TOH with 14" anchor hanger on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 5;185' MD to 1;724' MD while monitoring well on the trip tank - well static. Performed diverter function test from Driller's Panel - successful test. TOH from 1;724' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank. 

Daily mud loss = 176 bbls
Cumulative Losses since Failed Casing Test = 1;236 bbls

07/25/2016: TIH with 14" seal assembly and 14" scab liner from surface to 598' MD in 13.6 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Continued TIH with 14" scab liner on 6-5/8" landing string (LS) from 598' MD to 11;295' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - losses and ballooning were observed. Latched into 14" anchor hanger. Set 14" scab liner. TOH with 14" scab liner running tool 6-5/8" LS from 10;722' MD to 10;637' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

Daily mud loss = 523 bbls
Cumulative Losses since Failed Casing Test = 1;759 bbls

07/26/2016: TOH with 14" scab liner tool from 10;637' MD to surface in 13.6 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Function tested Blind Shear Rams (BSRs) and Casing Shear Rams (CSRs) from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. Performed pressure test on 14" scab liner against the Blind Shear Rams (BSR) with 13.6 ppg SBM to 1;000 psi for 30 min - good test. TIH with 14" Retrievable Test-Treat-Squeeze (RTTS) recovery assembly from surface to 10;800' MD in 13.6 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Displaced string to 15.4 ppg SBM. Continued TIH from 10;800' MD to 24;880' MD. 

07/27/2016: Displaced well from 13.6 ppg SBM to 15.4 ppg SBM. Latched and released 14" RTTS at 24;919' MD. TOH with 14" RTTS to surface in 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

07/28/2016: TOH with RTTS tail pipe from 4;462' MD to surface in 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TIH with 5" mule shoe from surface to 29;987' MD. Circulated bottoms up. 

07/29/2016: Performed negative test against 9-3/8" EZSV with 15.4 ppg SBM in the wellbore. Pumped 197 bbls of 8.6 ppg seawater to achieve a 2;460 psi test pressure. Closed test rams. Bled back 26.25 bbls. No flow observed - successful test. Reversed out seawater. Spotted balanced plug with 37 bbls (208 cu ft) of Class H cement from 29;997' MD to 29;497' MD. TOH from 29;997' MD to 28;570' MD. Pumped 42 bbls (236 cu ft) of Class H cement. Noticed mud was not falling in pipe while pulling out. Attempted to establish circulation - no success. TOH wet with 5" mule shoe from 27;923' MD to 19;853' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

07/30/2016: Continued TOH wet with 5" mule shoe from 19;853' MD to surface with 15.4 ppg SBM in the wellbore. Discovered cement at 2;835' MD inside the 5-7/8" drill pipe. TIH with cement stinger from surface to 5;526' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 
"},{"   ":53,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608114066101,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-31","TEXT_REMARK":"7/31/2016: Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Performed BOP control function test from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Performed accumulator drawdown test from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. Tripped in hole (TIH) with 5-7/8" cement diverter to 28;380' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Tagged top of cement (TOC) with 15 klbs down. Picked up (P/U) from 28;380' MD to 28;375' MD. Pumped 35 bbls (197 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement to complete plug and abandon (P&A) cement plug #4 (total for 500 foot P&A cement plug #4 - 49 bbls or 275 cu ft of 16.2 ppg cement). Displaced cement with 770 bbls of 15.4 ppg SBM. Tripped out of hole (TOH) from 28;376' MD to 25;204' MD. Pumped 68 bbls (382 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement for P&A cement plug #5. Displaced cement with 677 bbls of 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitor well on trip tank - well static.

08/01/2016: TOH from 25;204' MD to 17;912' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Pumped 94 bbls (528 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement for P&A cement plug #6. Displaced cement with 448 bbbls of 15.4 ppg SBM. TOH from 17;912' MD to to 9;620'. TOC at 17;430' MD. TIH from 9;620' MD to 11;500' MD. Pumped 193 bbls (1;084 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement for P&A cement plug #7. Displaced cement with 210 barrels of 15.4 ppg SBM. TOH from 11;500' MD to 9;728' MD. Wait on cement (WOC). Monitor well on trip tank - well static.

Note: BSEE inspection. No action items noted and no Instances of Noncompliance (INCs) issued.

08/02/2016: WOC until 500 psi compressive strength reached. Washed down from 9;728' MD to 10;365' MD. Set 10 klbs down on top of cement at 10;365'. TOH from 10;365' MD to 5;270' MD in 15.4 ppg SBM. Pressure test P&A cement plug #7 with 1;000 psi for 15 minutes - good test. Displaced well from 15.4 ppg SBM to 8.6 ppg seawater. Pumped 86 bbls (483 cu ft) of 15.8 ppg cement for P&A cement plug #8. Displaced cement with 100 bbls of 8.6 ppg seawater. TOH from 5;270' MD to 4;903' MD. Pumped 100 bbls of 8.3 ppg treated water and displaced treated water with 105 barrels of 8.6 ppg seawater. TOH from 4;903' MD to 2;451' MD. Monitor well on trip tank - well static.

08/03/2016: TOH from 2;451' MD to surface in 8.6 ppg seawater. Make up (M/U) and TIH with BOP jetting assembly from surface to 4;882' MD. Jet BOP while rotating and reciprocating. TOH from 4;882' MD to surface. Rigged up riser handling equipment and removed diverter. Laid out (L/O) diverter and picked up (P/U) landing joint and M/U to telescopic joint. Monitor well on trip tank - well static. Held diverter drill with Crew D - successful test.

08/04/2016: Locked telescopic joint and unlatched BOP from wellhead at 01:10 hrs. Pulled BOP on marine riser from 4;668' MD to 463' MD. 

08/05/2016: Continued pulling BOP on marine riser from 463' MD to surface. ROV installed corrosion cap on wellhead and injected corrosion inhibitor into wellhead. ROV performed clear bottom survey. Moved rig off Anchor #3 well at 12:00 hours.
"},{"   ":54,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-08-10","TEXT_REMARK":"08/10/2014: Made up 36" casing and began running the 30" x 32" jetting BHA inner string.

08/11/2014: Ran the 36" jetting assembly down to 4;700'. Reviewed the shallow water flow kill procedure with the crew.

08/12/2014: Tagged the ML at 5;265'. Updated water depth to 5;183' with an 82' air gap. Jetted the 36" casing to 5;571'. Slacked off weight and monitored for subsidence. Released from the Dril-Quip Cam Actuated Drill Ahead tool. Completed a fire and abandon drill. Drilled the 30" x 32" hole section from 5;571' to 5;663' with seawater.

Note: On 08/12/2014 @ 8:43 AM; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted permission to proceed with jetting in the 36" casing at the GC 807 #2 well location.

Note: On 08/12/2014 @ 3:35 PM; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted approval to proceed with drilling the 32" hole section and run and cement the 28" conductor casing.

08/13/2014: Drilled the 30" x 32" hole section from 5;663' to 5;885'. At 5;760'; switched from seawater to 10.1 ppg S4 water based mud. After reaching total depth; a lignite caliper pill was pumped. Calculated a 41.0" equivalent diameter. Spotted 16.0 ppg S4 water based mud in the pilot hole and displaced the well to 11.0 ppg S4 water based mud. Pulled out of the hole with the BHA.

08/14/2014: Ran the 28" casing down to 5;828'. Set the 28" casing hanger. Pumped 465 bbls of foamed lead cement (583 bbl equivalent downhole volume). Pumped 222 bbls of tail unfoamed cement. Total down hole volume of cement = 4;520 cu ft. Displaced cement with seawater to approximately 5;758' inside the 28" casing. Checked the floats in the 28" casing shoe. Bled back 1.75 bbls over 5 minutes; indicating the floats were holding. Rigged down cement head and released the 28" casing hanger running tool.

08/15/2014: Pulled out of the hole to surface. Made up the 26" BHA and tripped down to the Low Pressure Housing.  Stabbed into the LPH and tripped in the hole to just above the top of cement and washed down with seawater. Tagged the top of cement at 5;743'. Began drilling cement.

Note: On 08/15/2014 @ 3:54 PM; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted approval to Amanda Pena (Chevron) to proceed through step 10 of the proposed APD procedure.

08/16/2014: Swapped drilling fluid to 10.1 ppg S4 water based mud while drilling out cement. Drilled out of the 28" casing shoe with 10.1 ppg S4 water based mud. Drilled cement through the rat hole to 5;828'. Began drilling new formation from 5;885' to 6;173'. Displaced the well to 11.0 ppg S4 water based mud. Tripped out of the hole to surface to clean the bit. Began running back to the low pressure housing with clean bit."},{"   ":55,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-08-17","TEXT_REMARK":"08/17/2014: Tripped in the hole with the 26" bit and BHA from 1;008' to 5;371'. Displaced the drill string with 10.1 ppg S4 (salt saturated) water based mud. Continued to trip in the hole from 5;371' to 6;019'; washed to bottom from 6;019' to 6;173'. Drilled the 26" hole section from 6;173' to 6;301'. Tripped out of the hole due to insufficient ROP. Displaced the well to 11.0 ppg S4 water based mud. Tripped out of the hole with the 26" bit and BHA from 6;301' to surface. Made up a new 26" BHA and began tripping in the hole from surface to 180'.

08/18/2014: Continued to trip in the hole with the 26" bit and BHA from 180' to 5;371'. Displaced the drill string with 10.1 ppg S4 water based mud. Continued to trip in the hole from 5;371' to 6;144'; washed to bottom from 6;144' to 6;301'. Drilled the 26" hole section from 6;302' to 7;112'. 

Note: Amanda Pena (Chevron) notified BSEE of the expected start date for the BOP stump test.

08/19/2014: Continued to drill the 26" hole section from 7;112' to 7;643'. Tripped out of the hole due to insufficient ROP. Displaced well to 11.0 ppg S4 water based mud. Tripped out of the hole with the 26" bit and BHA from 7;643' to surface.

08/20/2014: Made up a new 26" bit and BHA. Tripped in the hole with the 26" bit and BHA from surface to 5;369'. Displaced the drill string to 11.0 ppg S4 water based mud. Continued to trip in hole from 5;369' to 7;301'; washed to bottom from 7;301' to 7;643'. Drilled the 26" hole section from 7;643' to 9;233'.

08/21/2014: Continued to drill the 26" hole section from 9;233' to section total depth at 10;330'. Spotted 16.0 ppg S4 water based mud in the rat hole and tripped out of hole from 10;330' to 10;300'. Pumped a 380 bbl 11.8 ppg S4 water based mud lignite caliper pill and displaced the well with 12.5 ppg S4 water based mud. Calculated a 27.7" equivalent open hole diameter.

08/22/2014: Tripped out of the hole with the 26" bit and BHA from 10;300' to above LPWH at 5;254'. Maded a wiper tripped in the hole from 5;254' to 10;330' washing and reaming as required.   Spotted 16.0 ppg S4 water based mud in the rat hole and tripped out of hole from 10;330' to 10;300'. Circulated bottoms up with 12.5 ppg S4 water based mud. Tripped out of the hole with the 26" bit and BHA from 10;300' to surface. 

08/23/2014: Make up and run 22" casing from surface to 4;370'.
"},{"   ":56,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-08-24","TEXT_REMARK":"08/24/2014: Continued tripping in the hole with the 22"/23" casing from 4;370' to 5;056'. Ran the 5-7/8" inner string to 4;906'. Tripped in the hole with the 22"/23" casing and 5-7/8' inner string on the 6-5/8" landing string; landing out the HPWH on the LPWH with the casing shoe at 10;312'. Engaged the mechanical rigid lock down assembly and preloaded the HPWH to 2MM lbs in the LPWH. Pumped 500 bbls of 12.5 ppg salt saturated water based mud to prepare wellbore for cementing operations. Pumped 20 bbls of unfoamed 13.8 ppg lignite spacer followed by 183 bbls of foamed 16.4 ppg spacer (downhole volume - 200 bbls; downhole density - 13.8 ppg). Pumped 715 bbls/ 3;650 sacks of foamed 16.4 ppg Class H lead cement.

08/25/2014: Continued pumping an additional 620 bbls/ 3;165 sacks of foamed 16.4 ppg Class H lead cement for a total surface volume of 1;335 bbls/ 6;815 sacks and downhole volume of 1;627 bbls/ 9;133 cu ft. Observed an increase in pH reading at the LPWH outlet from 7.8 to 10.2 after 1;318 bbs (downhole volume - 1;607 bbls); indicating cement returns at the LPWH. Pumped 60 bbls/ 304 sacks of foamed 16.4 ppg Class H tail cement (downhole volume - 69 bbls/ 387 cu ft; downhole density - 13.5 ppg). Pumped 108 bbls/ 546 sacks/ 606 cu ft of unfoamed 16.4 ppg Class H tail cement. Displaced the cement with 265 bbls of seawater; checked the casing float; 11 bbls bled back; the flow stopped indicating the float held. Released the HPWH running tool and tripped out of the hole with the 6-5/8" landing string and 5-7/8" inner string from 10;162' to 9;874'. Displaced the well to 12.5 ppg salt saturated water based mud. Tripped out of the hole with the 6-5/8" landing string and 5-7/8" inner string from 9;874' to surface. 

Moved rig 200' from well center and began BOP stump pressure test sequence. Test annulars to 9;700 psi; and rams to 14;700 psi.  

08/26/2014: Continued BOP stump pressure testing. 

08/27/2014: Continued BOP stump pressure testing.  

08/28/2014: Recalibrated the depth compensated accumulator bottles.

08/29/2014: Successfully tested the acoustic pod. Began pre-charging the depth compensated accumulator bottles and accumulators.

08/30/2014: Successfully tested the depth compensated accumulator bottles when functioning the EHBS system. Continued charging accumulators and depth compensated accumulator bottles to subsea pressures. Splashed the BOP in the moonpool at 23:30 hrs. 
"},{"   ":57,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-08-31","TEXT_REMARK":"08/31/2014: Continued running LMRP/BOP on riser to 4;063'. Tested choke and kill lines to 12;500 psi; rigid conduits and boost lines to 5;000 psi. Continued running LMRP/BOP on riser from 4;063' to 4;693. 

09/01/2014: Continued running LMRP/BOP on riser from 4;693' to 5;103'. Picked up slip joint and installed draped hoses. Installed storm loop brackets on slip joint and secured hot line and mux lines. Engaged tensioner ring and landed BOPs. Installed and locked down diverter.

09/02/2014: Performed ERA testing. Completed the ROV intervention BSR test with 37.8 gal and 4;900 psi closing pressure. Performed 22" casing test against BSR to 3;900 psi for 35 minutes. Test good. Function tested BSR using EHBS and acoustic pod. RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA tail pipe and BOP ITT and dual cam. Tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with seawater. Tested from the Toolpusher's panel and Yellow Pod. Tested rams to 250/12;200 psi; annulars to 250/7;000 psi.

09/03/2014: Continued testing BOPs. Released dual cam and completed BOP tests against BSR. Slacked off to make up dual cam tool. Function tested BSR using EHBS. ROV verified pressure in the shear accumulators at 3;500 psi. Tested against BSR with 250/12;200 psi. Test unsuccessful due to leaks at surface. Troubleshot and continued attempting to test BSR. 

09/04/2014: Attempted to test BSR; test failed due to leaking valves on cement manifold. Rebuilt leaking valves. Tested BSR to 250/12;200 psi for 5 minutes on a chart. Test good. TOH with BOP test tool and dual cam tool. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to 3;701'. Sip and cut drill line. Successfully performed EHBS test during slip and cut. Set wear sleeve in wellhead.

09/05/2014: Performed accumulator draw down test. Function tested BOP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Functioned diverter from Driller's and Toolpusher's panels. Continued tripping in hole. Washed and reamed with seawater from 10;073 to 10;205'. Began displacing from seawater to 10.4 SBM. Drilled cement to 10;287' (25' above shoe) while displacing through drill string. Performed choke drill. Drilled out shoe track and drilled 10' new formation from 10;330' to 10;340'. Performed LOT with 10.4 ppg SBM to 727 psi surface pressure and 11.7 ppg EMW.

09/06/2014: Drilled with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;340' to 10;440'. Dropped 2.25" ball in drill pipe and activated the reamer. Continued drilling to 11;062' with 10.4 ppg SBM; to 12;038' with 10.6 ppg; to 12;179' with 10.8 ppg and to 13;121' with 11.0 ppg SBM. Average 124 ft/hr ROP.
"},{"   ":58,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-09-07","TEXT_REMARK":"09/07/2014: Drilled with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 13;121' to 14;220'. Swept hole clean and spotted 50 bbls of 16.4 ppg pad mud on bottom. TOH to 14;108' and circulated bottoms up. Performed static flow check. TOH to 13;185'. Pumped a slug and TOH to 10;105'. Washed the 18" supplemental adapter. TOH to 7;632'.

09/08/2014: TOH with 18-1/2" x 21" BHA from 7;632' to surface. R/U 18" x 17-7/8" casing handling equipment. P/U and ran casing from surface to 4;163'.

09/09/2014: Continue running 18" x 17-7/8" casing from 4;163' to 4;247'. Trip in hole with 6-5/8" 27# inner string to 4;093'. Make up 18" CHSART to inner string. TIH with casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 4;287' to 14;093'.

09/10/2014: Perform cementing operations on 18" x 17-7/8" casing string. SLB pumped 4 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement slurry; launch 8" nerf ball; and followed with 262 bbls of 16.4 ppg slurry at 5 bpm with 530 psi (266 bbls total cement pumped - 1493 cu ft/ 1;383 sks). Chased with 4 bbls 13.0 ppg tail spacer; launch 8" nerf ball; and followed by remaining 20 bbls of 13.0 ppg tail spacer at 5 bpm with 150 psi. Displace with 390 bbls of 11.0 ppg SBM. ETOC inside casing 14;023'. TOH with 6-5/8" inner string; 18" CHSART; and landing string to surface. Function tested BSRs/CSRs from Toolpusher's panel and Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Pressure tested 17-7/8" x 18" casing and BSRs 250 psi low for 5 minutes/ 2;400 psi high for 30 minutes with 11.0 ppg SBM.

09/11/2014: TIH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from surface to 6;900'; space out; and performed function test on BOPs and diverter. Continue TIH. Drilled cement to 14;059' while displacing well from 11.0 ppg to 12.0 ppg. Obtained CLFs/SCRs and performed Choke Drill. Drilled out shoe track and reamed rat hole to 14;165'.

09/12/2014: Washed and reamed through rat hole. Drilled 10' of new formation to 14;230'. Pumped sweep and circulated above stack. Perform LOT to 14.0 ppg ESD (1515 psi with 12.0 ppg SBM). Activated reamer and drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 14;230' to 16;374'; weighting up to 12.2 ppg SBM at 14;925' and 12.5 ppg SBM at 15;478'.

09/13/2014: Drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 16;374' to 19;300'. Pumped 100 bbl 14.5 ppg weighted sweep on last stand. Flow check - well static. Spotted pill and pumped sweep. Circulated and conditioned mud. 
"},{"   ":59,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-09-14","TEXT_REMARK":"09/14/2014: Continued to circulate the well clean. Flow checked the well prior to tripping out of the hole at 19;165'; well remained static. Tripped out of the hole with the 16-1/2" x 19" drilling assembly from 19;165' to surface. 

09/15/2014: Tripped in the hole with the BOP Testing Tool (BOPTT) from surface to 5;492'. Tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 12.5 ppg synthetic based mud (SBM) from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod. Tested rams to 250/11;000 psi and annulars to 250/6;600 psi.

Note: On 09/15/2014 @ 09:58 hrs; Amanda Pena (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to set the 16" shoe 110' shallower. Mr. Nelson requested verification that the cementing program did not change; which Ms. Pena verified.

09/16/2014: Continued pressure testing BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 12.5 ppg SBM from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod. Tested rams to 250/11;000 psi and annulars to 250/6;600 psi. Function tested BOPs from Driller's panel on the Blue Pod. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's and Toolpusher's panel. 
	
09/17/2014: Continued pressure testing BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 12.5 ppg SBM from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod. Tested rams to 250/11;000 psi; annulars to 250/6;600 psi; 15k surface equipment to 250/12;100 psi; 10k surface equipment to 250/9;200 psi; and kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi. Tripped out of the hole with the BOPTT from 5;492' to surface. Ran 16" Q-125HP casing from surface to 5;144'. Successfully function tested the Blind Shear and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod. 

09/18/2014: Continued to run in the hole with 16" casing form 5;144' to 13;658'. Made up the 16" casing hanger and running tool to the 16" casing and ran in the hole with 16" casing on the 6-5/8" 50# landing string from 13;658' to 14;144'.  

09/19/2014: Continued running in the hole with 16" casing on 6-5/8" 50# landing string from 14;144' to 19;180'. Landed the 16" casing hanger in the 16" supplemental adapter at 5;512'.  

Performed cement operations as follows: Pumped 200 bbls of 14.4 ppg lead spacer followed by 417 bbls (2;341 cu ft / 2;148 sacks) of 16.4 ppg Class H tail cement slurry in the following order; released the bottom dart from cement head and pumped 401 bbls of cement; released the top dart from cement head and pumped 20 bbls of cement slurry behind the top dart. Pumped 30 bbls of 14.4 ppg tail spacer. Displaced the cement with 3;038 bbls of 12.5 ppg SBM. Top plug successfully bumped upper float collar 500 psi over final circulating pressure of 1;507 psi. Observed a final lifting pressure of 1;027 psi. Bled back 18 bbls of compressibility and determined floats successfully held. 

Set and tested the 16" casing hanger seal assembly at 5;512' to 6;000 psi. Released from the 16" casing hanger and tripped out of the hole with the casing hanger running tool and landing string from 5;512' to 579'. 

09/20/2014: Continued to trip out of the hole with the casing hanger running tool and landing string from 579' to surface. Closed the Blind Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod and successfully pressured tested the 16" casing and Blind Shear Rams to 6;000 psi. Successfully function tested the Blind Shear and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod. Tripped in the hole with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" drilling BHA from surface to 5;746'. Successfully function tested the BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and Driller's panel from the Yellow Pod. Continued to trip in the hole with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" drilling BHA from 5;746' to 18;691'.
"},{"   ":60,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-09-21","TEXT_REMARK":"09/21/2014: Continued tripping in the hole with the 14-1/2" to 19;039' and tagged the upper float collar at 19;039'. Drilled out the float collars and 16" casing shoe track from 19;039' to 19;180' and washed the rat hole from 19;180' to 19;300'. Drilled 10' of new formation from 19;300' to 19;310'. Performed a leak off test with 12.5 ppg synthetic based mud (SBM) to 2;394 psi for an equivalent leak off mud density of 14.7 ppg. Tripped in the hole with the BHA from 19;204' to 19;290'.  Dropped a 2-1/8" steel ball and activated the 16-1/2" reamer. Washed and reamed the hole from 19;290' to 19;310'. Drilled with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 19;310' to 19;801' with 12.5 ppg SBM.

09/22/2014: Continued drilling with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 19;801' to 20;332' with 12.5 ppg SBM and from 20;332' to 21;388' with 12.7 ppg SBM.

09/23/2014: Continued drilling with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 21;388' to 22;072' with 12.7 ppg SBM; from 22;072' to 23;308' with 13.0 ppg SBM; and from 23;308' to 23;329' with 13.3 ppg SBM.

Note: On 09/23/2014; Amanda Pena (Chevron) notified Bobby Nelson (BSEE) of a loss of communication on one of the two redundant communication paths to the Blue Pod. The Yellow Pod is functioning on both channels and will be used to continue drilling.

09/24/2014: Continued drilling with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 23;329' to 24;138' with 13.3 ppg SBM; from 24;138' to 24;462' with 13.6 ppg SBM; and from 24;462' to 24;670' with 13.9 ppg SBM.

09/25/2014: Continued drilling with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 24;670' to 25;244' with 13.9 ppg SBM and from 25;244' to the section total depth (TD) of 25;890' with 14.0 ppg SBM. Circulated cuttings above the BHA and performed a static influx; well remained static. Pumped a 150 bbl 16.6 ppg SBM viscous pill to spot in the rat hole from 25;890' to 25;780'.  Circulated and conditioned the hole with 14.0 ppg SBM at 25;780'.  

09/26/2014: Continued to circulate and condition the hole with 14.0 ppg SBM at 25;780'. Flow checked the well prior to tripping out of the hole; well remained static. Tripped out of the hole with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 25;780' to 383'. 

09/27/2014: Continued to trip out of the hole with the 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 383' to surface. Tripped in the hole from surface to 5;253' and set the Dril-Quip Nominal Bore Protector in the high pressure wellhead housing. Tripped out of the hole from 5;253' to surface. Successfully function tested the BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe from the Driller's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod. Successfully function tested the Diverter form the Driller's panel and Toolpusher's panel. Successfully function tested the Blind Shear and Casing Shear Rams from Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod. Ran 14"; 115.53 lb/ft; Q-125HP casing from surface to 761'. 
"},{"   ":61,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-09-28","TEXT_REMARK":"09/28/2014: Finished running 14" liner. TIH on landing string to 9;691'

09/29/2014: TIH with 14" liner on landing string from 9;691' to 25;780'. Cemented 14" liner. Floats did not hold. Waited on cement.

09/30/2014: Waited on cement with annular closed. Monitored pressures. Expanded 14" liner hanger from the cement unit. Pulled running tool from hanger. TOH from 18;679' to 13;839'.

Note: Josh Ladner and Jerry Freeman were given written notification on 09/30/2014 that a 2" piece of tubing 96-1/4" long was dropped overboard @ 12:00 hrs. A clear bottom survey was conducted following the incident.

10/01/2014: TOH from 13;839' to surface with the 14" liner running tool. Successfully tested casing to 5;300 psi with 14.0 ppg SBM for 30 minutes. TIH to retrieve the Nominal Bore Protector and wash the wellhead and BOPs. TOH to surface with the Nominal Bore Protector and jet sub.

Note: Amanda Pena (Chevron) requested and was granted written approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) @ 13.46 hrs to extend BOP testing by 96 hrs.

10/02/2014: Ran 14" x 13-3/4" tieback from surface to 13;454'.

10/03/2014: Ran 3-1/2" inner string. TIH on landing string from 13;454' to 18;724' and landed out hanger. Circulated and conditioned mud. 

10/04/2014: Cemented 14" x 13-3/4" tieback. Pumped 180 bbls of 12.2 ppg lead spacer. Pumped 220 bbls of 16.4 ppg tail cement (220 bbls total cement pumped - 1;235 cu ft/ 1;346 sks). Pumped 15 bbls of 12.5 ppg tail spacer. Displaced with 221 bbls of 14.0 ppg SBM. The float held.

Note:  G. Woldtvedt (Chevron) requested and was granted written approval from Bobby Nelson  (BSEE) @ 18:06 hrs to extend BOP function test by 24 hrs.
"},{"   ":62,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-10-05","TEXT_REMARK":"10/05/2014: Set and tested the 14" tieback hanger seal assembly to 10;000 psi. TOH from 18;512' with landing and inner string. Function tested the BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Tripped into the hole with drill pipe test stands. Function tested BOP from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; and Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. Function tested the diverter from both Driller's and Toolpusher's panel. Began BOP pressure test from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; with 14.0 ppg SBM. Pressure test Rams to 250/10;100 psi and annular to 250/6;200 psi.

10/06/2014: Continue testing BOPs. 9 of 31 tests completed. 

10/07/2014: Finish testing BOPs. TIH and set the lock down sleeve. 

10/08/2014: TOH with remaining drill string. Performed BSR/CSR function test from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. Pressure tested BSRs to 250/5;300 psi Driller's panel; Blue Pod; with 14.0 ppg SBM. 

10/09/2014: TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 8;598' to 18;511'. Drilled cement from 18;511' to 18;738' and washed to 18;985'. TIH from 18;985' to 20;020'. Perform casing pressure test; tested 14" liner and tieback casing to 5;300 psi with 14.0 ppg SBM. TIH from 20;020' to 25;580' (TOC). Performed choke drill. Drill cement from 25;580' to 25;617'.

10/10/2014: Weighted up to 14.5 ppg while drilling out shoe track. Drilled +15 feet new formation to 25;905'. Circulated bottoms up into riser. Performed LOT to 2;965 psi with 14.5 ppg SBM for a 16.7 ppg EMW. Function tested BOPs and Diverter. Drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section to 25;948'.

10/11/2014: Drilled 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 25;948' to 26;414'. Weighted up active system to 14.8 ppg at 26;064' and to 15.1 ppg at 26;414'. Stuck pipe after connection at 26;414'. Jarred free. Drilled from 26;414' to 26;582'. Drilling suspended at 21:30 hrs due to 3.0 Knot Loop Current. Circulate bottoms up at 26;582'. 
"},{"   ":63,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-10-12","TEXT_REMARK":"10/12/2014: Suspend drilling operations due to 3.2 knot loop currents. Circulated bottoms up. Flow checked the well prior to tripping out of the hole at 26;582'; well remained static. Tripped out of the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 26;582' to surface. Continued waiting and monitoring loop current conditions; 2.5-3.2 knot currents observed.

10/13/2014: Tripped in hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from surface to 1;140'. Continued waiting and monitoring loop current conditions; 2.3-4.0 knot currents observed. 

10/14/2014: After loop current subsided to 1.7 knots; tripped in the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 1;140' to 4;726'. Successfully function tested the Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod. Successfully function tested the BOPs from the Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod and from the Toolpushers panel on the Blue Pod. Function tested the diverter from both the Driller's and the Toolpusher's panel. Continued to trip in the hole with the 12-1/4"x14-1/2" drilling assembly from 4;726' to 25;997'.

10/15/2014: Tripped in the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 25;997' to 26;582'. Drilled the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 26;582' to 27;500' with 15.1 ppg SBM.

10/16/2014: Continued drilling the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 27;500' to 27;919' with 15.1 ppg SBM. Observed a positive kick indication (flow with pumps off) when making a connection at 27;919'. Monitored the flow back rate for 11 minutes to confirm the well was taking an influx and not ballooning. Shut in the well by closing the upper annular and recorded a 9 bbl influx; Shut in Drill Pipe Pressure of 450 psi; and Shut in Casing Pressure of 330 psi. When attempting to bump the float to obtain the Shut in Drill Pipe Pressure; it was observed the drill string float was not holding. Performed a well kill operation using the "Wait and Weight" method by circulating 15.5 ppg kill mud weight. 

10/17/2014: Completed well kill operation by circulating 15.5 ppg SBM according to the "Wait and Weight" method. Shut down the pumps and monitored the well for 30 minutes; well remained static. Displaced the riser from 15.1 to 15.5 ppg SBM.  Monitored the well on the trip tank for 30 minutes; well remained static. Performed the BOP stack sweep operation. With the bit at 27;877'; circulated 15.5 ppg SBM and rotated at 20 rpm for 2 hours to confirm barrel in equaled barrel out prior to drilling ahead. Continued drilling the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 27;919' to 28;048' with 15.5 ppg SBM; then experienced an MWD tool failure.  Flow checked the well prior to tripping out of the hole at 28;048'; well remained static. Tripped out of the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 28;048' to 26;512'. 

10/18/2014" Continued to trip out of the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 26;512' to surface. Tripped in the hole with a new 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly.
"},{"   ":64,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-10-19","TEXT_REMARK":"10/19/2014: Completed pressure testing 15k surface equipment to 250/11;500 psi. Tripped in the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly to 1;134'. Successfully function tested the Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod. Continued to trip in the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 1;134' to 14;927'. Began pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.5 SBM from the Driller's Panel on the Blue Pod. Tested Rams to 250/9;600 psi and annulars to 250/5;700 psi. 

10/20/2014: Completed pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.5 SBM from the Drillers Panel on the Blue Pod; tested Rams to 250/9;600 psi and annulars to 250/5;700 psi. Successfully function tested BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod. Successfully function tested the diverter from the Driller's and Toolpusher's panels. Continued to trip in the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 14;927' to 28;048'. Drilled the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 28;048' to 28;304' with 15.5 ppg SBM.

10/21/2014: Continued drilling the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 28;304' to 28;406' with 15.5 ppg SBM. Suspended operations due to loop currents (2.8-3.6 knot currents observed). Drilled the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 28;406' to 28;655' with 15.5 ppg SBM. Began circulating 15.6 ppg SBM while drilling at 28;433'; 30 bbls of SBM was lost to the formation after 2;900 bbls pumped. Suspended operations due to loop currents (2.7-3.7 knot currents observed) and circulated 15.5 ppg SBM while waiting on loop current. Drilled the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 28;655' to 29;044' with 15.5 ppg SBM with partial losses. Total SBM lost to the formation was 231 bbls for the 24 hour period. 

10/22/2014: Continued drilling the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 29;044' to 29;734' with 15.5 ppg SBM with partial losses. Total SBM lost to the formation was 357 bbls for the 24 hour period.

10/23/2014: Continued drilling the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 29;734' to 29;776' with 15.5 ppg SBM. Circulated and conditioned the hole with 15.5 ppg SBM at 29;776'. Flow checked the well prior to tripping out of the hole at 29;776'; well remained static. Tripped out of the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 29;776' to 26;510'; taking formation pressure readings at 29;153'; 28;890'; 28;684'; 28;648'; and 28;235'. 

10/24/2014: Continued to trip out of the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 26;510' to 17;105'. Successfully function tested the BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod. Function tested the Diverter form the Driller's and ToolPusher's panels. Continued to trip out of the hole with the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" drilling assembly from 17;105' to surface.

10/25/2014: Successfully function tested the Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Blue Pod. Ran 11-7/8"; 71.8 ppf; Q-125 HP casing from surface to 4;290'. Made up the 11-7/8" x 14" liner hanger and running tool to the 11-7/8" casing and ran in the hole with 11-7/8" casing on the landing string from 4;290' to 11;542'.  
"},{"   ":65,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-10-26","TEXT_REMARK":"10/26/2014: TIH; P/U cement head and space out with 11-7/8" shoe at 29;770'. Cemented 11-7/8" liner in place. Total cement pumped: 195 bbls; 1;095 cu ft; 805 sks; of 16.4 ppg tail cement. Pumped 19 bbls of 16.4 ppg spacer.

10/27/2014: TOH from 25;442' to surface with liner running tool.

10/28/2014: Successfully pressure tested casing and 11-7/8" liner against BSRs to 2;900 psi for 30 min. Successfully pressure tested BSRs to 250/2;900 psi for 5 min from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Functioned tested BSRs/CSRs from the Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod. M/U 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA and TIH to 14;908'. Performed BOP pressure testing with 15.5 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Rams tested to 250/10;300 psi; annulars tested to 250/5;700 psi; 15k surface equipment to 250/12;200 psi; 10k surface equipment to 250/9;200 psi; and kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi.

10/29/2014: Completed BOP pressure testing with 15.5 ppg SBM on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Rams tested to 250/10;300 psi; annulars tested to 250/5;700 psi; 15k surface equipment to 250/12;200 psi; 10k surface equipment to 250/9;200 psi; and kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi. TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 15;073' to 28;415'.

10/30/2014: Drilled out shoe track and 15' of new formation to 29;796'. Performed FIT to 16.3 ppg EMW (1;111 psi). Drilled 10-5/8" hole to 29;950'.

10/31/2014: Drilled 10-5/8" hole from 29;950' to 30;013'. Activated reamer. Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole to 30;593'. Weighted up to 15.7 ppg.

11/1/2014: Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 30;593' to 31;067'. Experienced losses. Spotted and dynamically squeezed LCM pill.
"},{"   ":66,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-11-02","TEXT_REMARK":"11/02/2014: Pumped; spotted; and dynamically squeezed LCM pills. Monitored well ballooning. Pumped First Response LCM pill in preparation to squeeze same.

11/03/2014: Spotted LCM pill. Pumped out of the hole to 30;003'. Squeezed 65 bbls of LCM pill. Circulated ballooned back volume above BOP. Closed annular and monitored well while boosting ballooned back volume from the riser.

11/04/2014: Boosted riser with annular closed. Opened annular and ballooned back 39 bbls until static. Flow check well static. Pumped out from 30;003' to 24;043'.

11/05/2014: Pumped out of the hole from 24;043' to 17;887'. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and Driller's panel on Yellow Pod. Function tested the Diverter from Driller's panel and Toolpushers's panel. Pumped out from 17;887' to 15;586'.

11/06/2014: Pumped out of the hole from 15;586' to 10;972'. TOH from 10;972' to 1;755'.

11/07/2014: TOH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 1;755' to surface. Function tested BSR/CSR from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Made up 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA and TIH to 6;854'.

11/08/2014: Tripped in hole from 6;854' to 30;932'. Pumped LCM sweep.
"},{"   ":67,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-11-09","TEXT_REMARK":"11/09/2014: Completed pumping a 100 bbl 15.7 ppg SBM lost circulation material (LCM) sweep at 31;067'. Drilled the 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;067' to 31;285' with 15.7 ppg SBM while pumping another 100 bbl 15.7 ppg SBM LCM sweep to control losses. Circulated and conditioned the hole with 15.7 ppg SBM at 31;285'. A total of 1;385 bbls of SBM was lost to the formation for the 24 hour period. 

11/10/2014: Continued to circulate and condition the hole at 31;285' for 10 hours; no losses observed. Pumped out of the hole from 31;285' to 25;061' with observed losses while pumping and ballooning during flow checks and connections. A total of 315 bbls of SBM ballooned back from the formation for the 24 hour period. 

11/11/2014: Continued to pump out of the hole from 25;061' to 14;906' with minimal losses and ballooning. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.7 ppg SBM from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod; tested rams to 250/10;200 psi and annulars to 250/5;700 psi. A total of 7 bbls of SBM was lost to the formation for the 24 hour period. 

11/12/2014: Continued pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.7 ppg SBM from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod; tested rams to 250/10;200 psi and annulars to 250/5;700 psi. No SBM was lost to or gained from the formation for the 24 hour period.

11/13/2014: Completed pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.7 ppg SBM from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod; tested rams to 250/10;200 psi and annulars to 250/5;700 psi. Pressure tested 15k surface equipment to 250/12;200 psi; 10k surface equipment to 250/9;200 psi; and kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi. Successfully function tested the BOPs from the Driller's panel on the Blue Pod and the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod. Successfully function tested the diverter from the Drillers and Toolpusher's panels. Pumped out of the hole with the 10-3/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 14;906' to 10;700' with minimal losses and ballooning. Tripped out of the hole with the 10-3/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 10;700' to surface. A total of 7 bbls of SBM ballooned back from the formation for the 24 hour period.

Note: Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Gust Woldtvedt (Chevron) on 11/13/2014 to proceed with running and cementing the 9-3/8" contingency liner to secure the well.

11/14/2014: Successfully function tested the Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod. Ran 9-3/8"; 39 ppf; Q-125 HP casing from surface to 1;815'. Made up the 9-3/8" x 11-7/8" liner hanger and running tool to the 9-3/8" casing and ran in the hole with the 9-3/8" casing on the landing string from 1;815' to 12;365'. 

11/15/2014: Continued to run in the hole with the 9-3/8" casing on the landing string from 12;365' to 31;280'. Performed cement operations as follows: Pumped 100 bbls of 16.4 ppg lead spacer followed by 108 bbls (606 cu ft/ 446 sacks) of 16.8 ppg Class H cement slurry; then 20 bbls of 16.4 ppg spacer and determined floats successfully held. Successfully set and released from the 9-3/8" x 11-7/8" liner hanger. Tripped out of the hole with the landing string and liner hanger running tool from 29;470' to 29;379' and circulated 15.7 ppg SBM through the drill string and running tool.
"},{"   ":68,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-11-16","TEXT_REMARK":"11/16/2014: Finished circulating 15.7 ppg SBM through the drill string after the cement job. Tripped out of the hole with the liner hanger running tool and landing string from 29;379' to surface. Successfully pressure tested the Blind Shear Rams and 9-3/8"; 39 ppf; Q-125 HP casing to 250/1;800 psi. Tripped in the hole with the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" drilling assembly from surface to 1;104'.

11/17/2014: Continued to trip in the hole with the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" drilling assembly from 1;104' to 4;631'. Successfully function tested the Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Blue Pod. Tripped in the hole with the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" drilling assembly from 4;631' to 10;945'. Pressure tested BOPs on 5" drill pipe with 15.7 ppg SBM; tested Rams to 250/10;200 psi; Lower Annular to 250/5;700 psi; and Upper Annular 250/3;500 psi. Tripped in the hole with the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" drilling assembly from 10;945' to 19;486' while pressure testing 15k surface equipment to 250/12;200 psi; 10k surface equipment to 250/9;200 psi; and kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi. 

11/18/2014: Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.7 ppg SBM; tested Rams to 250/10;200 psi and Annulars to 250/5;700 psi. Completed pressure testing surface equipment and kelly hose. Successfully function tested the BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod. Successfully function tested the diverter from the Driller's and Toolpusher's panels. Tripped in the hole with the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" drilling assembly from 19;486' to 30;650'. Washed down with 15.7 ppg SBM and tagged the upper float collar at 31;066'.

Note: On 11/18/2014; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval via email to Amanda Pena (Chevron) to reduce mud weight from 15.7 ppg to 15.4 ppg ahead of drilling the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole section provided the precautions indicated in the original notification from Chevron were in place and to notify BSEE if any flow was experienced while flow checking during and after the displacement.

11/19/2014: Drilled out cement from 31;066' to 31;220' while displacing the well from 15.7 ppg to 15.4 ppg SBM. Performed a flow check halfway through the displacement with 15.4 ppg SBM from 31;220' to a height of 15;600' in the annulus and 15.7 ppg SBM from 15;600' to surface; well remained static. Continued drilling out cement from 31;220' to 31;240' and completed displacing the well from 15.7 ppg to 15.4 ppg SBM. Performed a second flow check after the well was completely displaced to 15.4 ppg SBM with the bit at 31;240'; well remained static. Drilled out the remaining cement; casing shoe; and rat hole from 31;240' to 31;285'. Performed a third flow check with the bit at 31;285'; well remained static. Drilled 10' of new formation from 31;285' to 31;295'. Circulated and conditioned the hole with 15.4 ppg SBM.

Note: On 11/19/2014; J. Freeman (BSEE) gave approval via email to Jay Gagneaux (Chevron) to continue drilling ahead because Chevron was still in CFR compliance with two of three valves on the top drive passing the high pressure test; but instructed Chevron to stop drilling and repair the valves should a second valve (2 of 3) not pass the high pressure test. 

11/20/2014: Performed a formation integrity test with 15.4 ppg SBM to 1;323 psi for an equivalent surface mud density of 16.2 ppg. Drilled the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole from 31;295' to 31;654' with 15.4 ppg SBM.

11/21/2014: Continued drilling the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole from 31;654' to 31;165' with 15.4 ppg SBM.

11/22/2014: Continued drilling the 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole from 31;165' to 32;684' with 15.4 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":69,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-11-23","TEXT_REMARK":"11/23/2014: Drilled 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole from 32;684' to 33;000'

11/24/2014: Drilled 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole from 33;000' to 33;038'. TOH to 24;870'.

11/25/2014: Function tested the BOPs from Driller's panel on the Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod. Function tested the diverter from Driller's and Toolpusher's panels. TOH from 24;870' to surface.

11/26/2014: TIH with 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" BHA from surface to 23;855'.

11/27/2014: TIH from 23;855' to 33;038'. Drilled 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole from 33;038' to 33;421' while displacing wellbore to 15.3 ppg SBM.

11/28/2014: Drilled 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" hole from 33;421' to well TD at 33;750'. Circulated bottoms up and weighted up to 15.4 ppg SBM.

11/29/2014: Pumped out of the hole from 33;750' to 32;952'. TOH from 32;952' to 8;610'.

Note: On 11/29/2014; Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner of the Houma District BSEE were given written notification that during routine maintenance on the Santa Ana's lifeboats and hoisting systems; a crewman was attempting to latch the lifeboat back to the catch hooks that lift the boat. The individual lost a shepards hook and his hard hat overboard without recovery."},{"   ":70,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-11-30","TEXT_REMARK":"11/30/2014: Tripped out of hole with 8-1/2" x 9-7/8" BHA from 8;610' to surface. Ran in hole with wireline run #1 tool string: HNGS/ZAIT/GPIT/QCNT/HLDS/CMR+/ECS from surface to 33;750'. Logged formation from 33;750 to 33;672' with HNGS/ZAIT/GPIT/QCNT/HLDS/CMR+/ECS. 

12/01/2014: Pulled out of the hole with wireline run #1 tool string from 33;762' to surface. Ran in hole with wireline run #2 tool string: GR/NGI/MSIP/HLDS from surface to 33;710'.

Note: Amanda Pena (Chevron) was granted written approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 12/01/2014 @ 14:52 hrs to extend BOP pressure testing until 12/10/2014 as follows; "Considering no workstrings will be ran across the BOP during logging operations and the BSR will be primary well control method; Chevron may delay BOP & Diverter function and pressure testing until December 10th. The BOPs must be pressure and function tested upon the first trip in hole with workstring. This approval is based upon the wellbore being stable since TD and remaining stable. If the situation changes please let us know."

12/02/2014: Successfully completed wireline run #2 and pulled out of hole with tool string. Function tested BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel on Blue pod and Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Ran in hole with wireline run #3 tool string: HTGC/HP-MDT to 31;568'. Performed formation pressure sampling with wireline run #3: HTGC/HP-MDT.

12/03/2014: Continued performing formation pressure sampling with wireline run #3: HTGC/HP-MDT to 33;560'. Finished taking pressure samples at 24:00 hrs.

12/04/2014: Performed formation fluid sampling with wireline run #3: HTGC/HP-MDT from 32;473' to 31;508'. Pulled out of hole with wireline run #3: HTGC/HP-MDT from 33;580' to surface. 

12/05/2014: Ran in hole with wireline run #4: HTGC/HP-MDT from surface to 32;023'. Successfully performed formation fluid sample at 32;023'. Unsuccessfully attempted to take formation fluid sample at 32;255'; experienced MDT pump failure. Pulled out of hole from 32;255' to surface with wireline run #4: HTGC/HP-MDT. Changed out MDT pump. Ran in hole with wireline run #5 (attempt 2): HTGC/HP-MDT from surface to 2;900'.

12/06/2014: Continued running in hole with wireline run #5 (HTGC/HP-MDT) from 2;900' to 32;400'. Performed formation fluid sampling with wireline run #5: HTGC/HP-MDT from 32;245' to 33;218'. 
"},{"   ":71,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-12-07","TEXT_REMARK":"12/07/2014: Completed wireline run #5 (HTGC/HP-MDT) performing formation fluid sampling and pressure testing from 33;774' to 32;074' and pulled out of the hole to surface. 

12/08/2014: Ran in the hole with wireline run #6 [HTGC/MSCT-E (XL-ROCK) descent 1] from surface to 32;845'. Performed rotary sidewall coring from 32;845' to 31;300' and pulled out of the hole to surface. 

12/09/2014: Ran in the hole with wireline run #6 [HTGC/MSCT-E (XL-ROCK) descent 2] from surface to 33;571'. Performed rotary sidewall coring from 33;571' to 32;840'.

Note: Bobby Nelson gave written approval via email to Amanda Pena (Chevron) on 12/09/2014 at 09:35 hrs to postpone BOP testing until 12/14/2014 and advised that a BSR/CSR Function shall be performed on the next wireline trip out of the hole.

12/10/2014: Continued with wireline run #6 [HTGC/MSCT-E (XL-ROCK) descent 2) performing rotary sidewall coring from 32;840' to 32;014' and pulled out of the hole to surface. Successfully function tested the BSR/CSR from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod. Ran in the hole with wireline run #7 (CHECKSHOT/VSP) from surface to 31;000'. 

12/11/2014: Continued to run in the hole with wireline run #7 (CHECKSHOT/VSP) from 31;000' to 33;400'. Performed vertical seismic profile surveys from 33;400' to 22;800'; checkshot surveys from 22;300' to 8;670'; and pulled out of the hole to surface.

12/12/2014: Continued checkshot surveys from 8;670' to 5;296' and pulled out of the hole to surface. Ran in the hole with wireline run #8 [HTGC/MSCT-E (XL-ROCK) descent 1] from surface to 33;264'. Performed rotary sidewall coring from 33;264' to 32;667' and pulled out of the hole to surface.

12/13/2014: Ran in the hole with wireline run #8 [HTGC/MSCT-E (XL-ROCK) descent 2] from surface to 32;995'. Performed rotary side wall coring from 32;995' to 31;983'.

Note: Bobby Nelson gave written approval via email to Amanda Pena (Chevron) on 12/13/2014 at 09:33 hrs to postpone BOP testing until 12/15/2014 due to extended wireline operations.
"},{"   ":72,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-12-14","TEXT_REMARK":"12/14/2014: Completed wireline run #8 (HTGC/MSCT-E (XL-ROCK) descent 2); performing rotary sidewall coring from 32;995' to 31;465' and pulled out of the hole to surface. 12/15/2014: Completed a casing caliper survey from 13;000' to surface and pulled out of the hole. Tripped in the hole with the cement stinger; test stands; Special BOP Test Tool (SBOPTT) and Dual Cam Tool from surface to 11;269'. Pressure tested BOPs on 5" drill pipe with 15.4 ppg synthetic based mud (SBM); tested Rams to 250/10;300 psi; Lower Annular to 250/5;700 psi; and Upper Annular 250/3;500 psi. Tripped in the hole with the cement stinger from 11;269' to 11;459'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.4 ppg SBM; tested Rams to 250/10;300 psi and annulars to 250/5;700 psi. 

Note: Bobby Nelson gave written approval via email to Amanda Pena (Chevron) on 12/15/2014 at 13:46 hrs to postpone the casing test to 12/20/2014 to allow for setting of 3 open hole cement plugs and the 9-3/8" EZSV (E-Z Sliding Valve) packer.

12/16/2014: Continued testing BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 15.4 ppg SBM; tested Rams to 250/10;300 psi and annulars to 250/5;700 psi. Successfully function tested the BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Driller's Panel on the Yellow Pod. Successfully function tested the Diverter from the Driller's and Toolpusher's panels. Set the SBOPTT to isolate the well and released the drill string from the Dual Cam Tool. Pressure tested the Blind Shear Rams to 1;800 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM against the SBOPTT. Successfully function tested the Blind Shear and Casing Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Blue Pod and from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow Pod. Successfully performed the acoustic communication test. Reengaged the Dual Cam Tool and tripped out of the hole from 11;459' to 6;099' to retrieve the test stands; SBOPTT and Dual Cam Tool. Tripped in the hole with the cement stinger from 6;099' to 12;369'.

Note: On 12/16/2014; Jay Gagneaux (Chevron) notified Josh Ladner and Bobby Nelson (BSEE) that the upper VBR successfully pressure tested on 5" pipe but the lower VBR would not succesfully test on 5" pipe.

12/17/2014: Continued to trip in the hole with the cement stinger from 12;369' to 33;750'; stopping to break circulation at 18;800'; 25;500'; and 31;200'. Circulated and conditioned the hole at 33;750' with 15.4 ppg SBM. Spotted an 800' balanced cement plug in open hole from 33;750' to 32;950' with 57 bbls (320 cu ft/ 230 sacks) of 16.6 ppg cement slurry 

12/18/2014: Pulled out of the cement plug from 33;750' to 32;950' and circulated bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM. Spotted an 800' balanced cement plug in open hole from 32;950' to 32;150' with 74 bbls (416 cu ft/ 299 sacks) of 16.6 ppg cement slurry. Pulled out of the cement plug from 32;950' to 32;150' and circulated bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM. Spotted a 1;200' balanced cement plug in open hole and inside the 9-3/8" casing from 32;150' to 30;950' with 107 bbls (600 cu ft/ 432 sacks) of 16.6 ppg cement slurry. Pulled out of the cement plug from 32;150' to 30;950' and began circulating bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM. 

12/19/2014: Completed bottoms up circulation with 15.4 ppg SBM. Tripped out of the hole with the cement stinger from 30;950' to surface. Tripped in the hole with a 9-3/8" EZSV (E-Z Sliding Valve) packer from surface to 4;359'.

12/20/2014: Continued to trip in the hole with the 9-3/8" EZSV packer from 4;359' to 30;950'. Circulated and conditioned the hole at 30;950' with 15.4 ppg SBM. Set the ESZV packer at 30;950'. Began negative test procedure of the EZSV packer to 2;288 psi (equivalent fresh water gradient from Mean Seal Level to 6;100' TVD).
"},{"   ":73,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-12-21","TEXT_REMARK":"12/21/2014: Performed negative test to an 8.3 ppg EMW at 6;100' with 6.6 ppg base oil at 2;810 psi. Note:  On 12/23/2014; Amanda Pena (Chevron) received approval from Bobby (BSEE)  to swap the steps of the APM procedure; allowing for the setting of the 13-3/4" EZSV; positive test EZSV; pump the 500' plug on top; and then perform the negative test.

12/24/2014: Tripped in hole and set 13-3/4" EZSV at 18;020'. Pressure tested against EZSV to 1;800 psi. Pumped 156.2 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil down string to achieve a test pressure of 2;500 psi in preparation for negative test.

12/25/2014: Negative tested well to an 8.3 ppg EMW at 6;100'. Displaced wellbore from 6;100'; riser; choke line; kill line; and boost line from 15.4 ppg SBM to seawater. 12/26/2014: Pulled and laid out diverter. Unlatched BOP. Moved rig 500' off location. Laid out landing joint; slip joint and pulled LMRP/BOP on riser from 5;103' to 4;693'.

12/27/2014: Pulled LMRP/BOP on riser from 4;693' to 2;083'.
"},{"   ":74,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-06-07","TEXT_REMARK":"06/07/2015: Wait on loop current to subside. Ran LMRP/BOP on riser from 644' to 2;894'.

06/09/2015: Pressure tested choke and kill lines to 250/11;300 psi high. Tested rigid conduit and boost to 250/5;000 psi high. 06/10/2015: Tripped in hole with Dril-Quip test plug and dual cam from 367' to 5;307'. Performed Accumulator Drawdown test. Pressure tested BOPs on 4-1/2" DP with 8.6 ppg SW.

06/12/2015: Tripped out of hole from 3;824' to surface with Dual Cam/BOP test plug. Tripped in hole from surface to 5;387' with Dril-Quip Multi-Purpose Tool and retrieved the Nominal Bore Protector.
