Performed diverter function test on 4-1/2" drill pipe. 

Note: Amanda Pena (Chevron) received verbal approval via telephone conversation with Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to test the BSR to 3;500 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater against the casing instead of the BOP test tool. Chevron will follow up by submitting a red lined procedure in an RPD.

06/13/2015: Tripped in hole with 12-1/4" cleanout BHA from surface to 941'. Function test BSR/CSR on Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod. 09/30/2015: TOH with 13-3/8" RTTS. TIH to 31;550' MD and spotted cement plug #3 on top of 11-7/8" EZSV from 31;299' to 30;799' MD. TOH to 25;393' MD. Spotted cement plug #4 across 11-7/8" liner top from 25;393' to 24;693' MD. TOH to 21;165' MD.

10/01/2015: Continued TOH to 19;030' and spotted cement plug #5 across 14" liner top from 19;030' to 18;330' MD. TOH from 19;030' MD to surface. While TOH; function tested BOP on 6-5/8" DP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested diverter on 6-5/8" DP from Driller's panel. TIH with 13-3/8" EZSV from surface to 911' MD.

10/02/2015: Continued TIH with 13-3/8" EZSV; set at 17;750' MD and performed positive pressure test to 3;500 psi; good test. Spotted cement plug #6 from 17;750' to 17;250' MD. TOH to 9;800' MD and displaced well from 15.4 ppg to 13.5 ppg SBM from 9;800' to surface. TOH from 9;800' to 6;925' MD.

10/03/2015: Continued TOH from 6;925' to surface. Run in hole (RIH) with perforating guns to 9;475' MD on wireline. Fire perforating guns at 9;475' MD. Pull out of hole (POOH) with wireline from 9;475' MD to surface. Attempted to establish injection rates and could not establish injection. TIH with casing cutter to 9;433'. Performed cut and attempted to establish injection rates and could not establish injection. TOH with casing cutter.
"},{"   ":93,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063502,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-10-04","TEXT_REMARK":"10/04/2015: Tripped out of hole from 8;152' to surface with casing cutting assembly. Closed blind shear ram and attempted to establish injection rates of 3;500 psi with 3-5 bbl/min. Tripped in hole from surface to 9;438' with casing cutting assembly. Cut casing at 9;433' and tripped out of hole from 9;438' to surface with casing cutting assembly. A successful pressure test was done on the blind shear rams and casing shear rams. The blind shear rams were tested to 250 psi (low) for 5 minutes and 3;000 psi (high) for 5 minutes. The 14" x 13-3/4" casing was successfully tested. The blind shear ram and casing shear ram function test was performed. The Driller's panel; Blue Pod; verified that the blind shear ram and the casing shear ram were successfully tested. The Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; verified that the blind shear ram and the casing shear ram were successfully tested. Tripped in hole from surface to 5;023' with nominal bore protector retrieving assembly. 

10/05/2015: Tripped in hole from 5;023' to 7;163' and landed out to retrieve the nominal bore protector. Tripped out of hole from 7;163' to 1;999' and laid out the nominal bore protector. Tripped in hole from 1;999' to 7;161' for mill and flush run. Tripped out of hole from 7;161' to 1;903' and laid out mill and flush assembly. Tripped in hole from 1;903' to 9;763' with lockdown sleeve retrieval assembly. 

10/06/2015: Tripped out of hole from 8;218' to 4;586' with lockdown sleeve retrieval assembly. Tripped in hole from 4;586 to 9;909' with lockdown sleeve retrieval tool. Tripped out of hole from 9;909' to surface with actuator ring and lockdown retrieval assembly. Tripped in hole with spear fishing assembly from surface to 5;256'. Tripped out of hole with spear fishing assembly and remaining lockdown sleeve components from 5;256' to 2;615'.

10/07/2015: Tripped out of hole with lockdown sleeve from 2;615' to surface. Tripped in hole from surface to 7;098'; multi-purpose tool at 5;195'; engaged 14" seal assembly components; and tripped out of hole to 6;540'. Closed annular with 25k overpull. Performed BOP function test on 5-7/8" drill pipe from the Yellow Pod of the Driller's panel and from the Blue Pod of the Toolpusher's panel. Performed the diverter function from the Driller's panel in 27 seconds and from the Toolpusher's panel in 27 seconds. Tripped out of hole with 14" seal assembly and multi-purpose running tool from 6;540' to surface.

10/08/2015: Tripped in hole with retrievable test-treat and squeeze (RTTS) assembly from surface to 5;354'. Attempted to achieve an injection rate for squeezing cement across 16" x 18" annulus. Tripped out of hole from 5;354' to surface with RTTS assembly. Tripped in hole with 4-1/2" cement stinger from surface to 9;634'. A cement plug containing 105 barrels of 16.6 ppg cement was pumped from 9;700' to 9;000'. Tripped out of hole from 9;634' to 3;496'.

Note: On 10/08/2015; Amanda Pena (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to set the #7 plug; cut and pull 14"; and for 72 hour BOP extension. 

10/09/2015: Tripped out of hole from 3;496' to surface with 4-1/2" cement stinger. Tripped in hole from surface to 5;662' with casing cutting tool. Cut casing at 5;662'. Tripped out of hole with casing cutting assembly from 5;662' to surface. Tripped in hole with 14" spear assembly from surface to 5;266'. Engaged spear into 14" casing and tripped out of hole with 14" spear assembly and 405.24' of 14" casing from 5;266' to 106'.

10/10/2015: Tripped out of hole with 14" spear assembly and 405' of 14" casing from 106' to surface. Tripped in hole from surface to 5;638' with 16" EZSV and set EZSV at 5;628'. Spaced out at 5;612' and performed positive pressure test on EZSV with 1;000 psi for 15 minutes. Tripped out of hole from 5;612' to surface. Tripped in hole from surface to 5;399' with packer. 
"},{"   ":94,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608114063502,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-10-11","TEXT_REMARK":"10/11/2015: Performed inflow test. Pumped 130 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil to 1550 psi. Test successful; monitored well for 30 min and no flow. Displaced base oil out of well. Tripped in hole with 4-1/2" cement stinger from surface to 4;459'. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod. Tripped in hole with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 4;459' to 5;615'. Displaced wellbore from SBM to seawater until observed at surface. Pumped plug #8 (surface plug); 99 bbls of cement slurry. Displaced cement with 120 bbls of seawater. Tripped out of hole with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 5;615' to 5;300'. 

10/12/2015: Tripped out of hole with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 5;300' to surface. Picked up diverter running tool and latched into diverter. Picked up diverter to rotary table. Made up landing joint to telescopic joint. Scoped in and locked telescopic joint. Unlocked wellhead connector and observed BOP lift from wellhead. 

10/13/2015: Pulled LMRP/BOPs on riser from 5;228' to 4;964'. Note: Suspended operations periodically due to loop currents.

10/14/2015: Pulled LMRP/BOPs on riser from 4;964' to 3;254'. Note: Suspended operations periodically due to loop currents.

10/15/2015: Pulled LMRP/BOPs on riser from 3;254' to 194'. Note: Suspended operations periodically due to loop currents. 

10/16/2015: Pulled LMRP/BOPs from 194' through splash zone and landed on transport cart. Transferred LMRP/BOPs to set-back area. 
"},{"   ":95,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-09-14","TEXT_REMARK":"09/14/2016: Continue between well maintenance on critical path equipment. 

Note: Mr. Harry Wilson (Chevron) provided 72 hr written notification to Mr. Bobby Nelson and Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE) that the Pacific Sharav will be stump testing the BOP for Anchor 4 on September 17th; 2016.

09/15/2016: Continue between well maintenance on critical path equipment. 

09/16/2016: Trip In Hole (TIH) with 36" Conductor Casing from surface to 5;000' MD. Position rig over well center and spud Anchor #4 at 20:00 hrs. Tag seabed at 5;044' MD and jet in 10' while monitoring seafloor for flow - static. Jet 36" casing from 5;044' MD to 5;300' MD on main rotary. TIH with 26" x 32" BHA on auxiliary rotary from surface to 4;401' MD.

09/17/2016: Continue to jet 36" casing from 5;300' MD to 5;357' MD on main rotary. Perform slack off test and monitor wellhead for subsidence - no subsidence observed. Release running tool from wellhead and Trip out of hole (TOH) from 5;357' MD to surface. Continue to TIH with 26" x 32" BHA on auxiliary rotary from 4;401' MD to 4;999' MD. Move rig to locate auxiliary rotary over wellhead. Wash down from 4;999' MD to 5;353' MD. Drill 26" x 32" hole section from 5;353' MD to 5;518' MD with 8.6 ppg seawater. Continue to drill from 5;518' MD to 5;790' MD with 10.1 ppg Water-Based Mud (WBM).
"},{"   ":96,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-09-18","TEXT_REMARK":"09/18/2016: Continue drilling 26" x 32" hole section from 5;790' MD to 5;942' MD in 10.1 ppg WBM. Pick up (P/U) drill string to 5;810' MD and pump 10.5 ppg lignite pill. Displace wellbore to 11.0 ppg WBM. Perform flow check - well static. Trip out of hole (TOH) from 5;810' MD to 4;999' MD. Trip in hole (TIH) with 28" casing on auxiliary rotary from 4;635" MD to 5;029' MD. Center main rotary over wellhead and TIH from 5;029' MD to 5;261' MD. Displace string from 8.6 ppg seawater (SW) to 11.0 ppg WBM and TIH with 28" casing from 5;261' MD to 5;820' MD. Land hanger in Low Pressure Wellhead (LPWH). Pump 510 bbls (2;863 cu ft) of foamed lead cement slurry and confirm returns to surface with ROV pH meter. Pump 191 bbls (1;072 cu ft) of tail cement slurry and displace with 171 bbls of 8.6 ppg SW. Cement in place at 23:30 hrs. Check floats - not holding. Shut in and Wait On Cement (WOC) to gain 100 psi compressive strength.

09/19/2016: Continue to WOC. Check floats - floats holding. Release hanger from running tool and TOH from 5;375' MD to 5;034' MD on the main rotary. TIH with 26" drilling assembly from surface to 5;394' MD on the auxiliary rotary. Wash down and tag Top of Cement (TOC) at 5;722' MD. Drill cement and shoe track from 5;722' MD to 5;790' MD with 11.0 ppg WBM. Displace wellbore to 10.1 ppg WBM while drilling cement and shoe track from 5;790' MD to 5;858' MD. Wash down to 5;942' MD and drill 26" hole section from 5;942' MD to 5;998' MD. 

09/20/2016: Continue to drill 26" hole section from 5;998' MD to 7;141' MD in 10.1 ppg WBM on the auxiliary rotary. Displace wellbore to 10.9 ppg WBM while drilling from 7;141' MD to 8;393' MD. 
Offline: Run 22" casing from surface to 3;213' MD on the main rotary. 

09/21/2016: Continue to drill 26" hole section from 8;393' MD to 10;510' MD in 10.9 ppg WBM on the auxiliary rotary. Pump lignite pill and displace wellbore from 10.9 ppg WBM to 12.5 ppg WBM. TOH from 10;510' MD to 7;879' MD. 
Offline: Continue to run 22" casing from 3;213' MD to 4;801' MD on the main rotary.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) provided 72 hr notice of initial latch-up BOP testing on Anchor 4 to Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) and Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE).

09/22/2016: Continue to TOH with 26" drilling assembly from 7;879' MD to surface on the auxiliary rotary. Continue to run 22" casing from 4;801' MD to 4;924' MD on the main rotary. Center main rotary over the LPWH and run 22" casing from 4;924' MD to 5;168' MD. Run 23" x 22" casing from 5;168' MD to 5;446' MD. TIH with inner string from surface to 5;271' MD. Displace string to 12.5 ppg WBM and TIH with 23" x 22" casing and inner string on landing string from 5;168' MD to 10;479' MD. Land out High Pressure Wellhead (HPWH) in LPWH and perform 50k overpull.
	
09/23/2016: Pump 1;134 bbls (6;367 cu ft) of foamed lead cement slurry and confirm returns to surface with ROV pH meter. Pump 214 bbls (1;201 cu ft) and displace with 268 bbls of 8.6 ppg SW with a lift pressure of 1;750 psi. Cement in place at 05:30 hrs. Check floats - floats holding. Preload HPWH and release Mechanical Rigid Lockdown Tool (MRLD) from HPWH. Displace 22" casing to 12.5 ppg WBM. TOH from 10;312' MD to surface. 

09/24/2016: Splash Blow Out Preventer (BOP) at 02:50 hrs. Perform pressure test of choke and kill lines to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high. Perform pressure test of boost line and rigid conduit line to 250 psi low/ 5;000 psi high. All tests performed with 8.6 ppg SW and recorded utilizing IPT SureTec software. Run BOP on marine riser from surface to 4;603' MD.
"},{"   ":97,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-09-25","TEXT_REMARK":"09/25/2016: Continue running BOP on marine riser from 4;603' MD to 4;898' MD. Perform pressure test of choke and kill lines to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high. Perform pressure test of boost line and rigid conduit line to 250 psi low/ 5;000 psi high. All tests performed with 8.6 ppg seawater (SW) and recorded utilizing IPT SureTec software - successful tests. Make up (M/U) telescopic joint and landing joint. Lower telescopic joint into marine riser tensioner (MRT) ring and engage hands free goose necks (HFGN). Perform pressure test of choke and kill lines to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high. Perform pressure test of boost line and rigid conduit line to 250 psi low/ 5;000 psi high. All tests performed with 8.6 ppg SW and recorded utilizing IPT SureTec software - successful tests. Land and latch BOP onto wellhead at 10:25 hours. Lay down (L/D) landing joint and pressure test wellhead connector and 22" casing against BSR to 2;600 psi. Test performed with 8.6 ppg SW and recorded utilizing IPT SureTec software - successful test. Pick up (P/U) and install diverter. Trip in the hole (TIH) with BOP testing assembly from surface to 990' MD/TVD and function diverter from Secondary Panel - successful function. Continue TIH from 990' MD/TVD to 5;779' MD/TVD in 8.6 ppg seawater while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Close test rams from Primary Panel; close middle pipe rams (MPR) with acoustic system and pressure test MPR and test rams to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high on 6-5/8" drill pipe (DP) with 8.6 ppg seawater. 

09/26/2016: Continue pressure testing test rams and MPR with acoustic system on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high - successful test. TIH with BOP test assembly from 5;779' MD to 5;991' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Land BOP test plug in wellhead and unlatch from blind shear ram (BSR) test tool. Trip out of the hole (TOH) from 5;031' MD to 4;696' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Perform BOP initial latch-up testing on BSR with 8.6 ppg SW to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high from Primary Panel; Blue Pod. TIH with BSR retrieval assembly from 4;696' MD to 5;031' MD and engage BOP test plug assembly while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Unseat BOP test tool and TOH with BOP test assembly from 5;991' MD to 5;780' MD and space out 6-5/8" DP across BOP while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Perform accumulator drawdown test from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod. Pressure test BOP on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high from Primary Panel; Blue Pod. Annular pressure test performed to 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high from Primary Panel; Blue Pod. All tests performed with 8.6 ppg SW and recorded utilizing IPT SureTec software - successful tests. 

09/27/2016: Continue pressure testing BOP on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high for rams and 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high for annulars. All tests performed with 8.6 ppg SW and recorded utilizing IPT SureTec software - successful tests. Perform BOP function test on 6-5/8" DP from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod - successful test. TOH with BOP testing assembly from 5;780' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Continue pressure testing choke/kill lines; manifold; and surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 12;200 psi high. Top drive equipment pressure tested to 250 psi low/ 6;500 psi high. All tests performed with 8.6 ppg SW and recorded utilizing IPT SureTec software - successful tests. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA from surface to 4;346' MD in 8.6 ppg SW while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Perform diverter function test from Primary Panel - successful test. Perform BSR function test from Secondary Panel - successful test. Continue TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly on 6-5/8" DP from 4;346' MD to 10;413 ' MD and confirm top of cement (TOC) in 22" casing by setting 15 k-lbs down. Displace well to 10.8 ppg SBM/ 11.0 ppg DH MW. 

09/28/2016: Continue to displace well to 10.8 ppg SBM/ 11.0 ppg DH MW. Record slow circulating rates (SCR) and perform choke drill. Begin drilling out cement and 22" shoe track from 10;413' MD to 10;471' MD. Wash and ream rathole from 10;471' MD to 10;510' MD. Drilled 10' of new formation from 10;510' MD to 10;520' MD and performed formation integrity test (FIT) with 11.0 ppg SBM (DH MW) to 583 psi for a 12.07 ppg equivalent downhole mud weight. Begin drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 10;520' MD to 10;649' MD and activate 21" reamer. Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 10;649' MD to 11;370' MD with 10.8 ppg SBM. Begin weighting up SBM from 10.8 ppg surface/ 11.0 ppg DH to 11.0 surface/ 11.2 ppg DH SBM and continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 11;370' MD to 12;022' MD. 

09/29/2016: Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;022' MD to 13;950' MD with 11.2 ppg DH SBM. Performed static influx test (SIT) and spotted 50 bbls of 16.0 ppg SBM in 18-1/8" rathole. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from 13;950' MD to 6;259' MD in 11.2 ppg DH SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. 

09/30/2016: Continue TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from 6;259' MD to surface in 11.2 ppg DH SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Rigged up (R/U) 18" x 17-7/8" casing handling equipment and ran in hole (RIH) with 18" x 17-7/8" casing. M/U 18" hanger; released running tool and TIH with 6-5/8" 27# DP inner string from surface to 3;561' MD in 11.0 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. M/U running tool to 18" hanger. 

10/01/2016: RIH with 18" x 17-7/8" casing; inner string and 18" hanger on 6-5/8" landing string from 3;858' MD to 13;802' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Land out 18" casing hanger into 18" supplemental adapter at 10;062' MD. Circulated and conditioned mud prior to cement job; observed 115 bbls of losses during circulation. Rig up cement lines and pumped 140 bbls (786 cu ft) of Class 'H' 16.4 ppg cement slurry. Displaced cement slurry with 409 bbls 11.0 ppg SBM with a lift pressure of 470 psi. Cement in place at 15:20 hrs. Check floats - floats holding. Observed 505 bbls total losses throughout the cementing operation. Wait on cement until 100 psi compressive strength achieved with annular closed while monitoring riser on trip tank - riser static. Set 18" seal assembly and applied 2;000 psi with 11.0 ppg SBM to set and pressure test - good test. Release running tool from 18" hanger and flow check well - well static. 

Note: On 10/01/2016; Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received written approval from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) to proceed with operations after experiencing losses on the 18" cement job pending a successful FIT.
"},{"   ":98,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-10-02","TEXT_REMARK":"10/02/2016: Began tripping out of hole (TOH) with 18" Casing Hanger Seal Assembly Running Tool (CHSART) and inner string from 13;513' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Function test diverter from Secondary Panel - successful test. Make up (M/U) and trip in hole (TIH) with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from surface to 6;857' MD. Perform BOP function test on 6-5/8" drill pipe (DP) from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. Continued TIH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from 6;857' MD to 13;500' MD with 11.2 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW) SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Performed casing test to 2;000 psi on 18" casing - good test. Conducted Well Control drill while tripping with drill crew H.

10/03/2016: Weight up mud from 11.2 ppg DHMW SBM to 12.4 ppg DHMW SBM while washing down to tag top of cement (TOC) inside 17-7/8" casing at 13;670' MD. Began drilling cement and shoe track inside 17-7/8" casing with 12.4 ppg DHMW SBM until bit fell out of cement below shoe at 13;809' MD. Washed and reamed rathole and drilled 10' of new formation from 13;950' MD to 13;960' MD. Circulated and conditioned mud. TOH to 13;671' MD inside the 17-7/8" shoe. Performed formation integrity test (FIT) with 12.4 ppg DHMW SBM to 952 psi to achieve a DHMW of 13.73 ppg at the 17-7/8" shoe - successful test. Began drilling 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 13;960' MD to 14;400' MD. Began to weight up mud from 12.4 ppg DHMW SBM to 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Continued drilling 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 14;400' MD to 16;061' MD with 12.8 DHMW SBM. Conducted Choke Drill and Well Control drill while drilling with drill crew F. 

10/04/2016: Continued drilling 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 16;061' MD to 17;856' MD. TOH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA due to low ROP from 17;856' MD to 15;079' MD in 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static.

10/05/2016: Continued TOH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from 15;079' MD to surface in 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Observed over-torqued connections in the 6-5/8" 27# and 6-5/8" 34# drill pipe. Broke out over-torqued connections with rig tongs between 120-135 k-ft-lbs of torque. 

10/06/2016: M/U and TIH with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from surface to 17;575' MD in 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Washed and reamed with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from 17;575' MD to 17;856' MD. Continued drilling 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 17;856' MD to 18;199' MD with 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM. 
	
10/07/2016: Continued drilling 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 18;199' MD to 19;571' MD while weighting up mud system from 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM to 13.0 ppg DHMW SBM. Began observing lost returns while circulating with 13.0 ppg DHMW SBM - total of 102 bbls lost from 19;540' MD to 19;571' MD. Performed flow check - well static. Continued drilling 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 19;571' MD to 19;682' MD. Observed 25 bbls lost while drilling from 19;571' MD to 19;682' MD. Observed 9 bbls gained on connection flow back profile and shut in well on lower annular. Monitored pressures on choke and kill lines for 45 minutes with no increase in pressure - confirmed ballooning. Lined well up on mini trip tank for 15 minutes and monitor for returns - well static. Open lower annular and flow check well on trip tank while tracking time and volumes. Observed decreasing trend in volume ballooning back. Staged up pumps to verify circulation without losses. Began circulating bottoms up while adding lost circulation material (LCM) pill into 13.0 ppg DHMW SBM drilling fluid system. Conducted Emergency Disconnect System (EDS) Well Control drill with drill crew F.

10/08/2016: Continued circulating bottoms up with 13.0 ppg DHMW SBM until returns observed at surface. Reduced mud weight from 13.0 ppg DHMW SBM to 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM with periodic flow checks. Flow check well with 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM - well static. Continued drilling 16-1/2" x 19" hole section from 19;682' MD to 20;670' MD with 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM and LCM sweeps. Conducted Well Control pit drill with drill crew H. 
"},{"   ":99,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-10-09","TEXT_REMARK":"10/09/2016: Drill ahead with 16.5" x 19" BHA from 20;670' MD to 21;135' MD with 12.8 ppg DHMW. Encounter unexpected sand near TD; consult town on plan forward. Pump Hi-Vis sweep and circulate to surface. TOH from 21;135' MD to 7;562' MD. Perform Diverter Function test from Primary Panel. Perform BOP function test from Primary Panel on Blue Pod and from Secondary Panel on Yellow Pod. Continue to TOH from 7;562' MD to 5;933' MD. Observe tight spot (30k overpull) at bit depth 5;935' MD. Work pipe through area while circulating. Continue troubleshooting drag in 22" casing. Conducted Well Control drill while drilling with drill crew F.

10/10/2016: Continue to troubleshoot drag in 22" casing. Circulate at 875 gpm and slack off to 5;933' MD. Observe 13k WOB initially and weight began to fall off. Chase WOB while circulating to 6;012' MD. Continue to circulate debris into riser. TOH wet to 5;036' MD retrieving wear sleeve from wellhead. Jet wellhead with bit. TOH from 5;036' MD to surface with 16.5 x 19" BHA. Made up 16.5 x 19" Rat Hole Eliminator BHA and TIH from surface to 6;150' MD. Spaced out a 40# DP test stands across BOP and begin testing BOPs.

Function tested BSR from Primary Panel on Blue Pod & Secondary Panel on Yellow Pod.
Function tested CSR from Primary Panel on Blue Pod & Secondary Panel on Yellow Pod.

Note: BSEE Inspection: Josh Naquin & Paul Reeves on board to perform monthly inspection and witness trial of HES Fast Pass testing system.

Note: On 10/10/2016; Mr. Steven Scruggs received email approval from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) to test UOK; UIK; UOC; and UIC to permitted annular test pressure instead of MASP + 500.

10/11/2016: Pressure test BOPs on 6-5/8" pipe. TIH from 4;950' MD to 20;826' MD. Ream hole from 21;000' to 21;135' MD. Pump 100 bbl Hi-Vis sweep and circulated out of hole. Spot 16.0 ppg mud in rathole. TOH from 21;135' MD to 13;838' MD. Attempt to pull test reamer against 18" shoe; unsuccessful. TOH from 13;838' MD to 10;634' MD.

Pressure tested BOP on 6-5/8" pipe with 12.8 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW) SBM from Secondary Panel on Yellow Pod.

Note: BSEE Inspection: Josh Naquin & Paul Reeves departed rig @ 11:37 hrs.

10/12/2016: TOH with 16.5" x 19" reamer assy from 10;634' MD to 6;240' MD. Boost slug out pipe. Activate Churchill sub and wash from 6;240' MD to 4;870' MD. Deactivated Churchill sub. Pump slug and TOH from 4;870' to 93'. Surface test reamer; unsuccessful. Rack back and layout remaining 93'. Clean excess mud and equipment off rig floor. Slip and cut drill line. Make up 16.5" x 19" reamer assy and RIH from surface to 13;842' MD. Conducted Well Control drill while tripping with drill crew F.

Note: On 10/12/2016; Mr. Steven Scruggs received email approval from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) to use 6-5/8" V-150 Drillpipe in 34# and 27# weights. 

10/13/2016: Drop ball and activate reamer; pull tested against 18" shoe; successful. TIH with 16.5" x 19" cleanout assy from 13;842' MD to 20;945' MD. Stage pumps up and ream from 20;945' MD to 21;125' MD. Pump 100 bbl hi-vis sweep and circulate out. Spot 16.0 ppg PAD mud in rathole. TOH from 21;135' MD to 13;830' MD.
	
10/14/2016: Continue TOH with 16.5" x 19" cleanout assy from 13;830' MD to 6;427' MD. Function test diverter from Secondary Panel; and function test BOP from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod. Continue TOH with 16.5" x 19" cleanout assy from 6;427' MD to 5;529' MD. Activate Churchill sub and wash from wellhead profile from 5;529' MD to 4;970' MD. Deactivate Churchill sub; pump slug and TOH from 4;970' MD to surface. Rig up 16" casing handling equipment and begin RIH with 16" casing from surface to 1;363' MD. 

10/15/2016: Continue RIH with 16" casing from 1;363' MD to 13;495' MD. 

Function tested BSR from Primary Panel on Yellow Pod & Secondary Panel on Blue Pod.
Function tested CSR from Primary Panel on Yellow Pod & Secondary Panel on Blue Pod.

"},{"   ":100,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-10-16","TEXT_REMARK":"10/16/2016: Continued trip in hole (TIH) with 16" casing from 13;495' MD to 15;745' MD in 12.8 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW) SBM. Made up 16" hanger and TIH with 16" casing on 6-5/8" landing string (LS) to 16" shoe depth of 21;100' MD/TVD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Attempted to circulate and condition mud prior to cement job - no returns observed. Rigged up cement lines and pumped 409 bbls (2296 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg; Class H cement slurry. Displaced cement slurry with 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Observed 572 bbls total losses throughout the cementing operation. 

10/17/2016: Continued displacing cement with 12.8 DHMW SBM. 900 psi lift pressure was observed. Losses were expected during this job at the 18" casing shoe based on the simulations which were certified by the P.E. Lift pressure during the job matched the simulations; suggesting losses were at the 18" shoe. Set 16" seal assembly at 5;308' and applied 5;000 psi with 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM to set and pressure test - good test. Released running tool from 16" hanger and flow checked well - well static. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with LS to surface. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from surface to 15;685' MD in 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Pressure tested 16" casing with 12.8 DHMW SBM to 4;800 psi for 30 minutes - good test. Conducted Well Control Pit drill with drill crew B. 

10/18/2016: Continued TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 15;685' MD to 20;397' MD in 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Washed down and tagged top of cement at 20;758' MD. Drilled cement from 20;758' MD to 21;050' MD. Weighted up from 12.8 ppg DHMW SBM to 13.4 ppg DHMW SBM while drilling cement from 20;758' MD to 21;050' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Continued drilling cement and 19-1/2" rathole from 21;050' MD to 21;130' MD. Drilled 10' of new formation from 21;130' MD to 21;140' MD. Performed formation integrity test with 13.4 ppg DHMW SBM to 1;830 psi for a 15.1 ppg equivalent DHMW. Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 21;140' MD to 21;636' MD with 13.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Conducted Well Control Pit drill and Choke drill with drill crew H. 

10/19/2016: Continued drilling 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 21;636' MD to 22;350' MD with 13.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Weighted up from 13.4 ppg DHMW SBM to 13.8 ppg DHMW SBM while drilling from 22;350' MD to 22;832' MD. Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 22;832' MD to 23;859' MD with 13.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Weighted up from 13.8 ppg DHMW SBM to 14.2 ppg DHMW SBM while drilling from 23;859' MD to 23;987' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

10/20/2016: Continued drilling 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 23;987' MD to 24;585' MD with 14.2 ppg DHMW SBM. Weighted up from 14.2 ppg DHMW to 14.4 ppg DHMW while drilling from 24;585' MD to 25;365' MD. Performed flow check on trip tank - well static. TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 25;365' MD to 24;500' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

10/21/2016: Continued TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 24;500' MD to surface in 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Function tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe from on Yellow Pod; Secondary Panel; and from Blue Pod; Primary Panel - good test. Function tested diverter from Primary Panel - good test.

Note: On 10/21/2016; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs; granting approval to proceed with setting the 14" shallow with the understanding that the shoe may not be drilled out until complete permit review has been performed including WCST.

10/22/2016: TIH with 14" liner from surface to 6;320' MD in 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Made up 14" hanger and TIH with 14" liner on 6-5/8" LS to 13;988' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.
"},{"   ":101,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-10-23","TEXT_REMARK":"10/23/2016: Continued tripping in hole (TIH) with 14" x 13-5/8" liner on 6-5/8" Landing String (LS) from 13;988' MD to 25;154' MD in 14.4 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW) SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Washed down from 25;154' MD to 25;353' MD. Set 14" x 13-5/8" liner at 25;360' MD/ 25;232' TVD. Attempted to circulate and condition mud prior to cement job - observed 76 bbls losses. Rigged up cement lines and pumped 135 bbls (758 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg cement slurry. Displaced cement slurry with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Observed 812 bbls losses throughout the cementing operation. Losses were expected during this job at the 16" casing shoe based on the simulations which were certified by the P.E. Lift pressure during the job matched the simulations; suggesting losses were at the 16" shoe. Total losses observed were 888 bbls. Waited on cement (WOC) due to float equipment failure.

10/24/2016: Continued WOC then applied 6;950 psi with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM to set the 14" hanger at 19;017' MD. Verified hanger expansion with 830 psi annular pressure increase. Performed flow check - well static. Released running tool from 14" hanger. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 14" liner running tool to surface. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TIH with cleanout run from surface to 5;460' MD in 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Jetted top of 16" liner; 23" casing; high pressure wellhead housing (HPWH); and BOP with circulating sub. Conducted Well Control Trip Drill with drill crew H and crew B. 

10/25/2016: Continued jetting 23" casing; HPWH; and BOP with jetting sub with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. TOH with cleanout run from 5;188' MD to surface in 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TIH with BOP test tool (BOPTT) and test plug assembly from surface to BOPTT land out depth. Spaced out 5-7/8" drill pipe across BOP and began pressure testing BOPs to 250 psi (low)/ 9;500 psi (high) with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM from Primary Panel; Blue Pod - successful tests. Performed BOP function test from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod - successful tests. While pressuring up to test the Blind Shear Rams (BSR); pressure abruptly bled off from 9;325 psi to 1;397 psi. Decision was made to retrieve BOPTT to surface to troubleshoot. TIH to retrieve BOPTT; which was located at 5;085' MD - 28' below HPWH landing shoulder. Picked up and attempted to pull BOPTT through HPWH with no success. 

10/26/2016: Continued BOPTT recovery operations with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Attempted to recover BOPTT by staging up overpull to 514 kips with no success. Continued pressure testing surface equipment to 11;200 psi and waited on forward plan from Chevron. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

Note: On 10/26/2016; Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided written notification that Chevron may delay BSR pressure testing and any other BOP component pressure testing until wellhead issues have been resolved.

10/27/2016: Continued waiting on forward plan from Chevron with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Waited on milling and fishing equipment. Conducted Well Control Drill crew B. 

10/28/2016: Continued waiting on milling and fishing equipment. TIH with 18.62" milling assembly on 6-5/8" drill pipe in 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM from surface to 3;983' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Function tested Diverter from Secondary Panel - successful test. Conducted Well Control Drill crew H. 

10/29/2016: Continued TIH with 18.62" milling assembly in 14.4 DHMW SBM from 3;983' MD to 5;036' MD with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Milled trip shoulder in HPWH from 5;036' MD to 5;037' MD. Circulated bottoms up. TOH with 18.62" milling assembly from 5;037' MD to surface. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TIH with NuTec tool from surface to 5;086' MD and engaged BOPTT. Recovered BOPTT above HPWH and cleared stack with no issue. TOH with mule shoe; tailpipe; BOPTT and NuTec tool to 502' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Function tested BSR and casing shear rams from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; as well as from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod. 
"},{"   ":102,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-10-30","TEXT_REMARK":"10/30/2016: Continue tripping out of hole (TOH) with mule shoe and tailpipe below the BOP test tool (BOPTT) from 502' MD to surface in 14.4 ppg downhole mud weight (DHWM) SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Make up (M/U) and trip in hole (TIH) with cleanout BHA from surface to 5;261' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Wash 16" top of liner and BOP from 5;261' MD to 4;794' MD. TOH with cleanout assembly from 4;794' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. TIH with mule shoe and 6-5/8" drill pipe (DP) from surface to 5;371' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Begin pressure testing BOP on 6-5/8" DP with 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM from Primary Panel; Blue Pod. Pressure test rams to 250 psi low/ 9;500 psi high and annulars to 250 psi low/ 5;800 psi high. 

10/31/2016: Continue pressure testing BOP on 6-5/8" DP with 14.4 ppg DHWM SBM from Primary Panel; Blue Pod - good test. TOH with mule shoe and 6-5/8" DP from 5;371' MD to surface while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Pressure test surface BOP equipment (BOPE) - good tests. Pressure test 14" liner against blind shear rams (BSR) to 4;500 psi for 30 minutes - good test. Continue pressure testing surface equipment. M/U 12-1/4" x 16-1/2" BHA and TIH to 105' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Perform Well Control Pit Drill with drill crew B.

Function test BOP from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod.
Function test diverter from Primary Panel.
Function test BSR/ casing shear ram (CSR) from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod.

Note: Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Justin Ledet (BSEE) that Chevron may proceed with testing BSRs to the 14" liner test pressure of 4500 psi for the following hole section.

Note: Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Justin Ledet (BSEE) that Chevron's testing the upper UOC; UIC; UOK; and UIK valves to the annular test pressure for all tests is acceptable.

Note: Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Justin Ledet (BSEE) that Chevron may proceed with drilling the 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" section as outlined in the revised procedure.

11/01/2016: Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 105' MD to 24;836' MD in 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Wash down from 24;836' MD to 25;134' MD and tag top of cement (TOC) at 25;134' MD with 15 k-lbs weight down. Begin weighting up active system from 14.4 ppg DHMW SBM to 15.0 ppg DHMW SBM; and begin drilling cement with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 25;134' MD to 25;293' MD. Perform Well Control Pit Drill with drill crew D.

Note: Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided written notification that Chevron may proceed with permitted operations with the 'LMRP accumulator charge' circuit in the 'block' position.

11/02/2016: Complete weighting up active system to 15.0 ppg DHMW SBM; and weight up active system from 15.0 ppg DHMW SBM to 15.6 ppg DHMW SBM. Drill out cement and shoe track with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 25;293' MD to 25;365' MD. Wash and ream rathole and drill 10' of new formation from 25;365' MD to 25;375' MD. TOH from 25;375' MD to 25;264' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Perform formation integrity test (FIT) with 15.6 ppg DHMW SBM and 1;225 psi FIT pressure to a 16.5 ppg DHMW equivalent at the 14" liner shoe - good test. Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 25;264' MD to 25;375' MD. Begin drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 25;375' MD to 25;415' MD with 15.6 ppg DHMW SBM. Perform Choke Drill with drill crew D.

11/03/2016: Continue drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 25;415' MD to 25;550' MD with 15.6 ppg DHMW SBM. Drop activation ball and activate 14-1/2" reamer. Continue drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 25;550' MD to 26;054' MD with 15.6 ppg DHMW SBM. Weight up active system from 15.6 ppg DHMW SBM to 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM.

11/04/2016: Continue drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 26;054' MD to 26;610' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM. TOH from 26;610' MD to 25;221' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Perform function tests. TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 25;221' MD to 26;496' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. 
 
Function test BOP from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod.
Function test Diverter from Secondary Panel. 

11/05/2016: Continue TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 24;496' MD to 26;610' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Continue drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 26;610' MD to 27;506' MD.
"},{"   ":103,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-11-06","TEXT_REMARK":"11/06/2016: Continue drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 27;506' MD to 28;202' MD with 15.9 ppg down hole mud weight (DHMW) SBM. Perform Well Control Trip Drill with drill crew B.

11/07/2016: Continue drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 28;202' MD to 28;524' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM. Notice loss of returns at 28;524' MD at 70 bbl/hr static loss rate. Pick up off bottom to 28;516' MD; pump 100 bbl lost circulation material (LCM) sweep and losses slowed to 1 bbl/hr. Continue drilling 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 28;516' MD to 28;642' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM. Notice loss of returns at 28;642' MD at 18 bbl/hr static loss rate. Pump 93 bbl LCM into loss zone and perform flow check - 95 bbl/hr static losses. Trip out of hole (TOH) with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 28;642' MD to 28;423' MD - 120 bbl/hr losses. Close lower annular to minimize loss rate while preparing to pump LCM sweep. 

11/08/2016: Prepare to pump LCM sweep; flow checking well every hour - 42 bbl/hr losses. Drop diverter activation dart and pump 331 bbl LCM sweep. TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 28;423' MD to 28;170' MD while monitoring well on trip tank - 140 bbl/hr losses. Line up to bleed 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil into choke line to determine overbalance on well. TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 28;170' MD to 28;044' MD and make up cement head and shut annular. Perform Well Control Trip Drill with drill crew D. 

11/09/2016: Pump 96 bbls 15.8 ppg lead spacer; followed by 250 bbls 16.6 ppg cement and 30 bbls 15.8 ppg tail spacer. Displace cement with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM and pump cement into loss zone. Wait on cement to set and perform flow check - 195 bbl/hr losses observed. Spot 161 bbl (215 psi differential) reverse riser cap with 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil. Monitor well on trip tank with reverse riser cap in place - 4.8 bbl/hr losses. TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 28;044' MD to 23;041' MD while monitoring well on trip tank with reverse riser cap in riser - well static. 

11/10/2016: Continue TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 23;041' MD to surface in 15.9 ppf DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil in riser - well static. TOH with BSR closed with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA above BOP. Boost 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil riser cap out of riser with boost line. 

Function test BOP from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod.
Function test diverter from Primary Panel.
Function test blind shear ram (BSR) and casing shear ram (CSR) from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod. 

Note: On 11/10/2016; Steven Scruggs (Chevron) was given written approval from Justin Ledet (BSEE) to run 1000' of 5-7/8" DP as a cement stinger.

11/11/2016: Decision made to validate the integrity of 14" liner and 16" casing. Make up (M/U) 14" Retrievable Test Treat Squeeze (RTTS) packer and TIH from surface to 4;485' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with BSR closed while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. M/U side entry stand and spot 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil down drill pipe (DP) and displaced into riser with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM. Open BSR and monitor well on trip tank - well static. Continue TIH with 14" RTTS from 4;485' MD to 16;690' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. 

11/12/2016: Continue TIH with 14" RTTS from 16;690' MD to 19;164' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser while monitoring well on trip tank - well static. Set 14" RTTS packer at 19;150' MD in 14" liner; close annular and pressure test casing above 14" RTTS to 1;000 psi - good test. Release 14" RTTS and TIH from 19;164' MD to 25;088' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser while monitoring well on trip tank - 7 bbl/hr losses. Set 14" RTTS at 25;073' MD in 14" liner; close annular and pressure test casing above 14" RTTS to 1;000 psi - good test. Attempt open hole formation integrity test (FIT) to test formation below 14" RTTS to 450 psi with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM - failed test. Release 14" RTTS and TOH from 25;088' MD to 24;865' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser while monitoring well on trip tank - 3 bbl gain observed with tripping out. Performed flow check - well static. Perform Well Control Pit Drill with drill crew F.
"},{"   ":104,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-11-13","TEXT_REMARK":"11/13/2016: Continued trip out of hole (TOH) with 14" retrievable-test-treat-squeeze tool (RTTS) from 11;054' MD to 4;526' MD in 15.9 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW) SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed. Performed flow check - well static. With blind shear rams (BSR) closed; continued TOH with 14" RTTS from 4;526' MD to surface. Monitored well on trip tank - proper displacement was observed. Boosted out riser cap. With BSRs closed; tripped in hole (TIH) with open hole packer from surface to 4;460' MD. Spotted 161 bbls of 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap. Continued TIH with open hole packer from 4;460' MD to 15;242' MD. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap.

11/14/2016: Continued TIH with open hole packer from 15;242' MD to 25;730' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Performed flow check - well static. Set open hole packer at 25;735' MD. Exposed top of the packer to homogeneous 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM through kill line for 5 min - well static. Attempted to TIH with open hole packer - observed 10-15 kips drag at 25;731' MD. TOH with open hole packer from 25;730' MD to 14;262' MD. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed.

Note: On 11/14/2016; Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) to delay BOP pressure tests until the hole is static with a uniform mud weight in hole. 

11/15/2016: Continued TOH with open hole packer from 14;262' MD to 4;205' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed. Continued TOH with open hole packer from 4;205' MD to surface with closed BSRs. Monitored well on trip tank - proper displacement was observed. Boosted out riser cap. TIH with cement stinger assembly on from surface to 4;513' MD with closed BSRs. Spotted 161 bbls of 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap. Continued TIH with cement stinger from 4;513' MD to 9;208' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed. 

11/16/2016: Continued TIH with cement stinger from 9;208' MD to 25;176' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed. Function tested BOP from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; as well as from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod - successful tests. Function tested diverter from Secondary Panel - successful test. Continued TIH with cement stinger from 25;176' MD to 25;740' MD. Spotted 300 bbls LCM across potential loss zone. Spotted 171 bbls 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. TIH with cement stinger from 25;776' MD to 26;630' MD. Washed down from 26;630' MD to 26;895' MD. TIH with cement stinger and tagged at 26;881' MD with 20k down - attempted to work through obstruction without success. TOH with cement stinger from 26;881' MD to 25;251' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed.

11/17/2016: Continued TOH with cement stinger from 25;251' MD to surface in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 171 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Once above BOP; closed BSRs. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed. Boosted out reverse riser cap. TIH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from surface to 4;542' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with closed BSRs. Monitored well on trip tank - proper displacement was observed. Spotted 161 bbls of 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap. Continued TIH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 4;542' MD to 5;073' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. 

11/18/2016: Continued TIH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 5;073' MD to 25;343' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 161 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Monitored well on trip tank with reverse riser cap - proper displacement was observed. Boosted out riser cap. Spotted 171 bbl riser cap in riser. Continued TIH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 25;343' MD to 26;156' MD. Reamed with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 26;156' MD to 26;562' MD; while adjusting reverse riser cap in riser. 
 
11/19/2016: Continued reaming between 26;562' MD to 26;872' MD in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 171 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Tagged firm cement at 26;872' MD and continued to ream to 26;914' MD. Boosted out reverse riser cap. Spotted 216 bbls of 8.5 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Reamed from 26;914' MD to 28;628' MD; while adjusting reverse riser cap. Reamed through cement stingers at 26;958' MD; 27;012' MD; 27;045' MD. At 28;628' MD; observed packoff indications. Backreamed from 28;628' MD to 28;447' MD in in 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with 216 bbl 8.5 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. TOH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 28;447' MD to 27;933' MD. 

"},{"   ":105,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-11-20","TEXT_REMARK":"11/20/2016: Continued reaming down from 28;085' MD to 28;532' MD with 15.9 ppg down hole mud weight (DHMW) SBM in the well and 171 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser. Trip out of hole (TOH) with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 28;532' MD to 27;784' MD. Performed flow check - well static. TOH from 27;784' MD to 27;021' MD; managing riser cap as necessary. Closed lower annular element and open the well to 15.9 ppg DHMW through the kill line and established loss rate of 40 barrels per hour (bph). Placed 102 bbls of 6.6 ppg surface weight reverse riser cap and TOH from 27;091' MD to 25;343' MD. Flow check well at 14" shoe with 8 bph static loss rate. TOH from 25;343' MD to 22;729' MD.

11/21/2016: Continued to TOH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 22;279' MD to 4;607' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM and 171 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser; managing reverse riser cap as necessary. Performed flow check; well static. TOH from 4;607' MD to surface with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly. Made up cement stinger BHA and run in hole (RIH) from surface to 4;768' MD. Placed 135 bbl reverse riser cap and RIH from 4;768' MD to 8;130' MD. Function BSRs/CSRs from Blue Pod (Primary) and Yellow Pod (Secondary). 

11/22/2016: Continued to RIH with cement stinger from 8;130' MD to 18;385' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM in the well and 135 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser; managing riser cap as necessary. Pumped out 135 bbl reverse riser cap; placed 171 bbl riser cap and RIH from 18;385' MD to 28;187' MD. Washed down with cement stinger from 28;187' MD to 28;460' MD. Closed upper annular and boosted out reverse riser cap. R/U cement lines and placed reverse riser cap to pump 205 bbls of 16.8 ppg cement to set balanced cement plug #1. Began displacing balanced cement plug with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM with rig pumps.

Perform BOP function test from the Blue Pod (Primary) and Yellow Pod (Secondary). 
Perform Diverter function test from Blue Pod (Primary). 

Note: BSEE Inspectors Gabe Orellana; Chris Treland & Paul Reeves on location to perform rig inspection. Inspectors departed 14:15 hrs.

Note: On 11/22/2016 @ 18:05 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) granting approval to proceed with plugback operations.

11/23/2016: Continued displacing balanced cement plug with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM; spotting 1;000'; 205 bbls; balanced cement plug #1 at 28;460' MD with 171 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight reverse riser cap in the well. Pumped out of the cement plug from 28;460' MD to 26;853' MD and circulated 100 bbls of 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM to clear stinger. Wait on cement (WOC) for 9 hrs. Washed down with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM from 26;858' MD to 27;334' MD and observed pressure spike up to 2;800 psi. TOH to 27;254' MD and attempted to clear stinger by pressuring up down drill pipe to 4;500 psi; with no success. TOH to 26;900' MD and dropped Churchill circulating sub emergency opening ball. Let ball fall down drill pipe for 2 hrs before attempting to shift Churchill sub by pressuring up down drill pipe to 5;500 psi with no success. Established 148 bbl reverse riser cap and TOH wet from 26;775' MD to 25;262' MD to place cement stinger inside 14" shoe. Flow check well - well taking 15 bph losses. 

11/24/2016: Continued to TOH wet with plugged cement stinger from 25;262' MD to 8;130' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM in the well and 171 bbl 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser; adjusting riser cap as necessary. Observed well taking 30 bph losses while TOH. Boosted out reverse riser cap and re-established new reverse riser cap (171 bbls of 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil) to finish TOH. Performed flow check - observed loss rate of 15 bph. Continue TOH from 8;130' MD to 3;874' MD until stinger above BOP. Closed BSRs and continued to TOH to 1;962' MD with BSRs closed.

11/25/2016: Continue to TOH wet with plugged cement stinger from 1;962' MD to surface while monitoring losses and tracking reverse riser cap. Make up cement stinger assembly and RIH from surface to 4;804' MD. Opened up well down kill line and monitored well for loss rate - observed 4 bph losses. Opened BSRs and continue RIH from 4;804' MD to 16;320' MD while monitoring losses and reverse riser cap.

11/26/2016: Continued to RIH with cement stinger from 16;320' MD to 26;834' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM in the well and 180 bbl of 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil reverse riser cap in riser; adjusting riser cap as necessary. Washed down from 26;834 MD to 27;417' MD; tagging top of cement of balanced cement plug #1 at 27;417' MD. Placed new reverse riser cap in riser prior to pumping balanced cement plug #2. Pumped 200 bbls of 15.9 ppg DHMW LCM followed by 100 bbls of 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM prior to making up cement stand and pumping 999' balanced cement plug #2. Pump 205 bbls of 16.8 ppg surface weight cement to set balanced cement plug #2; displacing balanced cement plug with 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM. Cement plug spotted from 27;366' MD to 26;367' MD. Pull out of the cement plug while pumping; circulate 62 bbls of 15.9 ppg DHMW SBM to clear stinger; and continue TOH to 25;217' MD (into 14" shoe) while pumping. Shut in on lower annular and WOC (24 hrs).
"},{"   ":106,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-11-27","TEXT_REMARK":"11/27/2016: Continue to wait on cement for open hole plug #2 while shut in on lower annular. Perform flow check on trip tank by jumping annular with reverse riser cap in riser. Open annular and perform flow check; well static. Trip in hole (TIH) with cement stinger from 25;217' MD to 25;905' MD. Wash down and tag firm cement with 15k down at 26;362' MD. Pick up 50' to 26;312' MD. Close annular and open kill line to expose wellbore to 15.9 ppg down hole equivalent mud weight (DHEMW) SBM; observe 3.5 bph loss rate. Close annular and boost out riser cap. Establish new reverse riser cap and spot 250' above annular. Flow check well with new riser cap; well static. Make up cement stand and take baseline circulation pressures with 15.9 ppg DHEMW SBM. Begin pumping and displacing balanced cement plug #3.

11/28/2016: Continue displacing cement plug #3 with 15.9 ppg DHEMW SBM. Pull out of cement from 26;317' MD to 25;011' MD. Wash 11-7/8" hanger setting area from 25;011' MD to 24;973' MD while reciprocating pipe. Space out across BOP and shut in on lower annular and wait on cement for 10 hours. Flow check well on trip tank; well static. Trip out of hole (TOH) with cement stinger assembly from 24;937' MD to 7;065' MD.

Note: Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received email approval from Justin Ledet (BSEE) on 11/28/2016 that the adjusted test pressures of 9200 psi for Rams and 5400 psi for Annulars is acceptable.

11/29/2016: Continue TOH from 7;065' MD to 5;628' MD. Perform diverter function test from Secondary Panel. Open fail-safe valve; expose well to 15.9 ppg DHEMW SBM and monitor well; well static. Boost out riser cap. Opened lower annular and monitor well on trip tank; well static. Space out across BOP stack and pressure test BOPs utilizing Secondary Panel on Yellow Pod. TIH to 6;621' MD and circulate bottoms up (BU). Flow check well; well static. TOH to 3;875' MD. TIH from 3;875' MD to 5;276' MD and re-function test BOPs. TOH from 5;276' MD to surface with cement stinger. 

Perform Diverter function test from Secondary Panel.
Perform BOP function test from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod. 
Re-function BOP test from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod. 
Perform BOP pressure test on 5-7/8" pipe from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod; using 15.9 ppg DHEMW SBM. Rams tested to 250-350 psi low/ 9;200 psi high. Annulars tested to 250-350 psi low/ 5;400 psi high.

11/30/2016: Finish pressure testing surface equipment. Function test blind shear ram (BSR) and casing shear ram (CSR). Perform BSR and casing pressure test to 250 psi low/ 2;700 psi high. Rig up wireline (WL) equipment and run caliper log in 16" casing. Rig down wireline equipment. TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from surface to 15;205' MD.

Perform casing pressure test with 15.9 ppg DHEMW SBM from the Secondary Panel to 2;700 psi for 30 min.
Perform BSR pressure test to 250 psi low/ 2;700 psi high for 5 min with 15.9 ppg DHEMW SBM.
Function test BSRs and CSRs from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod. 

12/01/2016: TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 15;205' MD to 24;794' MD. Wash down and tag TOC at 24;800' MD with 15k down. Drill cement from 24;800' MD to 25;280' MD while displacing well from 15.9 ppg DHEMW SBM to 15.7 ppg DHEMW SBM. Finish displacing well to 15.7 ppg DHEMW SBM. Perform flow check; well static. Record slow circulating rates (SCRs) and choke line friction (CLF). Perform choke drill. Drill cement from 25;280' MD to 25;380' MD. Attempt to kick off from 25;380' MD to 25;468' MD; unsuccessful.

12/02/2016: Pick up to 25;460' MD and activate reamer. Reamed down from 25;460' MD to 25;465' MD. Perform pull test with reamer open; good test. Continue reaming to 25;470' MD. Attempt to kick off to 25;892' MD; unsuccessful. Circulate cuttings above 14" TOL. Perform flow check; well static. TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 25;892' to 11;378' MD.

12/03/2016: Continue TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 11;378' MD to surface. TIH with 12-1/4" BHA with 1.5 degree bent motor from surface to 21;128' MD. 
"},{"   ":107,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067300,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-12-04","TEXT_REMARK":"12/04/2016: Trip in hole with 12.25" x 1.5° bent motor assembly to 25;598' MD. Wash down to 25;893' MD and tag top of cement. Kick off cement by sliding from 25;893' to 25;909' MD. Drill rotating from 25;909' to 25;975' MD. Slide from 25;975' to 25;976' MD. Drill rotating from 25;976' to 25;993' MD. Slide from 25;993' to 25;995' MD. Back-ream from 25;995' to 25;848' MD. Wash down from 25;848' to 25;995' MD. Orientate tool face and slide from 25;995' to 26;010'. Drill rotating from 26;010' to 26;065' MD. Perform check shot surveys.

12/05/2016: Continue to circulate bottoms up from 26;065' MD to above 14" liner. Trip out of hole wet with 12.25" x 1.5° bent motor assembly from 26;065' to 25;188' MD. Flow check at shoe - static. Slug drill pipe and continue to trip out of hole from 25;188' MD to surface. Lay down bit and hand off bottom hole assembly to auxiliary rotary. Slip and cut drill line on main rotary. Trip in hole with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from surface to 12;779' MD.

12/06/2016: Trip in hole with 12.25" x 14.5" directional BHA from 12;779' to 14;427' MD. Perform diverter and BOP function test. Continue to trip in hole to 14" casing shoe and filled pipe. Trip in hole to 25;794' and washed to bottom at 26;065'; tag down with 7k. Start down-linking to power drive. Drill directionally with power drive from 26;065' MD to 26;120' MD. Take directional survey. Back-ream from 26;120' to 25;883' MD. Break DP connection at rig floor and drop reamer activation ball. Pump down to 14.5" reamer at 250 gpm with 750 psi. Verify reamer open by setting 10k down on old ledge at 25;802' MD. Open hole from 25;883' MD to 26;004' MD.

Perform diverter function test from Driller's (Primary) Panel.
Perform BOP function test on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's (Secondary) Panel with Yellow Pod and from Driller's (Primary) Panel with Blue Pod.

12/07/2016: Underream BP01 from 26;004' MD to 26;120' MD. Drill new 12.25" x 14.5" hole from 26;120' to 26;538' with 15.7 ppg DHMW.

12/08/2016: Drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" new hole according to directional plan from 26;538' to 27;575'.

12/09/2016: Drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" new hole according to directional plan from 27;575' MD to 28;317' MD.

12/10/2016: Drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" new hole according to directional plan from 28;317' MD to 29;222' MD.
"},{"   ":108,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-12-04","TEXT_REMARK":"12/04/2016: Trip in hole with 12.25" x 1.5° bent motor assembly to 25;598' MD. Wash down to 25;893' MD and tag top of cement. Kick off cement by sliding from 25;893' to 25;909' MD. Drill rotating from 25;909' to 25;975' MD. Slide from 25;975' to 25;976' MD. Drill rotating from 25;976' to 25;993' MD. Slide from 25;993' to 25;995' MD. Back-ream from 25;995' to 25;848' MD. Wash down from 25;848' to 25;995' MD. Orientate tool face and slide from 25;995' to 26;010'. Drill rotating from 26;010' to 26;065' MD. Perform check shot surveys.

12/05/2016: Continue to circulate bottoms up from 26;065' MD to above 14" liner. Trip out of hole wet with 12.25" x 1.5° bent motor assembly from 26;065' to 25;188' MD. Flow check at shoe - static. Slug drill pipe and continue to trip out of hole from 25;188' MD to surface. Lay down bit and hand off bottom hole assembly to auxiliary rotary. Slip and cut drill line on main rotary. Trip in hole with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from surface to 12;779' MD.

12/06/2016: Trip in hole with 12.25" x 14.5" directional BHA from 12;779' to 14;427' MD. Perform diverter and BOP function test. Continue to trip in hole to 14" casing shoe and filled pipe. Trip in hole to 25;794' and washed to bottom at 26;065'; tag down with 7k. Start down-linking to power drive. Drill directionally with power drive from 26;065' MD to 26;120' MD. Take directional survey. Back-ream from 26;120' to 25;883' MD. Break DP connection at rig floor and drop reamer activation ball. Pump down to 14.5" reamer at 250 gpm with 750 psi. Verify reamer open by setting 10k down on old ledge at 25;802' MD. Open hole from 25;883' MD to 26;004' MD.

Perform diverter function test from Driller's (Primary) Panel.
Perform BOP function test on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's (Secondary) Panel with Yellow Pod and from Driller's (Primary) Panel with Blue Pod.

12/07/2016: Underream BP01 from 26;004' MD to 26;120' MD. Drill new 12.25" x 14.5" hole from 26;120' to 26;538' with 15.7 ppg DHMW.

12/08/2016: Drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" new hole according to directional plan from 26;538' to 27;575'.

12/09/2016: Drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" new hole according to directional plan from 27;575' MD to 28;317' MD.

12/10/2016: Drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" new hole according to directional plan from 28;317' MD to 29;222' MD.
"},{"   ":109,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-12-11","TEXT_REMARK":"12/11/2016: Continued to drill with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 29;222' MD to hole section total depth of 29;420' MD in 15.7 ppg down hole mud weight (DHMW) SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Circulated hole clean while weighting up from 15.7 ppg DHMW SBM to 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Performed flow check - well static. 

12/12/2016: Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 29;420' MD to 18;980' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Function tested diverter on Secondary Panel - successful test. Continued TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 18;980' MD to 993' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Performed BOP function test on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod - successful test.

Note: Chevron received written notification from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 12/12/2016 @ 12:52 hrs that they have a 48hr extension for BOP test due 12/13/2016.

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs granting verbal approval to shallow set the 11.875" liner.

12/13/2016: Continued TOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 993' MD to surface. TIH with 11-7/8" liner from surface to 11;021' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Performed Blind Shear Rams/ Casing Shear Rams function test from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod - successful tests.

12/14/2016: Continued TIH with 11-7/8" liner from 11;021' MD to 29;392' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - lost 331 bbls. Began to take 50 kips weight at 29;392' MD. Washed down from 29;392' MD to 29;418' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - lost 36 bbls. Rigged up cement lines and pumped 117 bbls (657 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement slurry. Displaced cement slurry with 15.5 ppg DHMW SBM. Observed 1;181 bbls total losses throughout the cementing operation. Losses were expected during this job based on the simulations which were certified by the PE. Loss measurements and Lift pressure during the job suggests a TOC of 28;450'MD. Set 11-7/8" liner hanger at 24;444'. Confirmed hanger setting with 100 kips overpull. Performed flow check - well static. 

12/15/2016: TOH with 11-7/8" casing hanger running tool from 24;198' MD to 5;056' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Spaced out 5-7/8" drill pipe across BOP and began pressure testing BOPs to 250 psi (low) / 9;200 psi (high) with 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM from Primary Panel; Blue Pod - successful tests. TOH with 11-7/8" casing hanger running tool from 5;056' MD to 73' MD. Performed BOP Function test from Primary Panel; Blue Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Yellow Pod - successful tests. Function tested diverter from Primary Panel; Blue Pod - successful test.

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs granting approval to set 11-7/8" packer.

12/16/2016: TOH with 11-7/8" casing hanger running tool from 73' MD to surface. Picked up 11-7/8" drillable packer and TIH from surface to 26;373' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Pressure tested 11-7/8" casing with 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM to 2;800 psi for 30 min - successful test. 

12/17/2016: Continued TIH with 11-7/8" drillable packer from 26;376' MD to 28;700' MD. Set 11-7/8" drillable packer at 28;700' MD and released from it. Performed positive test to 1;000 psi for 15 min - successful test. Performed inflow test against 11-7/8" drillable packer with 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM in the wellbore. Pumped 178 bbls of 6.6 ppg surface weight base oil to achieve a 2;700 psi test pressure. Closed test rams. Bled back 32 bbls. No flow observed - successful test. Reversed out base oil. TOH with packer running tool from 28;529' MD to 12;365' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs granting approval to set the 16" packer; test; and to displace to seawater.
"},{"   ":110,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-12-18","TEXT_REMARK":"12/18/2016: Continue to pull out of hole to surface with 11.875" FasDrill running tool assembly in 15.8 ppg SBM. Make up 16" Archer packer assembly and run in hole to 5;502' MD to set Archer packer at 5;500' MD. Release from Archer packer and pull out of hole to 5;443' MD. Perform positive pressure test on 16" Archer packer to 3;500 psi and hold for 15 minutes - successful test. Displace surface lines and riser from 15.8 ppg synthetic based mud to seawater in preparation for wellhead work. Pull out of hole with Archer packer assembly to surface. Wait on weather.

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs granting approval to unlatch the blow out preventer and install the emergency wellhead.

12/19/2016: Continue waiting on weather. Lower diverter running tool into diverter housing and remove diverter. Pick up landing joint and make up to slip joint. Lock slip joint and unlatch BOP. Move rig to put auxiliary rotary table over well center.

12/20/2016: Run in with secondary wellhead running assembly and land secondary wellhead onto primary wellhead at 5;031' MD. Perform positive pressure test on secondary wellhead connection to 250 psi for 5 minutes and 3;500 psi for 5 minutes - successful tests. Run in with BOP and latch onto secondary wellhead. Perform overpull test with 100 kips and perform slump test with 320 kips set down - successful tests. Close blind shear rams from Driller's Panel (Primary Blue Pod) and pressure test BOP connection to 250 psi for 5 minutes and 1;000 psi for 5 minutes - successful tests. Run in hole with BOP test tool to 5;029' MD in seawater.

12/21/2016: Pressure test BOP connector to 350 psi low for 5 minutes and 12;200 psi high for 5 minutes with seawater - successful tests. Pull out of hole with BOP test tool from 5;029' MD to surface. Pick up and run in hole with 16" Archer packer retrieval assembly to 5;477'. Displace well from seawater to 15.8 ppg SBM. Successfully engage and unseat 16" Archer packer at 5;502' and pull out of hole to surface. Function test BOP on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Secondary Panel (Yellow Pod) and from Primary Panel (Blue Pod). Function test diverter from Secondary Panel (Yellow Pod).

12/22/2016: Run 14" x 13-3/4" x 13-5/8" tieback casing from surface to 11;012' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM.

Note; Gabe Orellana and Paul Reeves; BSEE Inspectors from the Houma District; arrived on the Pacific Sharav to perform rig inspection. The inspectors departed at 13:50 hrs. No INCs issued.

12/23/2016: Continue running 14" x 13-3/4" x 13-5/8" tieback casing from 11;012' MD to 13;773' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Make up 18-3/4" x 14" casing hanger; seal assembly; and casing hanger seal assembly running tool and run 5-7/8" drill pipe inner string inside casing to 18;268' MD. Run in hole with 14" x 13-3/4" x 13-5/8" tieback casing and 5-7/8" drill pipe inner string on 6-5/8" drill pipe landing string from surface to a land out depth of 5;029' MD with the 13-5/8" tieback shoe at 18;805' MD. 

12/24/2016: Made up cement stand and rigged up cement lines. Pumped 400 bbls of 13.8 ppg SBM prior to cementing 14" x 13-3/4" x 13-5/8" tieback casing. Pumped 253 bbl (1;422 cu ft) of 15.8 ppg cement slurry and began displacing cement slurry with 15.8 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":111,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-12-25","TEXT_REMARK":"12/25/2016: Continue cementing 14" x 13-3/4" x 13-5/8" tieback casing as per program. Total cement pumped 253 bbls (1;422 cu ft) of 15.8 ppg cement slurry. Displace cement with 15.8 ppg downhole equivalent mud weight (DHEMW) SBM. Set 14" casing hanger at 5;029'. Pressure test 14" seal assembly to 10;000 psi; good test. Release casing hanger seal assembly running tool (CHSART); trip out of hole (TOH) from 18;805' MD to surface with 6-5/8" drill pipe (DP) landing string; CHSART; 5-7/8" inner string. Make up and trip in hole (TIH) with 12-1/4" cleanout BHA from surface to 736' MD. Made up Drill-Quip multi-purpose tool (MPT)/ wear bushing; TIH from 736' MD to 5;794' MD and set 18-3/4" x 13-3/8" wear bushing in wellhead. TOH with DQ MPT/ 12-1/4" cleanout BHA from 5;794' MD to 2;733' MD.

12/26/2016: TOH with DQ MPT from 2;733' MD to 736' MD in 15.8 ppg DHEMW SBM. Continue TOH with 12-1/4" cleanout BHA from 736' MD to surface. Make up (M/U) and TIH with 12-1/4" cleanout BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from surface to 18;300' MD. Wash from 18;300' MD to 18;701' MD (top of float collar). Clean out shoe track from 18;701' MD to 18;747' MD. Circulate bottoms up and TOH from 18;747' MD to surface. 

12/27/2016; M/U 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" and TIH on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 8;029' MD. Space out and pressure test BOP on 5-7/8" DP with 15.8 ppg downhole equivalent mud weight to 250 psi low/ 9;200 psi high; good tests. Function test BOP stack.

Function test BSR/CSR rams from Primary Panel (Yellow Pod) and Secondary Panel (Blue Pod).
Pressure test BSR against casing and Fasdrill packer from Primary Panel (Blue Pod) to 250 psi low/ 3;000 psi high. 
Perform BOP pressure test on 5-7/8" DP from Secondary Panel (Yellow Pod).
Function test blow out preventer from Primary Panel (Blue Pod).

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE Houma District) @ 18:39 hrs on 12/27/2016 to proceed with permitted operations with leak on lower outer choke open circuit on Blue Pod.

12/28/2016: Finish pressure testing surface well control equipment with 15.8 ppg DHEMW SBM; good tests. Rig down (R/D) BOP testing assembly. TOH from 8;029' MD to 7;773' MD and perform diverter function. TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 7;773' MD to 18;754' MD. Wash down from 18;754' MD to 19;075' MD through tieback shoe and top of 14" liner. TOH from 19;075' MD to 18;754' MD into tieback shoe and circulate bottoms up. Continue to TIH from 18;754' MD to 28;412' MD. Wash down from 28;412' MD and tag 11-7/8" Fasdrill with 15k down at 28;700' MD. Function diverter from Driller's Control Panel (Primary). 

Note: On 12/28/2016; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs granting approval to proceed with drilling operations through step 17.4 of the proposed revised bypass permit.

12/29/2016: Tag Fasdrill packer at 28;700' MD with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA and drill packer to 28;706' MD. Chase packer to top of cement at 29;216' MD. Circulate bottoms up above BOP stack and boost to surface. Pressure test casing to 3;000 psi for 30 mins; good test. Drill out remnants of packer and shoe track from 29;216' MD to 29;416' MD. Wash to bottom and drill 10' of new formation from 29;420' MD to 29;430' MD. Circulate cuttings up above 11-7/8" top of liner. Perform FIT with 15.8 ppg DHEMW SBM to 16.44 ppg equivalent mud weight (898 psi); good test. Drill ahead from 29;425' MD to 29;502' MD with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA with 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM.  

12/30/2016: Drill 10-5/8" hole from 29;502' MD to 29;630' MD with 15.8 ppg DHEMW SBM. Drop reamer activation ball and pump ball down drill pipe to reamer. Did not get clear indication of reamer opening. Drill from 29;630' MD to 29;726' MD. Cycle near bit reamer and verify closure. Pull test upper reamer against 11-7/8" liner shoe. Continue to drill ahead from 29;726' MD to 29;882' MD. Power Drive not holding angle; decision made to stop drilling and circulate B/U. Pump out to 11-7/8" liner shoe from 29;882' MD to 29;390' MD. TOH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 29;390' MD to 27;000' MD. 

12/31/2016: Continue TOH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 27;000' MD to surface in 15.8 ppg DHEMW SBM. M/U and TIH with new 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA on from surface to 2;308' MD.

Note: On 12/31/2016; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs granting approval to utilize a LEFG to 16.36 ppg with a 0.3 ppg Safe Drilling Margin.
"},{"   ":112,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-01","TEXT_REMARK":"01/01/2017: Trip in hole (TIH) from 2;308' MD to 4;838' MD with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA. Continue to TIH from 4;838' MD to 8;016' MD and perform BOP stack function test; pull one stand and perform diverter function test. Continue to TIH from 8;016' MD to 29;663' MD (reamer out of 11-7/8" casing shoe). Drop activation ball and activate reamer; cycle near bit reamer and pull test reamer against 11-7/8" casing shoe. Wash and ream from 29;663' MD to 29;822' MD and drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 29;822' MD to 30;120' MD with 15.9 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW). Function test BOP on Driller's Primary Panel (Yellow Pod) and Toolpusher's Secondary Panel (Blue Pod). Function test diverter from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary).

01/02/2017: Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 30;120' MD to 30;154' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW. Take stethoscope pressure at 30;000' MD probe depth. Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 30;154' MD to 30;815' MD. Attempt to take stethoscope pressures with probe at 30;685' MD; 30;709' MD and 30;708' MD.

01/03/2017: Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 30;815' MD to 31;085' MD with 15.9 ppg DHMW. Observe losses and pick up off bottom to pump lost circulation material (LCM); losses stabilized. Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;085' MD to 31;130' MD. Circulate bottoms up (B/U) to evaluate cuttings. Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;130' MD to 31;170' MD. Circulate B/U to evaluate cuttings. Continue to drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;170' MD to 31;293' MD.

01/04/2017: Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;293' MD to 31;400' MD. Take stethoscope pressure at 31;211' MD. Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;400' MD to 31;420' MD. Observe gain in trip tank during connection. Shut well in and monitor pressure. Bleed off in 1 bbl increments to establish ballooning formation; ballooning confirmed. Open up well to trip tank; well static. Circulate B/U to 3;000' MD below BOP. Shut in on annular and finish circulating B/U through choke and kill line on full open choke. Flush choke and kill lines; sweep BOP. Open BOP; well static. Circulate and condition mud; reducing mud weight (MW) from 15.9 ppg to 15.8 ppg DHMW.

01/05/2017: Circulate and condition mud; reducing MW from 15.9 ppg to 15.8 ppg DHMW. Drill 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;420' MD to 31;608' MD. Circulate B/U to evaluate cuttings and stethoscope sample. Pump out of hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 31;429' MD to 30;530' MD.
