01/06/2017: Pump out of hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 30;530' MD to 29;416' MD 11-7/8" shoe. Trip out of hole (TOH) 29;416' MD to 4;585' MD. Downlink MWD tools. Slip and cut drill line. TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 4;585' MD to 6;240' MD. Function test BSR/CSR rams from Primary Panel (Blue Pod) and Secondary Panel (Yellow Pod).

01/07/2017: Pressure test BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 250 psi low/ 9;500 psi high with 15.8 ppg DHMW; good test. Continue pressure testing surface BOP components; good test. TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 6;240' MD to 25;203' MD. Pressure test BOP from Primary Panel (Blue Pod). Function test diverter from Driller's Control Panel (Primary). Function test BOP from Primary Panel (Blue Pod) and Secondary Panel (Yellow Pod).
"},{"   ":113,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-08","TEXT_REMARK":"01/08/2017: Continued to trip in hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 25;203' MD to 31;608' MD in 15.8 ppg downhole mud weight SBM. Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;608' MD to 31;714' MD. Correlated and recorded Stethoscope readings per Geology. Continued drilling 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 31;714' MD to 32;113' MD.

01/09/2017: Continued drilling 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 32;113' MD to 32;514' MD in 15.8 ppg downhole mud weight SBM. Circulate hole clean prior to pulling out of hole. Flow check and pull out of hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 32;514' MD to 28;665' MD.

01/10/2017: Pull out of hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 28;665' MD to surface in 15.8 ppg downhole mud weight SBM. Make up and trip in hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #1 to 7;070' MD.

01/11/2017: Continued to trip in hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #1 from 7;070' MD to 32;393' MD in 15.8 ppg downhole mud weight SBM. Wash last stand down while taking baseline parameters and tag bottom at 32;514' MD. Begin coring from 32;514' MD to 32;627' MD.

01/12/2017: Continue coring with 10-5/8" coring assembly #1 from 32;627' MD to 32;645' MD in 15.8 ppg in downhole mud weight SBM. Break off core; due to jamming in the core barrel; and pump out of hole to 29;400' MD. Circulate bottoms up and performed flow check - well static. Continue tripping out of hole from 29;400' MD to 7;587' MD.

01/13/2017: Continued to trip out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #1 from 7;587' MD to surface in 15.8 ppg in downhole mud weight SBM. Handle core #1 at surface; make up 10-5/8" coring assembly #2 and trip in hole from surface to 15;246' MD.

BSEE Inspectors from the Houma District arrived on the Pacific Sharav to perform rig inspection. The inspectors departed at 13:50.

01/14/2017: Continue tripping in hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #2 from 15;246' MD to 32;141' MD in 15.8 ppg in downhole mud weight SBM. Washed down from 32;141' MD to 32;645' MD and tagged bottom. Began coring from 32;645' MD to 32;678' MD. Function test BOP from Primary Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Secondary Panel; Blue Pod. Function test Diverter from Secondary.
"},{"   ":114,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-15","TEXT_REMARK":"01/15/2017: Continue coring with 10-5/8" coring assembly #2 from 32;678' MD to 32;717' MD in 15.5 pgg surface mud weight (SMW) and 15.8 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW) SBM. Due to low rate of penetration; the decision was made to stop coring and trip out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #2. Flow check well and trip out of hole from 32;717' MD to 9;508' MD.

01/16/2017: Continue tripping out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #2 from 9;508' MD to surface in 15.8 ppg DHMW. Make up 10-5/8" coring assembly #3 and begin tripping in hole from surface to 9;634' MD.

01/17/2017: Continue tripping in hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #3 from 9;634' MD to 32;455' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW. Wash down with 10-5/8" coring assembly #3 from 32;455' MD to 32;717' MD. Core with 10-5/8" coring assembly #3 from 32;717' MD to 32;763' MD. Due to jamming indication; the decision was made to trip out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #3. Flow check well and begin tripping out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #3 from 32;763' MD to 32;203' MD. 

01/18/2017: Continue tripping out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #3 from 32;203' MD to 1;363' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW.

01/19/2017: Continue tripping out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #3 from 1;363' MD to surface in 15.8 ppg DHMW. Make up and trip in hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #4 from surface to 6;384' MD. Make up top drive and space out across BOP. Begin pressure testing BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 15.5 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) on Yellow Pod - rams tested to 9500 psi; annulars to 5400 psi; surface equipment to 11;200 psi. Function test blind shear rams from Driller's Panel (Primary) Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) Blue Pod. 

01/20/2017: Continue pressure testing BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 15.5 SBM from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) on Yellow Pod. Continue to trip in hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #4 from 6;384' MD to 32;387' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW. Wash down with 10-5/8" coring assembly #4 from 32;387' MD to 32;763' MD. Core with 10-5/8" coring assembly #4 from 32;763' MD to 32;765' MD. Pressure test BOP from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) Yellow Pod. Function test BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel (Primary) Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Driller's Panel (Primary).

01/21/2017: Continue to core with 10-5/8" coring assembly #4 from 32;765' MD to 32;827' MD in 15.8 ppg DHMW. Flow check well and begin tripping out of hole with 10-5/8" coring assembly #4 from 32;827' MD to 25;485' MD.
"},{"   ":115,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-22","TEXT_REMARK":"01/22/2017: Trip out of hole (TOH) with 10-5/8" coring assembly #4 from 25;485' MD to 6;266' MD with 15.5 ppg surface mud weight (SMW) and 15.8 ppg downhole mud weight (DHMW). Flow check well; well static. TOH from 6;266' MD to surface.

01/23/2017: Trip in hole (TIH) with 10-5/8" drilling BHA from surface to 32;320' MD. Wash and ream down while logging at 120 ft/hr from 32;320' MD to 32;827' MD. Take slow circulation rates (SCR) and downlink measurement while drilling (MWD) tools. Drill 10-5/8" hole section from 32;827' MD to 33;002' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW and 15.8 ppg DHMW.

01/24/2017: Drill 10-5/8" hole section from 33;002' MD to well TD at 33;660' MD/ 33;046' TVD. Circulate and condition hole. TOH with 10-5/8" drilling BHA from 33;502' MD to 32;960' MD. Tight spot observed at 32;960' MD with 90k overpull. 

01/25/2017: Work pipe through tight spot at 32;960' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW and 15.8 ppg DHMW. Back ream from 32;960' MD to 32;250' MD. TIH from 32;250' MD to 33;660' MD. Circulate bottoms up (B/U) to 500' inside 11-7/8" liner shoe and TOH from 33;660' MD to 9;463' MD. Make up (M/U) and TIH with NuTec blind shear ram (BSR) test tool and Dril-Quip blow out preventer test tool (BOPTT) from 9;463' MD to 10;162' MD.

Mr. Steven Scruggs (CVX) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) at 07:23 hrs on January 25; 2017; "Chevron may delay casing evaluation for a period of 2 weeks. If more time is needed we can discuss additional extensions."

01/26/2017: Continue TIH from 10;162' MD to 14;492' MD and land BOPTT assembly in wellhead. Close lower annular; pressure up to 2;500 psi with and verify proper seat of BOPTT. Bleed pressure; open annular and back out of NuTec BSR test tool. Perform diverter function test from toolpusher's panel (secondary). Close blind shear rams (BSR) and begin pressure testing from toolpusher's panel (secondary) on yellow pod - rams tested to 3;000 psi with 15.5 ppg SMW and 15.8 ppg DHMW. TIH and engage NuTec BSR test tool and TOH from 14;492' MD to 9;463' MD. Space out across blow out preventer (BOP) and perform BOP function test from driller's panel (primary) on yellow pod and toolpusher's panel (secondary) on blue pod. Continue TOH to surface and rig up for wireline operations. Run in hole (RIH) from surface to 28;000' MD with wireline run #1. Function test Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary). Pressure test Blind Shear Rams from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) Yellow Pod. Function test Blow Out Preventer from Primary Panel on Yellow Pod and Secondary Panel on Blue Pod. 

01/27/2017 Continue to RIH with wireline run #1 from 28;000' MD to 33;687' wireline measured depth (WLM). Log main upward pass from 33;687' WLM to 29;416' MD at 900 ft/hr. Complete wireline run #1 and pull out of hole (POOH) from 29;405' MD to surface. M/U wireline run #2 and RIH from surface to 29;405' MD. Log down from 29;405' MD to 33;660' MD at 1;800 ft/hr.

01/28/2017: Continue RIH with wireline run #2 from 33;660' MD to 33;687' WLM. Commenced main sonic scanner up-log at 500 ft/hr then opened up the calipers and began the repeat pass borehole imaging down-log at 1;800 ft/hr. Performed sonic scanner repeat pass from 31;640' MD to 31;240' MD at 580 ft/hr. POOH to surface with wireline run #2. Function test BSR and casing shear rams (CSR) from driller's panel (primary) on blue pod and toolpusher's panel (secondary) on yellow pod. M/U and RIH from surface to 9;000' MD with wireline run #3. Function test blind shear rams and casing shear rams from Driller's Panel (Primary) on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) on Yellow Pod.
"},{"   ":116,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-29","TEXT_REMARK":"01/29/2017: Run in hole (RIH) with wireline run #1 - Descent 3 (GR/CMR) from 9;000' MD to 29;410' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Down-log open hole from 29;410' MD to 33;687' MD. Commence up-log from 33;687' MD to 31;050' MD at 800 ft/hr. Repeat down-log from 31;050' MD to 33;020' MD at 1;800 ft/hr. Continue up-log from 33;020' MD to 32;000' MD at 450 ft/hr. Complete wireline run #3 and pull out of hole (POOH) from 32;000' MD to surface. Flow check well - well static; flush choke and kill lines with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Flow check well - observed TT gaining 0.70 bbls/hr. Shut in well on BSRs and continue flow check - observed TT gaining at same rate. Swapped TT and monitored well- well static. Opened blind shear rams (BSR) and monitored well - well static. RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 4 (GR/MDT 1) from surface to 80' MD.     

01/30/2017: Continue RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 4 (GR/MDT 1) from 80' MD to 29;416' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Commence down-log from 29;416' MD to 31;473' MD. Begin taking pressure points in from 31;473' MD to 32;136' WLM.

01/31/2017: Continue logging with wireline run #1 - Descent 4 (GR/MDT 1) from 33;551' MD to 31;473' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. POOH from 31;473' MD to 30;473' MD to recalibrate tools and RIH from 30;473' MD to 32;268' MD and take fluid sample.  POOH from 32;268' MD to surface following pump malfunction. RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 5 (GR/MDT 2) from surface to 25;000' MD.

02/01/2017: Continue RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 5 (GR/MDT 2) from 25;000' MD to 32;266' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Log and take samples from 32;266' MD to 31;905' MD. Samples taken at 32;266' MD; 32;734' MD; 32;946' MD; 32;571' MD and 31;905' MD.

02/02/2017: Continue taking samples with wireline run #1 - Descent 5 from 31;905' MD to 32;104' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. POOH with wireline run #1 Descent 5 (GR/MDT 2) from 32;124' MD to surface. Samples taken at 31;902' MD; 31;900'MD; 31;572' MD and 32;124' MD. RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 6 (GR/MDT 3) from surface to 161' MD.

Note: Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided written notification to Mr. Steven Scruggs granting approval to delay BOP function test 24 hours.

02/03/2017: Continue to RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 6 (GR/MDT 3) from 161' MD to 32;373' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. POOH with wireline run #1 - Descent 6 (GR/MDT 3) from 32;373' MD to surface following tool communication problems. RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 6 (GR/MDT 3) from surface to 32;373' MD. Take fluid samples from 32;373' MD to 33;538' MD. Samples taken at 32;373' MD; 32;881' MD; 33;538' MD.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) at 13:13 hrs on February 3; 2017; "Chevron may delay BOP & Diverter function and pressure testing for a period of 6 days or prior to any workstring being ran across the stack; whichever occurs first."

02/04/2017: Continue to take fluid sample with wireline run #1 - Descent 6 (GR/MDT 3) at 33;538' MD. POOH with wireline run #1 - Descent 6 (GR/MDT 3) from 33;538' MD to surface.  RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 7 (GR/MSCT - F) from surface to 33;550' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW / 15.8 ppg DHMW. Loss of hydraulic power on tool. POOH with wireline run #1 - Descent 7 (GR/MSCT-F) from 33;550' MD to surface. RIH with wireline run #1 - Descent 8 (GR/MSCT-B) from surface to 30;000' MD.

"},{"   ":117,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-02-05","TEXT_REMARK":"02/05/2017: Continued to run in hole (RIH) with wireline Run #1 - Descent 8 (SGTP/MSCT-B) from 30;000' MD to 33;500' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Up-logged and took rotary sidewall core samples from 33;500' MD to 32;334' MD. Pulled out of hole (POOH) with wireline Run #1 - Descent 8 (SGTP/MSCT-B) from 32;334' MD to surface.

02/06/2017: Began to RIH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 9 (EDTC/MSCT-E) from surface to 31;470' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Down-logged and took rotary sidewall core samples from 31;470' MD to 32;986' MD.

02/07/2017: Up-logged and took rotary sidewall core samples with wireline Run #1 - Descent 9 (EDTC/MSCT-E) from 31;244' MD to 31;862' MD. POOH with Run #1 - Descent 9 (EDTC/MSCT-E) from 31;862' MD to surface. RIH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 10 (VSP) from surface to 22;000' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW.

Note: BSEE Inspectors arrived on the Pacific Sharav to perform a rig inspection. The inspectors departed at 12:58 hrs.  

02/08/2017: Continued to RIH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 10 (VSP) from 22;000' MD to 30;200' MD. POOH from 30;200' MD to surface. RIH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 10 (VSP) from surface to 33;500' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Up-logged and surveyed from 33;500' MD to 30;590' MD.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) gave Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) a 72-hour notification for the commencement of stump testing for the Jack PS007 well in WR 758 on February 8; 2017 at 15:17 hrs. Planned to start testing on Saturday; February 11; 2017.

02/09/2017: Up-logged and surveyed with wireline Run #1 - Descent 10 (VSP) from 30;590' MD to 14;495' MD. Functioned BOP Acoustic Communications System from Bridge.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) via email granting Chevron permission to delay casing evaluation for an additional 5 days or as soon as possible; whichever occurs first on February 9; 2017 at 15:12 hrs.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) via email granting Chevron permission to delay BOP function; diverter function; and BOP pressure testing for an additional 72 hours or prior to any workstring being run across the stack; whichever occurs first on February 9; 2017 at 15:12 hrs.  

02/10/2017: Continued to up-log and take surveys with wireline Run #1 - Descent 10 (VSP) from 14;495' MD to 5;045' MD. POOH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 10 (VSP) to surface. Began to RIH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 11 (HTGC/MSCT-E) from surface to 32;314' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Up-logged and took rotary sidewall core samples with wireline Run #1 - Descent 11 (HTGC/MSCT-E) from 32;314' MD to 32;136' MD. POOH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 11 (HTGC/MSCT-E) from 32;136' MD to 2;000' MD. Function tested Blind Shear rams from Driller's Panel (Primary) using the Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) using the Blue Pod. Function tested Casing Shear Rams from Driller's Panel (Primary) using the Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) using the Blue Pod.

02/11/2017: Continued POOH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 11 (HTGC/MSCT-E) from 2;000' MD to surface. Began to RIH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 12 (HTGC/MSCT-B) from surface to 32;384' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Up-logged and took rotary sidewall core samples from 32;535' MD to 31;894' MD. POOH with wireline Run #1 - Descent 12 (HTGC/MSCT-B) from 32;535' MD to surface.
"},{"   ":118,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-02-12","TEXT_REMARK":"02/12/2017: Continued to trip in hole (TIH) with the 5" mule shoe assembly from 23' MD to 5;994' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. POOH from 5;994' MD to 4;057' MD. TIH with the BOP test tool from 4;057' MD to 9;092' MD and landed the tool in the wellhead. Pressure tested the BOP stack with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Tested rams with low pressures of 250-300 psi and a high pressure of 9;500 psi; successful test. Tested upper and lower annulars with low pressures of 250-300 psi and a high pressure of 5;400 psi; successful test. Tested choke manifold 10K components with low pressures of 250-300 psi and a high pressure of 9;700 psi; successful test. Tested choke manifold 15K components with low pressures of 250-300 psi and a high pressure of 11;200 psi; successful test. Function tested the BOPs on 5" drill pipe from the Driller's Panel (Primary) with the Blue Pod and from the Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) with the Yellow Pod; successful tests. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's Panel (Primary); successful test.

Note: On 02/12/2017 at 16:40 hrs; Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) requested approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to modify the BOP testing schedule. The new steps included: First; obtain successful pressure tests on upper annular; lower annular; upper pipe rams; and middle pipe rams. Second; omit lower pipe ram test on the basis of meeting the minimum number of required pipe rams without a test on the lower pipe rams. Mr. Bobby Nelson imposed the following conditions: the lower pipe rams must be locked out and a third party is needed to re-verify the stack. Conditions were incorporated into the BOP testing schedule. Mr. Steven Scruggs received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson on 02/12/2017 at 17:08 hrs; via email; for the modified schedule after conditions were met.

Note: On 02/12/2017 at 18:22 hrs; Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) notified Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) of an updated timeline for BOP stump testing for the Jack PS007 well in WR 758. Planned to start testing on Saturday; February 13; 2017.

02/13/2017: Continued to pressure test the BOP stack with 5" mule shoe and 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW; successful tests. POOH with BOP test tool from 9;093' MD to 4;071' MD. TIH with float assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 4;071' MD to 31;626' MD.

02/14/2017: Continued to TIH with cement stinger on drill pipe from 31;626' MD to 33;524' MD with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW. Spotted plug #1 with 187 bbls (1;050 cu ft) of 16.5 ppg Lafarge Class H cement from 33;600' MD (32;991' TVD) to 32;000' MD (31;527' TVD). Pulled out of open hole cement plug #1 with 5" mule shoe to 31;950' MD (31;481' TVD). Started spotting plug #2 with 234 bbls (1;314 cu ft) of 16.5 ppg Lafarge Class H cement.

02/15/2017: Finished spotting plug #2 with 234 bbls (1;314 cu ft) of 16.5 ppg Lafarge Class H cement from 32;000' MD (31;527' TVD) to 30;400' MD (30;067' TVD). Pulled out of open hole cement plug #2 with 5" mule shoe from 32;000' MD to 30;350' MD. Spotted plug #3 with 247 bbls (1;387 cu ft) of 16.5 ppg Lafarge Class H cement from 30;400' MD (30;067' TVD) to 28;700' MD (28;412' TVD). Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 5" mule shoe from 24;700' MD to 15;315' MD.

02/16/2017: Continued to TOH with 5" mule shoe from 15;315' MD to surface. Pressure tested casing to 3;000 psi for 30 minutes with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW; successful test. TIH with 11-7/8" packer from surface to 15;977' MD. Pressure tested Blind Shear Rams from Driller's Panel (Primary) using the Blue Pod with 250 psi low and 3;000 psi high pressure; successful test. Function tested the Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Driller's Panel (Primary) using the Blue Pod; and from the Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) using the Yellow Pod. Function tested the Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) using the Yellow Pod; successful test.

02/17/2017: Continued to TIH with 11-7/8" packer from 15;977' MD to 24;703' MD. Set the 11-7/8" packer at 24;703' MD (24;606' TVD). Performed a positive pressure test on 11-7/8" packer with 1;000 psi and 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW; successful test. TOH with packer stinger from 24;700' MD to 17;600' MD. Made up 14" retrievable packer and TIH from 17;600' MD to 22;850' MD. Set the 14" retrievable packer at 5;208' MD (5;207' TVD). Closed the upper annular and performed a pressure test across the 14" retrievable packer to 1;000 psi with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW; successful test. 

02/18/2017:  Performed a negative pressure test across the 11-7/8" packer to 2;522 psi with 6.6 ppg base oil and 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW; successful test. TOH with 14" retrievable packer from 22;850' MD to 17;252' MD. TIH with packer running tool from 17;252' MD to 24;695' MD. Spotted plug #4 with 97 bbls (544 cu ft) of 16.5 ppg Lafarge Class H cement from 24;700' MD (24;612' TVD) to 24;000' MD (23;937' TVD). TOH with packer setting tool from 23;490' MD to 21;179' MD.

"},{"   ":119,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608114067301,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-02-19","TEXT_REMARK":"02/19/2017: Continue to trip out of hole(TOH)with cement stinger from 21;179' MD to 19;400' MD. Spot cement plug #5 with 164 bbls (920 cu ft) of 16.5 ppg Lafarge Class H cement from 19;400' MD (19;400' TVD) to 18;400' MD (18;400' TVD). Continue to TOH with cement stinger from 19;400' MD to 4;671' MD. TIH with the jet sub and multi-purpose tool from 4;671' MD to 9;660' MD while monitoring well on trip tank; well static. Pull wear sleeve. TOH from 9;660' MD to 4;601' MD. Function tested the Diverter with the Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary). Function tested the BOPs from the Driller's Panel (Primary) with the Yellow Pod and from the Toolpusher's Panel (Secondary) with the Blue Pod. 

02/20/2017: Make up seal assembly running tool (SART) and TIH from 4;601' MD to 9;641' MD (bit depth) with 14" SART. Wash wellhead and seal assembly area from 5;021' MD to 5;029' MD. Space out; perform strip test with annular closed; open annular and land out SART on 14" seal assembly with 60k. Engage SART to seal assembly and close annular. Pull seal assembly and monitor well with annular closed. Monitor well for 30 minutes; well static. TOH with SART and 14" seal assembly from 9;663' MD to 4;476' MD and rack back SART stand. Monitor well on trip tank; well static. Continue to TOH from 4;476' to surface with packer running tool. Monitor well on trip tank; well static. TIH with Weatherford casing cut/pull assembly. Perform shallow function test on casing cutter at rotary. Continue TIH from 1;480' MD to 6;028' MD with Weatherford casing cut/pull assembly.

02/21/2017: Continue TIH with Weatherford casing cut/pull assembly from 6;028' MD to 6;200' MD. Land out Weatherford marine swivel at 5;021' MD with 20k down. Cut 14" casing; latch Weatherford spear in 14" casing and TOH from 6;200' MD to 1;167' MD. Monitor well on trip tank; well static. TOH with inner string to surface. Rig up casing handling equipment. TOH and lay down 14" casing hanger and 14" casing in doubles. TIH with 16" Halliburton packer. Set and positive test packer at 5;600' MD with 1;000 psi for 15 minutes. TOH with 16" packer running tool from 5;600' MD to 3;331' MD.

02/22/2017: Continue TOH from 3;331' MD to surface with 16" packer running tool. TIH from surface to 5;564' MD with 16" retrievable test-treat-squeeze (RTTS) assembly. Wash RTTS setting depth at 5;360' MD and set same. Perform positive test with 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW on RTTS to 1;200 psi - good test. Pump 153 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil down drill string and perform negative test on 16" packer to 2;215 psi. During negative test; bypass valve on 16" RTTS inadvertently opened due to heave cycle; which allowed 6.6 ppg base oil to u-tube back through the opened vent line. Decision made to perform negative test again. Pump 155 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil down drill string and perform negative test on 16" packer to 2;214 psi. Monitor no flow for 30 minutes - good test. Unseat packer and TOH from 5;564' MD to surface with 16" RTTS. TIH from surface to 5;587' MD with mule shoe and riser brush assembly. Make up side entry sub (SES) stand and prepare to displace 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 ppg DHMW SBM to 8.6 ppg seawater (SW).

02/23/2017: Displace well from 15.5 ppg SMW/ 15.8 DHMW SBM with 8.6 ppg SW. Perform flow check following displacement - well static. Spot cement plug #6 (surface plug) with 119 bbls (669 cu ft) 16.5 ppg Lafarge Class H cement from 5;600' MD to 5;150' MD. TOH from 5;587' MD to 5;035' MD with mule shoe and riser brush assembly. Circulate 1.5 times drill string volume. TOH from 5;035' MD to surface with mule shoe and riser brush assembly. Rig up riser handling equipment. Pick up and engage diverter running tool in diverter. Pick up; clean and land diverter on Spider. Remove and replace diverter element. Reinstall and torque top plate on diverter.

02/24/2017: Rig up riser running tool and pick up BOP landing joint. Lower and lock slip joint; transfer weight from tensioners to block and unlatch BOP from emergency wellhead. Position auxiliary well rotary over well center. Land and engage wellhead running tool in emergency wellhead from auxiliary rotary while laying down BOP landing joint on main rotary. Service slip joint and lay out while TOH with emergency wellhead on auxiliary rotary. Pull BOP from 4;885' MD to 285' MD. RIH from auxiliary rotary and tag surface cement plug with 30k down on the auxiliary rotary at 5;138' MD.

02/25/2017: Continue pulling BOP on marine riser on the main rotary from 285' MD to surface and place in setback area. Rig down riser handling equipment. Moved rig to safe handling zone; performed clear bottom survey and retrieved 8 compatts with ROV. Made preparations for heavy lift inspection. TOH on auxiliary rotary to surface and installed drill collar protector. Moved rig off Anchor 4 BP01 well at 12:00 hours.
"}]
